name: Top location studio 1 block from lake!
description: Spacious studio with washer/dryer, Wi-fi, supermarket and gym in the same building, cleaner + ironing, cable HDTV, everything you need! Great public transport to UN, IO's, bus stop on your doorstep and the lake just a stone's throw away.

name: Lovely flat by Geneva lake
description:
This cozy flat is located in a very pleasant village, nearby Geneva lake, and near all facilities, such as groceries, trains, bus stops, banks, etc. It's perfect for a family with 2-3 children. Geneva center is at only 10 minutes by car/by train.
There's no lift!

name: Top location 1 block from the lake!
description: One bedroom apartment located in a pedestrian street one block from the lake. Bus stop around the corner, wi-fi, cleaning lady, washer/dryer and dishwasher... Perfect place to hit the ground running. Your home from home in Geneva. Welcome to Switz!

name: Nice modern bedroom with balcony

name: 5th Sky (Downtown Geneva)
description: Unique & quiet attic loft located in Pâquis, the vibrant heart of Geneva, with an amazing view and a groovy host (LGBTIQ friendly). You can't be better located: about 150m away from the central station (Cornavin), 5mn from the lake side and 10mn from the airport, the UN HQ and Palexpo (Convention centre). The flat can be shared with me or rented entirely for an EXTRA cost. How cool is that? #Superhost ^_^

Fabulous apartment with design interior in charming Geneva building with high ceilings and hardwood floors .

Surface area 190m2 with 7 rooms & 2 bathrooms (1st floor with elevator)

Few minutes walking from Geneva's center, lake, UN, and WHO in a quite, green and safe area very well connected (many bus lines , the Central railway station is less than 15 min. walking distance).

Elegant and new fournitures.

For your comfort, I have equipped the studio with Wifi high speed), Smart TV, washing machine and dryer machine , dish washer, micro waves….

name: Suite overlooking Geneva & Mt Blanc
description:
Because of its location and in order to help with the war issue, the place is available on a priority basis to UN members or people working with / for a UN office, WHO, etc

!! ONLY 1 SMALL OR MEDIUM SIZE LUGGAGE

RARE in Geneva : very pleasant and fully equipped independent place (equivalent in size to a junior suite) in the heart of downtown, next to the UN buildings with wonderful views on the city, its famous water fountain and the Mont-Blanc mountain.

Fully furnished, equipped, ideal for expats moving to Geneva and tourists. 7min to city centre by bus (bus stop outside the complex)
Amenities such as groceries, pharmacy, petrol station, tennis courts, football courts and many more are situated just across the road.

name: Cosy and very central apartment

130 sqm., 3 bedrooms, living room, dining room, 2 balconies, 2 bathrooms.

Private garden that leads directly on to a park.
Furnished, with washing machine, dishwasher and WiFi.
Perfect for a small family relocating to Geneva and seeking medium-term accomodation.
Ideal rental period: 6-12 months. Please let us know your ideal dates by message and we can send you a personalized request-to-book.

This superb lake view apartment 160 SQM has 6 rooms, 3 bedrooms 2 and half bathrooms, enjoys a central sunny, bright apartment and still very quiet. The apartment is ideal for families or for receiving guests in its generous living room. The apartment was completely renovated with best materials and high quality appliances.
Layout:
160 SQM of living space, an entrance hall with, guest WC, a fully equipped kitchen

name: Les Pâquis Apartment Near the United Nations
description:
Beautifully decorated and really zen and very well located in the heart of the city.

5 minutes walk from train station.

In principle none.

Hop on a free bike on the promenade along the lakeside, and watch the Jet d'Eau from the Bains de Pâquis, a stone's throw from this flat. Steps away are several art galleries, with several parks, hip restaurants, and bohemian boutiques also nearby.

5 minutes walk from the Geneva train station.

name: Perfect for UN Intern ! Central, Fully Furnished !

Perfect for a UN Intern! ONLY Female!

I will not be in the apartment next period. You will have the apartment only for you.

please enjoy your stay! Merci la vie :)

Best Terrasse in town with bar,BBQ and JACUZZI.

Bars&restaurants, shops, museums, old town, the lake, all right there less than 2 minutes walk, well, 5 minutes for the lake.

My son and I live in the flat, so it is not a minimalistic place like a hotel room or a commercial apartment. It is lively and alive.

and quiet place for holidays as business days. Please note that, as I’m also leaving here, I accept from 2 (minimum) to 10 maximum consecutive days stays. Thank you for your understanding.

15 minutes by tram from the city center, direct bus from the airport (25 minutes) and direct tram to the Cornavin train station.

Fully equipped: apartment of 80m2, there is everything you need for a short or long stay.

It is ideally located in the neighborhood Les Délices, a name coined by Voltaire himself, who used to live here, in a mansion located next to our building (Musée Voltaire). The apartment is located right next to the mansion’s gardens, now a public square.

Possible to have 3 people stay over as long as one person sleeps in the living room on an inflatable bed. All expected amenities are provided.

Very close to UN organizations (5min by bus) and about 30min from Palexpo and airport.

name: Chambre à louer ao Grand Saconnex bien situé

The cleanliness of their room air the room when comes out to go to work or to walk

Discover Studio 52, a 40 sqm space combining simplicity and efficiency with clean lines and minimalistic decor. Enjoy large windows, a small front garden, and modern amenities in a tranquil setting.

Studio 52 features convenient self-check-in and complimentary visitor parking. Located just a 15-minute walk from Carouge and accessible by 2 bus lines, it ensures a seamless and stress-free stay from start to finish.

description: a private bedroom in an extremely well located, charming quiet big loft in the very heart of Geneva. Perfect proximity to all major attractions is very convenient when you're here to explore the city or on a business trip. 15 min walk(3 min by bus) to the iconic Mont blanc bridge, the lake and the jet d'eau, the old town and the shopping district. 5 min bus ride to the UN, the red cross and other international organizations, 10 min walk to the train station, 17 min bus ride from/to the airport.

name: charming well located and super spacious loft
description:
a charming and spacious 2 bedroom loft with modern and well thought design. It's extremely well located in a very quiet neighborhood in the very heart of Geneva, 18 min walk to and from the UN, the red cross and the international quarter, airport 10 min train ride away and train station 10 min walk away.
The lake, the Mont Blanc bridge, the jet d'eau and the old town are 15 to 20 min away on foot, or 6 min by bus. Multiple supermarkets, parks, restaurants and bars are all around.

name: The yurt, nature in the heart of the city
description:
Spend a night in a yurt.

Discover an incredible place in a beautiful private garden. Find yourself in the wild, under the benevolent attention of our century trees.

Our yurt is only two minutes away from the tramway stop, minimarket, restaurants, all this only ten minutes away by car from Geneva airport.

For the long stay, there is also a clothes-wash-machine.
Just at the feet of the building there is the tram 14, 18, bus 3 and also all supermarkets like Coop, Migros, also bank and fast-food and others shops. Servette is an emblematic area

The cat is much appreciated, and finally us:-)

Easy parking. And we are 20 minutes bus bus or tram from the city center. We know very well Geneva and Switzerland, so we can give you many tips.
We speak french.
Wir sprenche deutsch.
Parliamo italiano.
You will feel good at our place !
Sabrina and Jerome

85 m2

The place is available for short term, for people coming on holidays, for work, or for internships or studies… Parcs, monuments, the lake, art and cultural spots are all at walking distance!

First quality housewear.

Walk to private beach; jog in nearby forest and fields.  Train station is two steps away. Great bakery & restaurants in walking distance. Borrow our bikes & kayak.

Nice and comfortable bedroom in farmhouse from the 18th century. It comfortably fits one and is centrally located in the hearth of Geneva while enjoying nice woods and calm. Enjoy a nice kitchen, access to the garden and easy access to all bus lines.

The 5 rooms have been on nocarz since 2015. Due to a change of account, all the history of comments is unfortunately lost, but can be found photographed at the end of the diashow of the accommodation with an excellent rate of 4.5 to 5 stars!

name: 1st charming room in Geneva
description: Our home is extremely charming, it's part of a 5 villas group that were all built during the year 1898, all located in a private and quiet road. The tram is 100 meters away from the house which makes it super easy to access the city center.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: The Green room in farmhouse
description: Nice and comfortable bedroom in farmhouse from the 18th century. It comfortably fits one and is centrally located in the hearth of Geneva while enjoying nice woods and calm. Enjoy a nice kitchen, access to the garden and easy access to all bus lines.

name: The Pink Library room in farmhouse
description:
Nice and comfortable bedroom in farmhouse from the 18th century. It comfortably fits one and is centrally located in the hearth of Geneva while enjoying nice woods and calm. Enjoy a nice kitchen, access to the garden and easy access to all bus lines.

The 5 rooms have been on nocarz since 2015. Due to a change of account, all the history of comments is unfortunately lost, but can be found photographed at the end of the diashow of the accommodation with an excellent rate of 4.5 to 5 stars!

name: Very center of Geneva studio for 2 people (CHA6)
description: Cozy studio in the very heart of Geneva is ready to host you for your best experience in the city! It is a very practical, cozy and comfortable apartment with fully furnished kitchen (fridge, microwave, oven, etc.). It is close to art and culture, great views, restaurants and dining, parks, and the beach of Geneva lake. You’ll love it because of the coziness and location which is absolutely in the center. All was installed with attention and care to host you.

name: Cozy studio, few minutes from the lake and train !
description:
Cosy appartement cosy for two persons in Geneva center.

Sofa can be used for sleeping.

Square very quite, and close to all commodities 5 min from lake and 10 min from train station!

ONU, UIT, UNHCR are accessibles by 2 tram stops.

Palais Wilson and the lake are very close.

Nice place with good restaurants and bars around.

name: Large pretty safe single room w/private bathroom
description:
Enjoy to stay in the mezzanine of our extremely quiet cosy apartment with vue to Mont Blanc.
The mezzanine with a private bathroom and a toilet only on your disposal.

Our open-plan apartment is close to the city center and UN and ideal base to explore Geneva and Switzerland.

In the ground floor of our building there is a big shopping mole with shops and restaurants. There is a bus stop in front of the building.

Appartement is very clean and proper.
And I speak French too.

name: Like @ Home-80m2-2BR-4 guests-10min Geneva center
description:
Flat 2 minutes walking from transportation to get to
Geneva center town in 10 minutes and possibility for a parking place in addition.

name: Lake View - Modern 2BR Apt
description:
Beautiful and very spacious one bedroom apartment of 93 sq/m located on the waterfront next to the Kempinski hotel with stunning direct views of the fountain (jet d'eau), lake and Salève.

Decorated in a contemporary manner with high quality materials like a "boutique hotel", it is located on the same street as all the palace hotels in the hyper center of Geneva.

name: Large 2BR Apartment - 5mins Walk to UN
description: Beautiful renovated 2 bedroom apartment, with large and very luminous living/dining area, located in the United Nations district. The apartment is spacious and surrounded by parks, with an amazing view of the city and is situated in a very quiet neighbourhood, which is close to the airport and walking distance from all the international organisations of Geneva.

name: Apparement
description: Warm atmosphere, bright apartment 15 min from the city center and Lake Geneva

name: 73 Room Chambre Cornavin ONU Centre Aeroport
description: Discover our cozy room with a cozy bed, desk, balcony and great internet connection to accommodate all your needs. Also take advantage of self check-in for flexibility. Relax in our comfortable bedroom and enjoy modern, well-equipped bathroom. Whether you're in town for business or a vacation, our room is the perfect place to rest and unwind.

name: 2 chambres/Duplex Grand-Saconnex Palexpo Aéroport
description:
You have 2 pretty PRIVATE ROOMS in this large Duplex (old Farmhouse)
CHALET - 4 single beds. (with separation)
NEW YORK - 2 Single beds.
PALEXPO 5 min walk, ARENA 10 min
Airport 20 min - BUS 3 stops - TAXI 8 min
15 min BUS to the city center and LAKE
Close to the United Nations

The house is not fully rented.

name: Nice room in a shared apartment_only for a lady
description: Nice, clean, large room - UN area

name: Private room in Geneva Downtown
description:
My place is very close to the city center (3 stops with the Tramway). The public transport and the supermarkets are very close to the room (1 min on foot). The room is with high speed Internet.

If you need a coffee, Starbucks is at 5 min on foot

Parking info:
It is free to park in the street from 7pm to 8am and on Sundays the whole day. There is also a car park (parking Plaine de Plainpalais) close to the room.

name: Luxurious lake view & terrace - Hermance apartment
description:
Beautiful and rare lake view.
Recently built, modern, fully furnished apartment of 144 m sq with large terrace, in luxury residential building. Located in the charming town of Hermance, in the Geneva country side. 15 minute drive to the city.
3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious kitchen, living & dining area, small office, beautiful L shaped terrace, & access to 2 indoor parking spots.
25 mins by bus to center of Geneva, 15 mins by car. 10 min walk to the beach in Hermance.

name: Les Pins - Appartment/Loft - Residential area
description:
Duplex appartment of 150 m2 with access to 400 m2 garden.
This peaceful accommodation offers a relaxing and comfortable stay for the whole family or a team of people who work in Geneva for a short period.
The house is built of wood, with ecological materials, volume management and internal breathing. Well equipped with family furniture, regularly maintained. Parquet and tile floors, lime-painted walls.
Baby/children equipment and games available.

name: "L'Ancienne Epicerie" in Chambésy Village
description: Old stone house located in the village of Chambésy, close to the Geneva airport, Palexpo, International Organizations and Train station Cornavin. Located 5 minutes from Local transportations . Free transportation card. Breakfast is included.Quiet location. Separate floor of 84m2 with a bedroom and a lounge, another room with 2 single beds and large bathroom. Terrace available. The Suite is located on the 1st floor of the house. No smoking, No pets, No private parties. Minimum: 2 nights.

name: Chalet - Grand-Saconnex Palexpo ONU Aéroport
description:
Large private room for 1 to 4 people in Duplex of 160 m2 in house (Old Farm) On foot: Palexpo 5 min, Airport 15 min.
By Bus: 15min from Downtown and Lake
Close to the United Nations and International Organizations
Close to all amenities
Terrace with views and sunset of the Jura
Bus (2min)
Price included for 2 people, extra for 3 and 4


The house is not fully rented.

name: Geneva city center- close to the lake (21.2)
description:
Geneva, comfortable studio apartment, 2nd floor,40m2 approx : 1 living
room/bedroom, 1 shower room, 1 separate toilet, equipped kitchen/dining
room.

Location: Located close to the city center (at 5 min), restaurants, Geneva Lake and Park la Grange.

name: Appartement en campagne spacieux et agréable
description: Spacious apartment on the garden level, not overlooked, overlooking the mountains, sleeping 3 guests, with a double bed and a sofa for a 3rd guest. Functional kitchen with possibility to eat in the garden to listen to the birds. A welcoming and warm lounge.

name: Appartement Nations / Léman
description: The accommodation is close to Nations: 5 mins by tram, 10 mins on foot. Ideal if you work at the Nations (job, internship, etc.). Perfect for couples, solo and business travelers.

name: Super-budget bed Geneva center (only 8pm to 8am)
description:
In a nice little loft where I live, comfy futon for 1. Shared space, no smoking. No luxury but cool, clean, and cheap. And a little breakfast is offered :)

IMPORTANT:
- No contagious affections
- Conditions and access times under "House rules" to confirm
- nocarz hydes your pictures (discriminating us because you can see us). So if you additionally have no reviews yet, don't do any request, sorry. No blind trust on my side.

name: Room at Gare Cornavin, very calm. NO lift
description: The room is very confortable and cosy. Located in the heart of the city, but very calm. In the apartment there is another room that is rented sometimes.

name: Chambre dans villa de charme
description:
Bedroom in charming villa located 2 steps from Chêne-Bourg train station which connects you in 15 min to Cornavin train station and in 30 min to Geneva airport.
Family and warm atmosphere close to all amenities.
Access to garden. Free secure parking.
Room in charming villa 2 steps away from the train station of Chêne-Bourg.
You are 15 min away from the main train station and 30 min from Geneva Airport.
Cosy and friendly atmosphere.
Access to garden. Free secured parking.

name: Modern contemporary loft
description: Modern loft next to the lake.

description:
15 mins to airport, 10 mins to the city center
there is bus 5 that stops in front of the apartment! There is a shop , post office, bus very close

description:
Small PRIVATE room in Grand duplex 160 m2 in house (Old Farm in the center of Grand-Saconnex) 5 min walk to Palexpo, 15min walk to Airport, 15min by bus to Downtown.
Very close to the United Nations, Palexpo and Arena
Close to all commodities and international organizations
Very nice view on the Jura from the terrace

name: New-York  - Grand-Saconnex Palexpo ONU Aéroport
description:
Private room for 1 or 2 people in Grand duplex 160 m2 in house (Ancienne Ferme in the center of Grand-Saconnex) 5 min walk to Palexpo, 15min walk to the Airport, 15min by bus to the city center.
Near the United Nations, Palexpo and Arena
Close to all commodities and international organizations

name: Cozy apartment in Petit-lancy (Geneva)
description: My place is very luminous and a nice atmosphere. It has 2 bedrooms, a large living room, a bathbub, separate bathrooms, a nicely set kichen with a round table and most of all a very nice balcony with a fabulous view on Geneva and the mountains around. It's 20 mns tram ride to the station, 15 mns tram  ride from the center and 20 mbs bus ride from the airport. It's on the 7th floor with a working elevator and comes with sll the accomodations.

name: Chambre lumineuse aux Eaux-Vives
description: Spacious and bright room in an apartment in Les Eaux-Vives, near the Lake, La Grange Park, museums and shops. Public transportation such as bus, tram and Geneva seagulls nearby.

name: Chambre à louer réservée aux femmes à Vernier
description:
Bedroom with a double bed upstairs next to the bathroom, fridge available. The kitchen as well as cooking utensils are available if necessary. There is a washing machine that you can use, but will have to pay an extra of 5.-/machine. The wifi code, a key to the room as well as that of the house will be given to you upon arrival. A rather quiet surroundings and a possibility to park a vehicle in front of the house (5.- more).
Room reserved for women!

name: Chambre spacieuse dans villa calme proche aéroport
description: Large beautiful room of 23 m2 in a villa, in a quiet area and very close to Geneva airport. Palexpo is a 25 minute walk (2km), UN, ITU, who and other international organizations are less than 4 kilometers away and easily reachable by public transport. Recreational opportunities and large shopping mall within walking distance.

name: Great & Spacious 2BR - Malagnou
description:
Wonderful two bedroom apartment in a quiet residential neighborhood of Geneva at only 5min away from the city center by public transportation (every 10 min) and 3 min by car and offers all the necessities (groceries, restaurants, etc.) available from a walking distance.
This two bedroom apartment will give you all the benefits of living in town while enjoying a peaceful environment.

name: Relaxing place like your own home
description:
We have an extra bedroom that we can offer. The house is located not far from
The croix de rozon Suisse douane .

name: Bright and charming flat, Carouge's Area
description: 52 square meters flat, bright and colorful, giving on a peaceful street. It is composed of one living with a kitchen, one bathroom, a wide dressing and a room. All rooms have windows on the south including the bathroom.

name: #1 Spacious & modern 4 and 1/2 loft-Geneva center
description:
Direct transport from and to the airport, the train station, Cern, the UN.(15min)
All bus/tram stops 3 minutes or less from flat.

Very spacious and modern 4 and 1/2 mezzanine apt in center Geneva - located in a super hip neighborhood

2 private bedrooms-1 mezzanine-one open space

Fresh linens and towels, coffee, and basic food condiments and kitchen utensils

If your dates are unavailable check my other flat - it’s the same space - but across the hall :

https://abnb.me/l5jpobHh5Q

name: Excellent situation
description: Ideally located at a walking distance from the city center in the heart of the popular Saint-Jean district and at a few meters from the bus stops to the airport, Palexpo and international organizations, this recently renovated 3-room apartment includes a living room with sofa bed , a bedroom with a queen size bed, a kitchen and a bathroom with bathtub. Located on the 7th floor, it has a balcony with open views of the setting sun.

name: Appartement 3 pièces plein centre de Genève
description:
Apartment on the 1st floor, very bright. ideally located in the center of Geneva, 100m from the lake,
shops, restaurants.
2min walk from train station and easy airport access.
UN and WTO has 3 bus stops.
Numerous bus lines nearby.

name: Grand appartement lumineux proche du lac
description: Large bright apartment in an independent and family residence, of 160 m2 on 2 floors with 6 rooms with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 cinema room, living room and kitchen, veranda, shaded terrace and garden for children.

name: Room with balcony at Servette
description:
The room is large and has its own access to balcony. The apartment is large and luminous. There is another room (my room when I am in Geneva) and another small room where my best friend stays sometimes.
For the long stay, there is also a clothes-wash-machine, once per week.
Possibility to use the kitchen but for short period (not allowed for long preparations, max one hour).
Close to tram 14, 18, bus 3 and supermarket Coop, bank and fast-food. Servette is an emblematic area of Geneva.

name: Appartement  avec grande terrasse très bien situé
description: The apartment consists of two bedrooms, a hallway, a bathroom and a kitchen, the apartment is very close to Cornavin Train Station and Lake Geneva. The apartment has been completely renovated,.sometimes noises can be heard at night.. on the street of the apartment there are several terraces of restaurants and bars..

name: Cozy studio close to downtown Geneva
description:
My studio offers an immersive experience at the heart of the vibrant city of Geneva. Located a short walk from Cornavin train station and Lake Geneva, this spacious home puts you in a privileged position to explore all the wonders of the city. With the main attractions within walking distance, you'll experience the convenience of having everything at your fingertips.
With easy access to public transport and the ability to reach the main points of interest on foot,

name: studio au grand-saconnex, ONU,BIT, OMS, PALEXPO
description:
Nice little studio, in a former 1902 farmhouse.
Located 5 minutes from the airport and 15 minutes from the city center by bus.
10 minutes walk from who,BIT, 20 minutes from UN.
Close to all amenities.

Stop: Gd-saconnex place
(line 5,F, 28,53)
Directly from the airport:
Stop: Gd-saconnex mairie
(Line: 50.53.59)

name: Chambre 13m2 avec terrasse sur le Jet d'eau
description:
Bedroom 1: 13 m2 with the terrace, Eaux-Vives side.

Great attic on the top floor with magnificent views of the Eaux-Vives and the Jet d 'eau. A bus stop serves the building entrance.
Apartment offers 2 guest rooms located in the left wing. Shower room, 1 bathroom with shared toilet.

Shared access to share with the family: equipped kitchen and terrace.

We look forward to welcoming you!

name: A room in a family apartment in Servette
description: A bedroom in an apartment close to the airport (20 min by public transport), close to the train station and lake (20 - 30 min walk), public transport, shopping mall, and supermarkets in close vicinity. 10 min walk to the United Nations. Ideal for a single guest. A home away from home.

name: Stellar Stay in Wonderful Old Town
description:
This great little apartment has been furnished to an impeccable standard.

It’s the ideal retreat for a fully facilitated & up-scale stay, located in the absolute heart of Geneva. We believe it’s the ultimate location to experience the city center the way it should be.

At 70 m from St. Pierre Cathedral and 800 m from Jet d'Eau, the flat is the heart of Geneva's old town. Get ready to get inspired! All in all, guaranteed enjoyment and relaxation. Settle in a professionally cleaned home.

name: Central 2 bedroom flat in heart of Eaux-vives
description:
A beautiful two bedroom, one bathroom apartment set on the 1st floor with a lift. Great living space with a balcony. 2 bedrooms, with a queen bed in each room.
The apartment is 1 min from the bus stop, and supermarkets, and 4 min from the lake.
The apartment features super fast 10Gbit/s fiber optic internet, fully equipped kitchen, with all necessities for cooking, coffee, microwave, toaster, blender, and much more. Free advice and support, at any time! :-)

name: Private room close to the UN
description: Room in small & cosy 2-bedroom shared apartment close to the UN & train station (10 min walk) in a quiet neighborhood. Grocery store, bus stop 1 min walk from the apartment which will take in town or by the lake in 10 min. View on a nice little garden. Shared kitchen and bathroom. The room I am renting is the sitting room so there is no bed but a large and comfortable couch

name: Family duplex with private garden near town center
description: Contemporary 3-bedroom duplex apartment with private garden, perfect for families. The ground floor comprises of a large open space living area and a new fully equipped kitchen with large windows that give direct access to the private garden. The first floor contains two bedrooms with a shared bathroom that are currently set up as a children's and guest room, plus a third master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom.

name: 00 Studio Gare Cornavin aeroport Cern
description:
Treat yourself to a stylish stay in Geneva with this nocarz rental apartment! Free mobile wifi.
Next to Cornavin train station, restaurants, shops and Manor Mall. Lake Geneva and Old Town 10 min on foot.
Modern amenities and neat decor.
Book now for an unforgettable travel experience in one of Switzerland's most beautiful cities.

name: Les Acacias, Geneva
description: My apartment is close to restaurants, coffee shops, plainpalais market and retail shops e.g. Migros and Denner. It is also close to the tram line 15 stop (Acacias) which takes you from/to Gare Cornavin. The room receives adequate natural light during day time.

name: Appartement YOGI lumineux au centre ville
description:
The two-room apartment is quiet and bright.
A large living room with an office and reading area.
The kitchen is spacious and has all the equipment you need to cook.

name: Cosy studio
description:
Cosy and conveniently located studio in a residential and calm area close to the city center, 10 minutes by bus to the lake, 20 minutes to the train station and main UN institutions.
The apartment has all amenities you need for a stay. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher, oven, microwave.....

name: chambre calme
description:
Pleasant room in apartment with balcony overlooking the Salève.
Welcoming and quiet environment.
Ideally located: close to the city center (10 min by tram), shops nearby and 2 min to public transport
If you like the weekends from Friday evening until Sunday morning, no reservation

name: Comfortable room in Geneva with private bathroom
description:
Hi! Comfortable room in Geneva with private bathroom. 15min: airport, train station, and the lake. You can use the kitchen and living room.

Hello! Comfortable room in Geneva with private bathroom. 15min from airport, train station and lake.

Hello! Comfortable room in Geneva with private bathroom. 15min from the airport, train station and lake. You can use the kitchen and living room

name: Charming penthouse studio near the UN and lake
description: Spacious studio flat with large balcony and gorgeous view of the Mont Blanc, Jet d’eau and lake Geneva. Perfect central location - Close walk to train station, lake and to the UN/ international organisations.

name: 2ème chambre charmante à Genève
description:
Our house is extremely charming. It is part of a small group of 5 identical houses, in a dead end road, built in 1898.
Its location 100 m from the tram, its tranquility as well as its proximity to the city center are its main assets.

name: Adresses Privees B 90m², pied à terre d'affaires
description:
Very bright, spacious, 1 living room + 1 living room office, 1 dining room, 1 bedroom suite with bathroom and shower .
White and Black with Contemporary Art.

name: Logement tranquille au coeur des paquis
description:
I offer a room in a 2-person roommate.
My host will have a bedroom with a double bed, a small desk, a wardrobe and a record player for music lovers;).
The kitchen, bathroom and two toilets are shared with my roommate (quiet, social, and good cooking),good opportunity to discover the city with local contact.
The apartment is a 2-minute walk from the train station in the centre of Geneva.

name: Beautiful and spacious flat with  balconies
description: Beautiful and spacious flat with a lot of light and two balconies, 10 minutes walk from city center

name: Cosy Apartment @ Champel Geneva city center
description:
Fully furnished bright room in Malagnou

2 bedroom, 2 bathroom, fully furnished apartment. The apartment benefits from close access to public transport in a quiet residential area of Geneva approx. 8 mins from city center. The room has its own sun-drenched balcony, built-in wardrobes and a double bed.

The appartment has a fully equiped kitchen, living room with great facilities and a dinning room all which are part of the flat share.

Check in 2pm Check out 12pm

name: Calme, design et nature en ville. Parking privé.
description:
100 meters from the heart of the romantic city of Carouge, you are here quiet in a home with refined design. Nearby restaurants, shops, and transportation. Free underground gated parking (visitor spaces, but no guarantee of availability). Private box possible, for an additional fee (package 150.-/semaine). Public parking 300m away, for about 12 CHF per day.
Interested in discovering all that the region has to offer? Visit the Geneva Tourisme website.

name: Cozy apartment close to UN recently renovated
description: This cozy flat in the city center of Geneva is located in a historical building and it’s been recently fully renovated.

name: Pink room with a view
description:
You will live with us, a family, in a large apartment belonging to an easy residence.

The area is very quiet, we are 500 m from the lake, 2 min by car from Cointrin airport, 1 min from the nearest train station: the train takes you to the dryer district and international organizations in 3 min, to the Cornavin station in 5 min.

It is the ideal accommodation for an intern in an IO, a doctoral student or a student looking for peace and quiet to study.

name: Residential Area - 3 Bedrooms Apartment
description:
The apartment is situated in a calm and residential neighborhood with supermarkets and grocery stores within walking distance.
There are 3 bedrooms for up to 6 people, 2 bathrooms, 1 kitchen, 2 living-rooms and a balcony.
There is a direct bus connection to the old city center (10 min), to the central train station (15 min) and to the UN (20 min).

name: Magnifique appartement très bien placé au centre
description: Excellent apartment/studio in the city center of Geneva; 2 minute from Cornavin station and public transport to all directions in Geneva; 4 minutos from lake Léman; around the corner from shops, restaurants & nightlife. Super well located.

name: Rooftop Apartment
description: Stylish Rooftop Appartement in the heart of fancy Vieux Carouge, Geneva’s most sought after neighborhood.

name: Cozy beautiful stylish  modern flat close to lake
description:
Lovely modern clean flat, you have a quiet room (queen size bed) and full bathroom (shower). Well equipped kitchen, amazing neighborhood close to lake, balcony has (partial) view on Jet d 'Eau. Ideal for professional or couple. My beloved Geneva home!
Beautiful modern accommodation with nice bedroom overlooking the backyard (quiet) with full shower room a stone's throw from the lake, near all amenities and restaurants/bars. Ideal for a person who is alone or a serious couple.

name: Spacieux Appartement, Central & Lumineux- Vue Lac
description:
Superb apartment crossing (120m2), with 2 balconies+ lake view. Very bright/quiet as 2 of the rooms lead onto a quiet street.

Max 3 adults+1 child or 2 adults+2 children-adolescent (supplement if +3 adults or +4 people).

A 3min walk from the lake/park (right bank) & less than 7min from Cornavin train station on foot. Tram that crosses the city, down the building. 2 grocery stores down the building.

2 bedrooms with 2 double beds +1 room equipped with a bunk bed for 2 children (baby to teenager)

name: Studio au dernier étage avec superbe vue au calme.
description:
The unit is located in a residential area on the top floor with a large terrace (16m2) and views of the Salève.
Nearby you will find a supermarket, a bakery, a pharmacy, a bank as well as a large park and a petrol station as well as a sports center and a swimming pool.
The accommodation is located 200m from the bus stop that will take you to the city center.

name: Appartement charmant sous les toits
description:
Nice apartment with lots of charm, in a quiet area and close to all amenities (20 min from the airport and 10 min from the train station by bus).

The apartment consists mainly of a nice very bright living room that includes a kitchen, a living room and a veranda overlooking a balcony. From the balcony you can enjoy a beautiful view on the Salève and the Jura.

name: Cozy apartment in Old Town
description: Charming apartment in the district "Cité" in Geneva, for two people. Ideal for couples, friends, business or single travelers.

name: Small room at Servette
description:
Nice room at Servette, with all the confort. The apartment is large and luminous. There is another room (my room when I am in Geneva) and another room (close to the balcony) that is rented sometimes.
For the long stay, there is also a clothes-wash-machine.
Close of the building there is the tram 14, 18, bus 3 and also all supermarkets like Coop, Migros, also bank and fast-food and others shops. Servette is an emblematic area.Close to shops tram bus and UN. At two bus stop from train station.

name: Idéal pour voyage d'affaires/tourisme vue Genève
description:
Nice and bright apartment located in Downtown Geneva.
Beautiful views of Geneva and Mont Blanc from the bedroom, living room, and kitchen with the possibility of dining on the balcony.

A few minutes walk from international organizations, 5 minutes from Gare Cornavin, 10 minutes from the airport/palexpo, 5 minutes from the highway.

Access to the tram is at the foot of the building.
Near the apartment you will find, restaurants, cinema, gym, cafes & bars.

name: Spacious Apt in Geneva Center - 2 minutes to lake
description:
Welcome !

This convenient apartment is ideally located in the charming district of Eaux-Vives, just 2 minutes walk from Geneva Lake and the famous fountain "Jet d’Eau". It offers you the perfect location to discover Geneva and take full advantage of it.

The apartment can accommodate up to 4 people and consists of 1 wide living room, 1 comfortable double bedroom, 1 fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom.

name: Studio dans une villa
description: Independent studio of 25 m2  located on the lower floor of a villa. Very quiet. Bathroom, kitchen, TV, Wi-Fi.  Tram stop 200 meters away.

name: Amazing flat by the Jet d'Eau
Peaceful Nest In The Heart Of Geneva
description: Newly refurbished one bedroom apartment in the heart of the best residential area in Geneva.

name: Room in the heart of Geneva!
description:
Perfect room with everything you need for a wonderful stay in Geneva.

Perfect location. This flat is in the heart of Geneva - Pâquis, 4 minutes walking distance to train main station ( Gare Cornavin ) and bus main station ( Gare Routière ), very close to the water jet, 3 minutes walk the lake, 5 minutes by tramway the ONU and 7 min to Palexpo.

name: TT Smart Apartment
description: Lovely, fully furnished apartment in the heart of Geneva. 2 minutes walk from the Central train station and close to everything, stores, restaurant, supermarket, pharmacy, train and bus stops and and a short distance from the United Nations.

name: Stylish family house between city and countryside
description: Stylish small, three stories house a stone's throw away from Geneva city center. Open kitchen/living room with large doors to the terrace and family friendly garden with a big trampoline. First floor has two bedrooms and a bathroom. The top floor has another bedroom with an independent toilet.

name: Chambre à Genève. Attention:  5 nuits minimum.
description: Double room for rent with separate and private bathroom and toilet in charming apartment in the city center of Geneva in the lively Rive district during the day and quiet at night, at the foot of the old town, 2 min. from the lake and 2 seconds walk from buses and trams.

name: Studio Plainpalais HUG Genève
description: Charming refurbished studio in March 2018 in Plainpalais next to the Arve.

name: Studio Eaux-Vives Centre
description: Charming refurbished studio in 2017 in the heart of Les Eaux-Vives

name: Contemporary amazing new building in EV
description:
This brand new appartement is a Geneva Jewel, near the eaux-vives train station (5min walk) amazing everything. It is located in the most great and fun area of Geneva in Eaux-vives. You are 2 mins walk from parc de la grange, 5 min walk from the lake. Supermarket right in front building. 65 m2 fully furnished super high quality furniture.
BUS 1/9 in front of the building or tram 12/17. 7 mins in bus/tram to the city center. Quiet, calm, classy, residential, super comfy bed (hotel Quality).

name: Beautiful flat in the heart of Geneva, Eaux Vives
description: Beautiful flat available  in the heart of the Eaux-vives. I am travelling a lot for work and therefore rent my flat on nocarz when I am not in Geneva. Large living room with balcony, nice bedroom with a confortable queen size bed. Nice kitchen with dining area and a bathroom with a bathtub/shower. 2 minutes walk to buses, groceries stores, cafes and to the lake. Clean and tidy.

name: 3 bedroom apartment in the center of Geneva
description:
Very bright and central apartment , located in a lively part of Geneva, with supermarkets, lots of restaurants & bars, flea & food markets and the Rhone river if you fancy a swim.

Our flat is 50 meters from a tramway and bus stop, it takes 15mn to go to the train station and 25mn to the airport with public transports.

name: Charming studio in the heart of Geneva
description: Charming little studio located in the center of Geneva, very light , 5 minutes from the lake & train station. Overlooking the Rhone, restaurent, supermarket, shop, bar, nightlife at a few steps.

name: Cozy and quiet apartment in Geneva
Apt 2.5 rooms fully renovated Meyrin center, CERN
description:
Apartment located in the immediate vicinity of Meyrin forum, close to all amenities:
- tram at 50 m line 14 and 18, direct CERN or Geneva Centre (Cornavin station in 14 minutes)
- cultural center and Meyrin forum shopping center (Coop, Migros, Denner, UBS, Post Office, Restaurants etc...) 100m away
- Alpine garden 200 m away

2nd floor with elevator, facing south, bright, and overlooking a large wooded park. Park access with digicode and apartment with intercom

name: Studio apartment with garden and parking
description: Studio apartment with an entrance, separate fully equipped kitchen and balcony located on the 2nd floor of a house with its own independent entrance.  10 minutes from the Place des Nations and WHO.

name: Large Classic Appartment in Central Geneva
description: Beautiful and confortable classic appartment in the heart of Geneva's city center.  Classy building, large rooms, high ceilings, functional and fully equiped.  Elegant and quiet neighbourhood, walking distance to Old Town, parks and main shopping streets. Well connected with public transportation.

name: Appartement de standing
description:
The Africa apartment was renovated in 2016 and finds its place in an old 17th century building. Consisting of a bedroom, office, shower room, and large living room with open plan kitchen. Through the window you can see the lake. An eco-friendly and smart heater is set up for your comfort. Access is with a code and an alarm ensures security. High speed Wifi is free.
The cable TV offers programs in all languages.

name: Your home away from home!
description:
Quiet and cosy room available in a bright and spacious apartment in the centre of Geneva. It's perfect for responsible guests on a budget who are traveling by themselves!

Please bare in mind there is no lift in the building, you'll have to climb up to the 3rd floor!

name: Large apartment center Geneva near thelake+parking
description: Fully furnished and comfortable apartment of 3.5 rooms in the center of the city of Geneva near the lake and the river including a bedroom with a double bed, a large living room with a single bed and double sofa convertible, dining room, bathroom, and large independent kitchen.

name: Joli studio dans villa "Coccinelle"
description: Nice studio on the ground floor of a villa close to the airport and public transport.

name: L’auberge espagnole
description:
The room is located 1 min from the train station where all buses are located to reach any point of the city a stone's throw from the lake 10 min from the UN
Being very central everything is nearby.

name: Charming top floor appartement City Center
description: Amazing top floor flat right in the city center. The flat is located in the heart of the city close to shopping streets, ONU, OMS and train station. This is my private flat but  I put it on nocarz when  I’m in vacation. The flat has 2 bedrooms but one won’t be accessible as it is mine and I don’t rent it. Rest of the flat is accessible for the guests. Maximum 2 guests in the flat.

name: Spacious & Modern 1BR Apt - GVA Center
description:
Luxury apt in a residential building
Concierge 24/7
Completely Renovated
14 min from train station
In the upscale neighborhood of Champel
Near the city center, the old town, the business district, restaurants, nightlife and the lake

name: Cozy flat next to the International Organisations
description:
Lovely and spacious 3 room apartement of 60m2. The flat is next to the International Organisations and close to the airport and the train station. The apartement is well located and benefits from bus connections and shops nearby.

Beautiful 3 room apartment of 60 m2 totally furnished, in a quality residence, next to the International Organisations and close to the train station and the airport. The area is very well served by public transport and has many shops nearby.

name: Joli studio meublé à Genève
description:
Cosy central studio in Plainpalais, fully, furnished, close to 3 supermarkets (Coop, Lidl, Migros), 1 minute walking from public transport. One bed and one couch-bed, TV, wifi, coffee machine with capsules, hair drier. Bathroom with shower and wc. First floor with elevator.
Spoken language: Italian, French, German, German, English (basic).

Central and lively area, not suitable for those who seek silence and tranquility

name: Cozy and Central Apartment Near the UN
description:
Cozy flat near the center of Geneva. This fully furnished, 42m2 flat features high-quality furniture and internet services, including:

-A bedroom with a queen-size bed.
-A fully equipped kitchen/living room with a comfortable, queen-size convertible couch.
-A bathroom with a rain shower.
-Located just 5 minutes from the train station.
-15 minutes from the airport.
-10 minutes to the Old Town and the lake.
-Numerous shops in the area and shopping centers nearby.

name: Gorgeous studio by the lake
description:
This bright and charming studio flat is in one of the best locations in town. It is right by the lake and close to a range of great restaurants, bars and shops.

The United Nations are a 10 minute walk away, and the train station a 7 minute walk.

It is right by the wonderful Quai Wilson, one the most gorgeous lakeside promenades.

Our cleaning team is trained in the latest hygiene protocols to ensure the space is sanitized prior to any guest arrival.

name: Charming flat in Vieille Ville Geneva
description:
Charming flat in Vieille Ville Geneva
Bright, charming apartment on the first floor of an original old building in the hearth of the old town (vieille ville) of Geneva. Large living area with fire place, double bedroom facing the living room, bathroom with bath, full kitchen, large entrance.

name: Spacieuse chambre, 30 m 2
description: Refurbished bedroom, spacious, with a large bed and possibility of comfortable extra bed. Quiet. En suite.

name: Appartement T A
description: I rent a room because I'm almost not going to be home

name: Spacious luminous flat near UN
description:
A lovely flat located in a quiet neighbourhood. The flat is big 80m2 with two separate rooms and a big hallway. Large kitchen. Big balcony. 2 toilets.
Very easy access from the airport and form the train station. Well located for public transport. Grocery store close by.
Extremely convenient for guests coming to UN Conferences (close to the UN headquarters, WHO, ILO, WIPO, Geneva conference centre, WTO - all in close proximity). UN headquarters 15 minutes by bus.

name: Quiet room close to UN
description: Spacious private room in quiet neighborhood. The apartment is very close to UN and international organizations. From your room you have a nice open view, as we are on the 6th floor. All shops and public transport are nearby. Nearest tram stop (Butini, line 15) is 2 minutes walking, the big park Perle du Lac and Lake Geneva are less than 10 minutes walking. You are welcome to use the shared kitchen and bathroom whenever you want.

name: Chambre au cœur de Genève (D)
description:
This charming accommodation offers easy access to museums and the old village. Close to Parc des Bastions, Place Neuve, Full of Plainpalais, restaurants and shops.


Hair dryer, Dryer, Iron and ironing table, Washing machine and soap.

Tea and coffee provided

Self check-in available.

Building without elevator on the 4th, pets not allowed,

name: Charming large apartment in central Geneva
description: Charming apartment in central Geneva a few blocks from the beautiful Rhone river, less than 10min on bus/tram from train station, 20min on bus from airport.

name: Plateau de Frontenex 9A
description: Luxury living furniture , fancy kitchen , luxury bathroom , high class decoration. Very comfortable. Building situated in private wooded park . Walking and relaxing park area . Inside pool . Less than one mile migros supermarket , pharmacy , gas station . Bus transportation at the entrance of the property . Ten minutes to the Geneva lac and city center . Surrounded by prestigious Restaurant of different kind of cuisine reachabale by Bus , walking or by car. A calm and relaxing area in a city .

name: Chambre avec vue
description: 1 bedroom for 1 to 2 people with double bed 160cm/200cm in a busy apartment.

name: Central, Large, Sunny, Lakeview Apt w/ Terrace
description: This sunny and spacious flat is located in the exclusive Eaux-Vives just one block from the Jet d'Eaux with one lovely bedroom, a large contemporary living room, a spacious kitchen, toilet and shower with bath. The most comfortable bed in the world ! Close to everything and a must stay for those new or old to beautiful Geneva.

name: Two bedroom apt on the lake (20 mins from airport)
description: Stylishly furnished apartment, on the lake, with two bedrooms; and a balcony with a view of the lake. Located in Geneva’s most trendy neighborhood. 20 mins from the airport (stop located on the street of the apartment 50m).

name: only the BEST
description:
the apartment is in geneva suburb of CAROUGE . bus and tram connect easily to anywhere in geneva. the apartment is modern, clean , quite , ideal for easy living. well equipped . it has two dedrooms , each one with king size bed. it has two bathrooms with showers , but no bathtub. total sq m 130 ... all tiled floors .
i am the owner with properties in hong kong , cape town , manila , florida and berlin . i value serious up market guests who treat my place like their own .

name: Charming flat close to Leman Lake
description:
Charming apartment located next to college leman and 1 minute from Pont-Céard train station. Quiet place on the 5th floor with panoramic view of the lake and mountains. Ideal to join the UN, Palexpo, Airport and near to Geneva center.

You will have access to whole flat except the room mate. There is no tv but there is WiFi connection at home.

name: Logement proche aéroport et l’ONU et centre ville
description: Shopping mall right next door

name: Fabulous, central, 135sqm/1450 sqft apartment
description:
Huge, modern, light-filled, open plan 135sq metre /1450sq feet apartment in central Geneva.

Perfect for business traveler's.

- 50m to public transport
- 70m to the lake
- 15m to Geneva's largest park

There are 2 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, laundry, 2 workspaces: desk in bedroom + dining table.

Note: dates not available may denote when we are in the apartment. Contact us to enquire about renting the 2nd bedroom.

name: Appartement ultra cosy au coeur de Genève
description: Located on the edge of the Plaine de Plainpalais, this ultra cozy apartment is in the city center, in the "arty" district and very sought-after in Geneva. It's just close to everything

name: Modern One Bedroom Apt - Geneva Center
description:
Comfortable 60sqm fully equipped 1 Bedroom apartment, in Geneva city center just a few steps from the lake, the old town, the train station and shops.
Perfect for an extended stay or business trip.
It can comfortably welcome up to 3 Guests!

name: Guest house in Geneva
description:
Completely renovated and refurbished studio of 29 m2, independent of a townhouse with parking and garden. Parquet floor. Fully equipped kitchen with oven and dishwasher. Bathroom with washing machine and large shower. Right bank of Geneva, a 5-minute walk from a pretty wooded park equipped with sports facilities (urban training).
Public transport (bus and tram) nearby, 15 minutes from the train station and the airport. Shops 5 min walk

name: #2 Spacious & modern 4 and 1/2 loft-Geneva center
description:
NEED A GREAT PLACE TO STAY?

Very spacious and modern 4 and 1/2 mezzanine flat in center Geneva - located in a super hip neighborhood

Direct trams and buses from and to the airport, the train station, Cern, the UN.
All bus/tram stops 3 min. or less from the apartment.

2 private bedrooms-1 mezzanine/sleeping area-one shared space

fresh linens and towels, coffee, and kitchen utensils provided.

check my other listing for my recommendations**** :

name: Sweet appartement to rent
description: Simple and design, you will love the atmosphere that is there: nearby you have the tram stop that will take you wherever you want in town

name: Grande chambre dans souplex-loft-inferieur
description: Large bedroom, double bed, on the lower ground floor, with en-suite shower room, to share if  the 2nd bedroom (curtains) is occupied. It is possible to add a single bed and a baby cot. The kitchen and laundry room are not accessible for reservations longer than 7 days. It's not a hotel, you'll be staying with people who live there all year and are happy to leave their place for a few days to welcome guests. Please respect their belongings.

name: Studio Genève
description: Pleasant and warm studio furnished in two bedroom/living room atmospheres. Two supermarkets nearby 3 min walk from bus stops.

name: Bel appartement aux Charmilles
description: Beautiful tastefully decorated and equipped apartment, composed of an entrance hall, living room with fireplace and access to balcony, living kitchen, bathroom

name: Magnifique appartement lumineux de 150m2 à Vésenaz
description:
Large 140 m2 apartment with covered terrace located in Vesenaz near Manor shopping center, Colony Golf and 10 minutes from Geneve city center (water jet)
Large open plan living room with modern kitchen equipped with island, dishwasher...
3 beautiful bedrooms including a master suite with a magnificent Italian leather 180 bed, a dressing room and its private bathroom.
There is also a second bathroom with toilet and a laundry room and a visitor toilet.
1 underground parking space

name: Chambre romantique avec accès à la cuisine
description: The bedroom is located in an apartment, on the garden floor, in a villa formed of three apartments, in the city center. The apartment is composed of 5 bedrooms. Rooms are rented on nocarz, as well as the entire or separate apartment into two apartments. My place is close to restaurants, family-friendly activities, nightlife, public transportation. Kitchen is available for tenants.

name: Chambre privée avec accès à la cuisine
description: The room is located in an apartment with a garden, in a villa formed of three apartments, downtown. The apartment is composed of 3 bedrooms and an office. Two bedrooms are rented on nocarz, as well as the entire apartment. My place is close to restaurants, family-friendly activities, nightlife, public transportation. My place is suitable for couples, solo and business travelers, the kitchen is available for tenants.

name: Lit-canapé, rez-inférieur accès à la cuisine
description: In a super-souplex in an industrial district in Geneva city center. We provide a sofa bed for two people, in the sleeping area of the loft (closed by curtains), with access to the shower room (shared), and common areas  (kitchen,  laundry room, etc.). It's not a hotel, you'll be staying with people who live there all year and are happy to leave their place for a few days to welcome guests. Please respect their belongings.

name: Charming - Perfect Location
description:
Dear future guest,

Welcome to our charming apartment in the heart of Geneva!

Nestled in trendy Eaux-Vives neighborhood, it's an ideal location between the lake, parks and the bustling main avenue. Surrounded by shops, restaurants and attractions, our flat promises an unforgettable stay. Best of all, it's all within walking distance!

We look forward to hosting you and ensuring your stay is both comfortable and memorable.


See you soon!

Your Host

name: Spacious & Cosy King Room - Geneva Heart '3
description:
Friendly & welcoming, boutique Hotel in Geneva's heart.
The room is equipped with cable TV, high-speed internet, A/C, radio, alarm clock and direct dial telephone.
Ideally located in the city centre, the hotel is close to the lake, the Old Town, the main business and shopping centres.
Quick access to all parts of the city with public transport, free for our guests throughout their stay.
The rooms were refurbished in October 2016.

name: In a charming 1900 built house, downtown Geneva
description:
Your pied-à-terre in Geneva, in a charming 1900 house in town: beautiful apartment with all amenities, 2 large bedrooms, with 2 bathrooms. Spacious living room and fully equipped open plan kitchen. Place de parc.

Your own place in downtown Geneva, in a charming 1900 built house: beautiful flat with all commodities, 2 large rooms, with 2 attending bathrooms, a spacious living room with fully equipped open kitchen. Outside car park available.

name: Chez Ruby (logement entier - entire apartment )
description: Beautiful very cozy apartment located in the center of Geneva. Quiet, pretty and very clean, the room overlooks a private courtyard. Very friendly atmosphere of the neighborhood where all Geneva is accessible by public transport: tram,  bus.

name: Entire apartment in the city center
description: My place is in the center of Geneva. It is close to the station (5 minutes walk) and 15 minutes walk to the lake (5 minutes by bus). You can get here directly from the airport (bus number 10). The wifi is very fast and and with a cable tv. My place is good for business travelers as well as tourists.

name: Central 70 m2 - 1 bedroom flat near Plainpalais
description:
My apartment is sunny, spacious and very cosy. You will feel at home :)
It has one big living room with tv and dining corner, one bedroom with a big double bed and wardrobe, a bathroom with bathtub and a kitchen with all the necessary to cook!

WIFI, basic products, linens and towels, hairdryer, iron and ironing table furnished.

Many very nice restaurants, cafes and many shops, very lively! My flat is a few mins walk to public transport to the train station, city center, the UN, CERN...

name: Charming and stylish flat in the heart of Geneva
description: A beautiful one-bedroom apartment in the Eaux Vives neighborhood. Just two blocks from the charming Park la Grange, and the magical waterfront and J'et D'eau. Plenty of great cafes and restaurants within walking distance, and you are within a 4 minute walk of 3 bus stops serving the city. There are several busses that go between this area and the Cornavin bus station in less than 15 minutes. The building is secure, and in a beautiful neighborhood.

name: Loft 130m2 in courtyard floor of souplex, billiard
description: It is a loft, on the lower ground floor (only accessible by elevator), the large room has a billiards table, a kitchen/s-a-m, a sofa bed for 2 people (can be closed by thick noise curtains).Two of three single beds can be added.In the adjoining room with a large double bed (160), one to two single beds can be added, as well as a crib for baby. Everything is served by a shower room with double sink and toilet. This is not a hotel.

name: A charming private room centrally located
description: Charming room located within a 2 minute walk to lake Geneva, 10mins to the city centre, 15 minute walk to Nations and WTO.  Apartment is positioned 2 minute walk to Place de la Navigation and provides easy access to trams.  Within close proximity to Cornavin station and is 20 minutes door to door to the airport and palexpo.  Culturally diverse area with a lively atmosphere and a wide variety of restaurants, bars and cafes all within walking distance.

name: 2.4 - Très grand studio rénové proche du centre
description: Large studio renovated in 2024, bright and quiet very nicely furnished close to the city center. The apartment is located in the very sought-after quiet area of Florissant while being close to the city center. A fitness is a 5-minute walk away and many jogging routes off the high-traffic roads are directly accessible.

name: Porte de Genève
description:
Hello,

Glad to host you in our apartment. It includes a bedroom with a double bed, shower bathroom, toilet, equipped kitchen, living room with sofa bed, dining table, TV and WiFi.
The accommodation is located on the border with Switzerland (Moillesulaz customs less than1 min walk away), very well served by public transport:
tram 12, 17, multiple bus lines.
Restaurants and shops nearby.
Ideal for visiting or working in Geneva.

Enjoy your stay!

name: Chambre privée - Private room
description: The room overlooks a quiet garden and the very cozy apartment located in the center of Geneva. Quiet, pretty and very clean, the room overlooks a private courtyard. Completely disinfected and neat for full availability. Very friendly atmosphere of the neighborhood where all Geneva is accessible by public transport, tram, bus, taxi... shops nearby. Museums, cinema, restaurants, theaters are 15 mins walk from the residence.

name: Lovely apartment in the heart of  Eaux Vives
description:
Nice sunny apartment, with a living room looking forward to welcome you!

The apartment is very well situated, a 10 mins walk from the Jet d’eau and 10 mins from the main shopping street. There is a tram stop 1 min away that helps even smoother connection with the city center

The sofa is transformable in bed and it’s comfortable and welcoming

name: Cosy apartment near city center
description:
Welcome!
This is a apartment with: a living-dining room, kitchen, a bedroom with a queen size bed, a little bathroom and a kid’s bedroom.
The apartment is in the city center and next to tram, bus, hospital, restaurants.
This appartment is our home so be aware that there will be personal items, decorations etc.

name: Rent beautiful studio, 40m2, very quiet
description: The Appartment as a living room/bedroom, a separated kitchen and a separated bathroom. In the living room there is a king bed and a sofa. On the balcony you will be able to have a breakfast and at the same time enjoy the nice view. Next to Jonction, you can go for a little walk around the area, it is very quiet and peaceful.There is a bus stop at 4 min walking, direct to the train station. In the Appartment we don’t allowed party because it’s a Family building. Thank you for your understanding.

name: Suite au coeur de Genève
description: Suite in the heart of Geneva.

name: Cozy & bright private room at city center, near UN
description: Cozy & bright private room with direct access to a terrace with mountain view awaits you in Geneva! It is conveniently located  close to most UN offices, Gare Cornavin & airport. Tram 14/18 & Bus 3/5/8/11 are within 5-10 min. walk, providing easy access to shopping centers (Balexert, Blandonnet, Jumbo, Ikea) and Geneva Lake, Old Town and Botanical Garden. Supermarkets (Coop, Denner, Aldi), bars, café & restaurants are within short walking distance. The place is ideal for short & long term stay.

name: Apartment 2 bedrooms - Geneva city center
description:
This comfortable and bright apartment of 4 rooms is as follows: 1 entry hall, 1 bedroom with double bed, 1 bedroom with two simple beds, 1 bathroom with WC, 1 living room, 1 equipped kitchen.

It is close to the city center, International Organisations, the train station and very close to public transports, shops and restaurants.

name: Grande Chambre en plein centre ville Genève
description:
I offer a spacious room in my small apartment located in downtown Geneva. Located a 7-minute walk from the train station, a few meters away, you can already see the lake as well as the famous water jet. Everything is close by bars, restaurants and activities. We are in the city center so there can be animation at night especially on weekends
(bar below) but nothing prevents sleeping.
Please note that we do not offer a transportation card.

name: Nice Flat in City Center - Close to train station
description:
Charming flat in the heart of Geneva! Very sunny with a nice view on the Mont Blanc and the top of our famous "Jet d'eau". Just 2 minutes from the train station and 5 minutes from the bus station. The bus at the Gare routière will bring you to all the famous mountains and tourist attraction like Chamonix !
The flat is the perfect place if you want to go sightseeing during the day and enjoy the buoyant nightlife in Geneva in the evening!
I am sure you will love it! :) :)

name: House right in the lake
description:
Unique house by its proximity to the lake, cosy and well equipped, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, garden, with private and direct access to the lake in a very charming property. Ideal for 2 couples.
40 minutes to the station by bus, add 7 minutes to reach by train the station from the airport.
WIFI, basic products, linens and towels, hairdryer, iron and ironing table furnished.

name: Appartement cosy en plein centre de Genève
description: Comfortable accommodation, fully equipped, just 5 minutes walk from the Cornavin train station.

name: Cozy studio in the centre of Geneva!
description:
Nice studio apartment in a very quite area & building and very close to the main train station and 10 mins walk to the lake!
2 pieces luminous apartment on the 2nd floor, very quiet during day and night, neighbors are friendly and well mannered. Spacious kitchen with fridge, oven, microwave and a big table to sit 4 people. The room is fully equipped with a big double bed, a big L shape canape, a big flat screen TV with access to many Swiss & International channels. Wifi is free and fast.

name: Design & cosy flat in the center
description:
Bright 3 room apartment, on the fourth floor with balcony, right in the center of Geneva.

Design and cozy design, with parquet flooring, moldings, vintage furniture, art and green plants.

The apartment is located in a residential, quiet and close to everything. Shops 2 minutes walk, tram stop 3 minutes, train station 10 minutes walk.

Bike and bike storage available.
Washing machine, laundry washer and dishwasher.
Wi-Fi.

name: Central two-bedroom apartment
description: Central and spacious apartment with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, kitchen, and living room with a separate dining area. The apartment is located in one of Geneva's most prestigious and central districts (Eaux-Vives). The apartment is 3 minutes walk away from the lake, 5 minutes from the shopping area and less than 10 minutes from the old town. You can enjoy a plenty of  bars, restaurants, shops, galleries, theaters and cinemas in the neighborhood.

name: Appartement 2 chambres - Servette - Genève
description: This cozy and bright apartment is located close to the International Organisations, the city centre and the train station, very close to public transport, shops and restaurants

name: Panoramic View Penthouse Near Jet D'eau
description: The penthouse opens up on a very large terrace that will offer you a 360 degree view of the city, from the Old Town Cathedral to the UN or the iconic Jet d'Eau, you have an exceptional view you can't get tired of. One of the rooms also offer a view on the Jet d'Eau laying in bed- what better view to wake up to in Geneva?

name: Magnifique appartement tout équipé au centre.
description:
Stay in the heart of the city.
The apartment is located in Geneva, this one is designed to accommodate up to 4 guests with fully equipped kitchen for a great stay.
1.8km from the United Nations Office, 2.3km from the water jet and 3.2km from St. Peter's Cathedral

name: Bel appartement en plein cœur de Genève
Appartement 2,5 pièces + terrasse à Carouge
description: Very bright and cozy apartment with large terrace. Located in Carouge, one of the most pleasant areas in Geneva.

name: Chambre du centre-ville. Cerca del centro
description: comfortably chambre.

name: Charming, Balcony, UNO, WTO
description:
Charming apartment, close to UNO and international organizations, lake and central station (Cornavin), comfortable and very well equipped, 1 bedroom, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom, balcony, located in front of the Perle du Lac.
9 minutes from the station, add 7 minutes if you arrive at the train station by train from the airport.
Wifi, basic products, bed linens and towels, hairdryer, board and iron are provided.

name: Interior Designer's Dream
description:
In a building from the late 1800s in Petit-Saconnex in the heart of Geneva, steps from the Palais des nations. A 20 minute walk to the lake. A 10 min bus ride to the airport or train station.

Designer apartment featured in Architectural magazines. The kitchen was designed by a former chef, and co-founder of Cuisine Lab. Art, furniture and furnishings have been collected during her global travels.

Above the famous Cafe Du Soleil (NYTimes 36hrs) and around the corner from all amenities.

name: 1 bedroom apartment Plainpalais (4.1.2G/RG)
description: Located in the Carouge area, close to Plainpalais, this comfortable apartment of is as follows: 1 bedroom with queen size bed & couch, 1 bathroom, 1 kitchen , 1 separate WC , 1 entry hall.

name: Functional,Modern,Simple K
description: Simple ,Modern,Functional

name: Charming and spacious apartment
description: Charming, spacious, renovated, "old France" style and very quite apartment. You will find all the necessary equipment and even Netflix! Close by the city center and the public transport. Bus station at 2 min to the airport, train station and congress center.

name: Room in cosy duplex in central Geneva -Ladies only
description:
Room in modern, cosy duplex in central Geneva!

- duplex apartment, guest toilette, large living and dining room plus a modern fully equipped American kitchen (freezer, oven, fridge, dish washer, etc.) , 3 bedrooms (one will be yours), 2 bathrooms (one with shower, one with bathtub)
- 2 washing machines and 2 dryers in the basement (for very little money per use)
- 1 storage room in the basement

name: Spacious and Bright, Carouge
description:
Spacious apartment (loft style), 15 min to lake, 20 min to station and less than 30 min to airport, comfortable and very well equipped, 1 bedroom, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom, in a very quiet neighbourhood.
Wifi, basic products, bed linens and towels, hairdryer, board and iron are provided.

name: Room in cozy modern duplex Appartment
description: Room in modern, cosy duplex in central Geneva!

name: Cool & Central 2 bedroom in heart of Eaux-vives
description:
A beautiful two bedroom, one bathroom apartment set on the 4th floor with a lift. Great living space with a balcony on Eaux-vives. 2 bedrooms, with a queen bed in each room.
The apartment is 1 min from the bus stop, and supermarkets, and 4 min from the lake.
The apartment features super fast 10Gbit/s fiber optic internet, 300+ cable tv channels, in multiple languages, a new fully equipped kitchen, with all necessities for cooking, and much more. Free advice and support, at any time! :-)

name: Joli appartement en plein centre ville
description: Comfortable and comfortable apartment near shops, monuments, museums and Lake Geneva

name: APPARTEMENT IDEAL POUR SALON DE L'AUTO GENEVE 2019
description:
Nice 55 m2 apartment, 5 minutes walk from a Hyper Leclerc in France (border 5 minutes walk). Cozy, quiet place, 7 minutes walk from tram 14 to Geneva and 15 minutes from the airport
Super convenient to l 'Auto lounge.(Palexpo is a 7-minute drive away)

name: Appartement cosy centre de Genève
description:
Apparently 80m2 very bright and sunny with 2 large bedrooms
Balcony, open kitchen, bathroom, and separate toilet.

name: Nice top floor loft / apartment in Geneva center
description:
Warm and cosy loft/appartement on the top floor of a building ideally located at two tram stops from the train station and 10 minutes from the airport.
The flat is distributed with a kitchen open on the living room and dining room.
A separate bedroom with a queen size bed, and a bathroom including a washing machine.
The apartment is very bright and has a terrace with no vis à vis

name: Beautiful, cozy, quiet and central 2bd apartment.
Cosy Appart. 50 m2
description:
Large living room, dining room open to kitchen. Bedroom with very comfortable double bed and balcony access (quiet). Central location: 12 minutes from Cornavin train station (with Tram 15 & 18), 15 minutes from the city center and left bank (Tram 12 & 17). Department of food store 50 meters away. 5 min walk from Carouge and Plainpalais neighborhoods.
Big living room open on the kitchen. Central localisation (12 min to Main station) with trams and Bus. Grocery store, Very confortable bed.

name: Charming spacious room in excellent location
description:

You are in the mountains (Haute-Savoie) in an hour by car, and can swim in Lake Geneva or in the Rhone. The train brings you to city center, Lausanne/Lavaux or even to Annecy (1h20 by train). Many free museums and events in Geneva!
