Bus stop for the train station or airport: 2 minutes

name: EXECUTIVE 1 BEDROOM SUITE next to UN,ITU, AIRPORT
description:
Excited to host you at my “feel like you are home” apartment.
Small but cosy place includes 1 bedroom, living room that can be easily used as 2nd bedroom,resting area or even a home office, kitchen and bathroom.
Feel Home has everything that a guest might need while staying atnocarz.
Interesting features of Feel Home are intelligent lightening system and Apple TV with Netflix access.
Good and quite location next to the airport andFriendly neighborhood. Green area with few restaurants close by

name: Quite Private Room
description: Private room in a full furnished apartment in a very quite area close to Geneva center.

name: Chambre confortable à 15 min du centre de Genève!
description:
Hello,

A comfortable accommodation at the gates of Geneva, and in front of the tram stop 12. See you at the city center or the Lake in just 15 minutes! I will be delighted to host you!

name: Private Ensuite Bedroom Geneva, Switzerland
description: Private Ensuite Bedroom available for short term rent within a Swiss Villa located 2 minutes walk to Lac Leman in Geneva, 20 minutes by public transport from Geneva City centre.

name: Bedroom, Airport, CERN, La Tour Hospital
description:
Nice bedroom with direct access to a patio, ground floor, very quiet, 20 min to city center by tram, 22 min to central station (Cornavin) and 22 min to airport.
WIFI, basic products, linens and towels, hairdryer, iron and ironing table furnished.

name: charment et cosy petit appartement 3 pièces
Appartement  3 chambres au centre de Genève.
description: Very nice 3 bedrooms apartment, large living room, kitchen, 2 bathrooms and separate toilet. It is located in the city center, 5 minutes from the lake and parks. It offers all useful and necessary amenities.

name: UNO, Lake, City Center
description:
1st floor studio in Geneva center, 36 sq. meters, 50 meters from lake in Pâquis area. The studio is bright thanks to its double window with lake view. There's a bed (160x200) and a sofa bed in the living room area. The kitchen is modern and well equipped, there's a washer in the bathroom (with bath).
10 minutes walk from station, add 7 minutes by train if you come from airport.
WIFI, basic products, linens and towels, hairdryer, iron and ironing table furnished.

name: Well Located Studio on the right bank of Geneva
description: This apartment features quality fixtures and furniture. The separated but open kitchen makes it convenient and comfortable. Enjoy the calmness of this street even though you are very well connected to the train station and the international organisations.

name: Private rooms in a family house with garden.
description:
I share a two floor house with a garden located inside the urban area of Geneva next to french border.
I rent a spacious private room in the attic of the 2nd floor with double bed and private bathroom. Two extra rooms and one private bathroom at the 1st floor, one room with a mezzanine bed for a child until 10 years old and a sofa bed and another room with a safe crib and two single floor mastresses. I also share a full equiped kitchen located at the ground floor.
Happy to welcome you !

name: Private room in a house with garden
description:
I share a two floor house with a garden located inside the urban area of Geneva next to french border.
I rent a spacious private room in the attic of the 2nd floor with double bed and private bathroom. I also share a full equiped kitchen located at the ground floor.
Happy to welcome you !

name: Cosy and bright flat next to the train station
description: Cosy flat with a lot of light in the city center of Geneva. The flat is very quiet and very well designed. Toilet and bathroom separated. Kitchen table for 2 persons and the bed is a king size bed but with separated mattress.

name: Perle rare au coeur de Genève à disposition.
description:
Individual accommodation. No smoking. Separate entrance hall, lak furniture, modern decoration, soundproofed windows, very bright.
Lake view from the window. Privileged location.
50 m from the Cornavin train station.
7 mins from the airport by train.

name: Douce nuit
description: Modern studio located in the heart of Geneva with white water and served by the tram and bus.

name: La Chambre d’ami•e•s ~ The Guests room
description:
New and very bright apartment on the ground floor of a wooded residence.
New and very bright apartment on the ground floor of a tree-lined residence.

name: Lakeside! Chic & Stylish boutique style guest room
description:
Stay with Hope in my hyper equipped and stylish guest bedroom. Spacious, bright, premium bedding and furnishings, sitting/lounge area, work-space area, multi-language TV, fibre optic WIFI.

Private bath room (sink and toilet) for guests. Separate fridge and use of washer & dryer.

Kitchen/dining area, bath & shower, and living room, all shared with me only, Hope.

Lake-side in EAUX-VIVES, city center. Well serviced by public transport. For female(s) or couple(s) only.
2 nights minimum

name: Lovely studio-cocoon in the heart of Geneva
description: Adorable bright studio (pleasant living space, kitchenette and bathroom) for rent in the heart of the Pâquis district in the heart of Geneva — 5 minutes from Cornavin train station and Lake Geneva.

name: Entirely renovated flat in the old town 831000
description: Stunning renovated apartment situated in the heart of the old town with views of the cathedral and Jet d'Eau.

name: Private room &terrace &free park near airport&city
description:
Hello i am renting my spare spacious room, with a double bed and private toilet.
The room has direct access to your own private terrace/garden with sunlounges and table. I am located 15mn from airport &15mn from city centre by bus (bus stop just in front).
Hope to meet You soon

Hi, I rent the 2nd bedroom of my apartment, spacious and bright, with double bed and private toilet. Access to a private terrace/garden with deckchairs.
15 minutes from the airport and 15 minutes from the city center. See you soon!

name: Spacious 1 BD Apartment in Pâquis
description: Comfortable 60 sqm2 fully equipped 1 Bedroom apartment, in Geneva city center just a few steps from the lake, the train station and shops. Perfect for an extended stay or business trip. It can comfortably welcome up to 4 Guests!

name: Appartement idéalement situé
description: Bright furnished 2 room apartment (36 m2) ideally located in the Plainpalais district, a stone's throw from the plainpalais plain plain and the Rhone. Close to all amenities and restaurants, in a quiet street.

name: Charmant appartement dans résidence sécurisée
description:
Charming fully renovated furnished 2 room apartment, in the center of Geneva (district of Delights).
Large room with double bed.
Luxury building with code.
10 minutes from the train station and the city center on foot.
Close to Palexpo at 15min.
Transportation at the foot of the building.
Airport 15min drive or bus Wifi available. Close to the UN

name: Luxurious 1 Room Apt near Jet d'Eau
description:
Beautiful and Luxurious 1 Bedroom apartment located in the heart of Eaux-Vives.
A stone's throw from the lake and the fountain. Direct access to all amenities such as public transport and shops.

name: Stunning modern, quiet & central 2BR apartment
description: Stunning 2BR modern flat. 80m2. Very luminous. 1 BR with double bed (160cm) and direct access to the bathroom (with italian shower), 1 BR with 2 single beds (can be put next to each other), 1 living room with sofa bed and modern fitted kitchen. 1 guest WC with wash machine, 1 big terrace (19m2). Private and closed parking space in the basement. Close to the airport (2km), to the city center and main railway station (2.5km), to the UNO (2.5km) and to Palexpo (2.5km).  Bus & tram stop 300m away.

name: 88's Home
description:
Apartment in the center of Geneva and close to Cornavin train station.
Very well served by public transport (bus 9, 7, 10, 11, 19) and located in the heart of the city. Close to shops and restaurants.

15 minutes walk from the United Nations
10 minutes walk from Geneva main station (Cornavin)
15 minutes walk from Geneva Lake

name: Cosy, central & quiet room in modern flat
description: Very luminous, cosy and quiet room in modern flat. Double bed (160cm) and direct access to the private bathroom (with italian shower). You will have access to our kitchen and large terrace (19m2).  Private and closed parking space in the basement. Close to the airport (2km), to the city center and main railway station (2.5km) and to the UNO (2.5km). Bus & tram stop 300m away.

name: Spacieux et lumineux appartement aux Charmilles
description: Furnished and equipped apartment,  located in the St-Jean district close to public transport and shops. Composed of an entrance and distribution hall, dining room lounge, open plan kitchen with bar, 2 bedrooms on inner courtyard, bathroom and separate toilet. Quiet, airy and bright.

name: ROOM Special, près gare
description: Private room, very central, close to train station, lake and public transport.

name: Bright studio 3 min from lake
description:
Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home.

3 min from the Geneva lake in the middle of vibrant Paquis, next to Bain de Paquis and many great restaurants.

30 seconds away from 3 supermarkets, and other services (pharmacy).

Super well connected: 30 seconds from buses 1&25, 5 minutes to tram 15 and 7 mins to buses 6&9.

Easy access to most UN agencies.

Sofa bed with a big dinner table, big TV, wifi, full kitchen and bathroom, including dishwasher and washing machine.

name: Industrial style in bright basement ★ Swiss Border
description:
► Apartment all bills included with free parking and free WiFi located on the border of France / Geneva, Switzerland.
The flat is furnished and has even bath towels & bed sheets, just bring your clothes and your grocery!

The location is very convenient for those who need to reach Geneva.
Easy access to the main International Organization headquarters:
UN, UNHCR, WHO, WTO, BIT, ICRC, Cern,...
***
The reservation is for the entire apartment, only for you and your guests (not sharing).
***

name: Studio in Pâquis
description:
Small, clean studio with a complete bathroom and kitchen in the very center of Geneva.

The studio is fully furbished and the location is totally convenient: it is almost at the same distance from Cornavin Geneva main station as it is from the lake (and notably the "Bains des Pâquis").

Lively area with plenty of restaurants nearby, at walking distance.

name: Renovated studio in heart of Paquis Geneva 593000
description: Newly renovated studio with seperate kitchen and balcony. Near to train station and lake

name: Adorable loft 150 m frm lake Gva
description: Adorable stylish mini penthouse. Very close (150 metres) to lake Gva and its beaches, pools, spas, bars, and restaurants. Walkable to city centre shops, transport and summer concerts in the park next door.  7 minutes walk to the train station that can take you straight to the Alpine resorts and  Lake Geneva riviera.  Breathtaking views of Geneva main landmarks - Jet d'Eau, Jura and the Saleve mountains. Farmers market 5 mins walk on  Wednesdays and Saturdays. All amenities in place.

name: centre ville de Genève
description:
Large private room for two people, decorated, very nice in a quiet accommodation.
Bureau +TV + Netflix is available + Wi-Fi

I am very happy to host you in the pleasant city of Genevoise.

name: Charming village house close to Geneva and Nyon
description: Charming old village house, entirely renovated, on three floors and a bathroom on each floor. Open kitchen.

name: Studio-Terrace in the heart of Geneva
description:
Studio Terrace on Top Floor in Central Geneva

Welcome to this sunny studio, just a 5-minute walk to the Jet d'Eau.

Amenities:
High-speed WiFi, comfortable bed, TV with Netflix, and essential kitchen appliances. Enjoy the sunny terrace perfect for relaxing.

Located in the heart of Geneva, with public transport 2 minutes away. Trendy restaurants, bars, and the Jet d'Eau and Gare des Eaux-Vives (train) are within a 5-minute walk. making travel easy. Perfect for both business and leisure stays.

name: Souplex, billard, ping-pong, jardin.
description: Fully furnished apartment, in a semi-building neighborhood, in the city center, close to all amenities. It is a 280  m2 flexible with pool table, on two levels. The owners are housed in the studio located on the garden level, they have their own outside access and do not intervene in the accommodation.A shopping center is 100 meters away, as is the bus stop6-10-19 which will drop you off in 10 minutes at the train station or  airport. A washing machine and a stretcher are available

name: Auberge de Charme à 20 minutes de Genève
description:
Located on the left bank of Geneva, the Auberge d 'Hermance welcomes you in a romantic and friendly setting in a 19th century mansion.

Le Léman is a few minutes walk away. By car, you can reach the beaches in 5 min. and Geneva in 20 minutes.

The restaurant is a true story of inventive and tasty cuisine.

Rooms are all customized and decorated in a warm, inviting style. The hotel has five suites, two standard bedrooms.

name: Studio Sublet in Geneva Center
description: Central one room separate kitchen aparment in lively neighborhood.

name: DIAMOND appartement au centre de Genève.
description:
charming apartment for rent for 1 to 4 people, in the heart of the center of GENEVA.

1 Bedroom, 1 independent kitchen, and separate shower room.
fully equipped kitchen, oven, microwave, coffee machine, table for 6 people.

1 bedroom, 2 similar single beds for couples, 2 sofa beds, TV , wifi, wardrobe for storage. Everything prepared for your baby, baby chair and baby crib also available. Free private parking (200mt) from 5pm to 8am, just validate a ticket

name: Eaux-Vives
description:
Cozy simple studio, located in a fashionable and lovely part of Geneva - Eaux-Vives, close to trendy shopping and business district (5 mins by tram or 10 min walk), down-town (5 mins by tram / 10 mins walk) and Airport (30 mins by public transport).
The studio has all you need for a nice getaway. In the direct neighborhood, you'll find cafés, restaurants & bars, or just simply cook in your little kitchen (supermarkets Migros, Coop and Denner are 2 mins walk).
NO Smoking apartment. NO WI-FI.

name: Beautiful apartment at Gare Cornavin
description: I am renting my apartment when I am not in Geneva. One bedroom, fully equipped brand new kitchen, living room and bathroom all recently renovated and nicely furnished. The apartment is on the fifth floor with a nice view. Excellent location: 200m south of the Geneva main railway station Cornavin and five minutes walk from the lake.

name: Appart moderne , proche gare, aéroport , Nations
description:
Charming new apartment, carefully furnished, beautiful unobstructed view of the snowy Jura in winter.
Quiet area with all shops: bakery, food, fitness in the building...
Bus on site , every 10 minutes .
1 bedroom with a large bed, very comfortable , (new bedding).
In the living room 2 sofa beds
Bathroom , tub, towels available, shampoo , soap etc.
Fully equipped kitchen
7 minutes from the train station and 10 minutes from the lake .
10 minutes from international organizations ( UN,UNHCR, etc.)

name: By the lake, park, train/bus stops; self check-in
description: This is a comfortable, cozy flat, a real home.  It can be hard to find a place to stay in Geneva, so we open it to guests sometimes when the host is away travelling. This way we can, perhaps, help someone out. Since this is a home, please do say a little bit about yourself when enquiring about a booking. While this is usually for a single stay, we can also accommodate a couple’s stay, and message us if you have additional persons.

name: Amazing Villa - WHO, WIPO ILO - Palexpo
description:
Amazing villa, very cosy and particularly well equipped, 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms, located in a beautiful family property.
From airport (3 stops) or from the station (5 stops) bus lines are direct to reach home, 10 minutes to airport, 20 minutes to station and 10 minutes to Palexpo door to door.
WHO, WIPO and ILO are at 15 min by walk.
WIFI, basic products, linens and towels, hairdryer, iron and ironing table furnished.

name: Geneva Center Villa Garden & Parking
description:
You will enjoy a villa in a green setting in downtown Geneva.

Great for guests, family, group of up to 6 people. Baby cot available.

You will be close to shops, public transport and parks.

The lake and beach are 6 min away.

You can hike and ski in both the Jura and the Alps. Nearest station 16 Km.

name: Bienvenue à Genève !
description: Apartment located in a cozy property in one of the best gin residential neighborhoods with hospital parks and with the new CEVA parking lot 5 minutes away and with public transport TPG next door.

name: Superbe appartement de caractère
description: very nice apartment in building of the 1930s with moldings on the ceiling, period parquet and all the comforts of today (Wifi, TV, washing machine and dryer, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. Charming little balcony on the street side to relax after a day of work. Very quiet street (30 km/h zone) near the shops, restaurants and bars of the neighborhood, without suffering the nuisances.

name: Luxurious flat front of lake
description: This family home is close to all sites and amenities , with lake views directly from the apartment . The apartment is just off the hotel President Wilson . Luxury  and spacious apartment of 140m2

name: Bright & Cozy Studio + Balcony
description: Bright and cozy studio,  15 min. walk from the city center amazing view & balcony. Perfect for couples. Decorated and curated with love.

name: Solar Floatinn, bateau sans permis, zéro émission
description:
Electro-solar boat, zero emissions with a double cabin, small kitchen, shower-WC, terrace with grill and swimming platform.
Possible driving without a permit, moored at the port of Les Eaux-Vives in Geneva

Max Cruise 12 Guests
From 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. or 1:30 - 5:30 p.m. = CHF 300
9am-5pm day = CHF 490
Weekend with two nights 2 to 5 people = CHF 990

name: Très bel app. -  plein centre - 50m2 - 1  chambre
description:
Very central, very close to the train station, to the lake and to public transportation. Big flat (80m2 in total) with nice wooden floor, and a modern fully equiped kitchen. Very nice private bathroom with shower, toilets, and washing machine.

Your part will be 50m2 big, including a 14m2 bathroom. I will be in my bedroom with my own bathroom.

Arrival only on Friday night before 8:30pm.

name: UN area & near Centre - Large Room with Balcony
description:
Central location ideal for United Nations, international organizations, CICG, several within walking distance. 5 minutes to UN office. The train station is 10 minute walk and airport 20 minutes by public transport.
Easy to explore the city to Lake Geneva, neighbouring parks, centre of the city, old town etc. on foot or by public transport just a few steps away. Many restaurants in the neighbourhood. Supermarkets, mall, banks just nearby.
Ideal for business travellers, solo adventurers

name: 1 bedroom with bathroom in shared apartment (2)A
description:
For rent 1 bedroom with 1 double bed and 1 private bathroom in an apartment where the owner stays. Suitable for either 1 to 2 people wanting to stay in Geneva. Very well located in a quiet area, a few minutes' walk from the bus stop (in 10 minutes downtown), a supermarket is also nearby.
Guests will only have access to the kitchen for breakfast until 10:30 am.

name: Chambre au centre de Genève
description:
Bedroom in the center of Geneva in 5 room apartment.

Large bathroom with separate toilet.
Access to kitchen and utensils

Washer and dryer in the building.

Transportation is nearby (less than 5 min walk) and the city center is less than 15 min walk and 5 min by bus.

Ideal for visiting Geneva.

name: Bedroom Geneva airport & UN & Palexpo Center & WHO
description:
My 80m2 flat is ideally located, near the airport (8 mins with bus) and near the United Nations Org. (7 mins bus).

The flat is spacious and you will have full access to bathroom, and kitchen where you can cook your own meal, to the living-room where we can chat or you can watch international TV channels.
I love interactions with my guests and I will welcome you personally.

name: Spacious, sunny 1-BR Apt close to UN w/ Balcony
description: A very spacious, window surrounded, light drenched apartment with separate toilet and bathroom, laundry room (limited to 2 x/weekly. 10 minutes walking distance of the United Nations and international organizations. The main train station is 7 minutes walking distance away.  Great public transportation within 2 min walk.  Grocery stores,  sports bars are all close by.  Additionally, the Geneva Lake can be reached by bus, rented bikes (Geneve Roule), available at the train station), or by foot.

name: Cadre magnifique avec terrasse et jardin
description: Semi-detached villa on 3 floors with garden, terraces, in a quiet area, ideal for CERN visitors.

name: Chambre dans appt de 130m2 avec 85m2 de terrasse
description: Very nice room in a magnificent modern 130 m2 apartment with 85 m2 terrace. Close to all amenities with parking space, WiFi,  kitchen available, private fridge and private bathroom.

name: Urban Oasis: Steps to City Center
description: Located in a peaceful neighbourhood close to the city center and 10 minutes away by walk from the lake; This apartment is a little piece of heaven! Best choice for business travellers or solo adventurers who can also reach the airport/Palexpo by taking the bus located 100 m away from the apartment or use the CEVA train station located 400 m away from the apartment.

name: Beautiful riverside apartment
description: Warm apartment with beautiful views of the Rhone  in the heart of Geneva in the junction district.

name: Vue panoramique sur le lac Leman
description:
bedroom with a spectacular view of
lac Leman Parking privé
Great location with easy access to Geneva city and airport .
le LemanExpress train station 5 minutes away.

name: Cosy home on top floor, very central & quiet, 58m2
description:
Very nice and quiet apartment, with cosy furniture and decoration. Free wifi.

Full of light on the top-floor: enjoy a cup of coffee in the loggia with a Geneva 270° view!

Very central and well located: 7 minutes from the very center and Cornavin Railway Station (trams 14 & 18). 10 minutes from the airport/Palexpo by bus. Very close from UN. Easy to park a car around.

Bakery, pharmacy, grocery shop (24/24) and “balexert" shopping center within walking distance. The area is quiet and very safe.

name: Soleil couchant pour jeunes femmes uniquement
description: Large bright and sunny room like the entire accommodation  also bright, quiet, well furnished with all amenities. All international organizations nearby either on foot or by bus, also going to the city center, shops, airport and train station quite close to the accommodation.  Only  for interns or students conducting conferences with International Organizations, UN, etc... and only for women.

name: Chambre "Léman" chez Isabelle et Gérard
description: The room "Léman" is located in our accommodation in Plan-Les-Ouates, ideally located, in a quiet area and 20 minutes by tram from the center of Geneva. The bedroom overlooks a small private garden with views of the Salève. The airport and train station are accessible by public transport nearby. You have access to shower room shower room. Come and enjoy Geneva, between mountain and lake.

name: Chambre proche du lac
description:
5 minutes from the lake and 7 minutes from Geneva Central Station.
Very accessible by car and public transport.

The bedroom is comfortable, the apartment has everything you need to live, nice balcony with a sofa and a table to eat at sunset.

The bed is a futon on wooden slats. There is a second 1-seater futon that can turn into a chair if not needed.

name: Bel Appartement dans quartier résidentiel
description:
Very nice apartment, tastefully decorated.
1 beautiful living room overlooking a large fully designed terrace. 1 bathroom and 1 shower room, 2 beautiful bedrooms. Possibility of having parking in the basement if necessary.
Quiet and wooded residential environment, enjoying a large park nearby.
also 5 minutes to Lake Geneva

name: Cosy Studio in Geneva Old Town
description:
Nice and comfortable one bedroom apartment, recently refurbished, in the heart of Geneva Old Town, next to main City square, to the Cathedral, to the main shopping street and to the lake.

Living room: one sofa bed in living room, Bluetooth speaker

Kitchenette: includes combined microwave/hoven, induction hub, nespresso cafe machine, washing-dryer machine

Shower room: shower, toilet, sink with large mirror cabinet, hairdryer


5th Floor no lift.

name: Chambre décorée avec simplicité
description:
neighborhood near airport ,PALEXPO ,ARENA , who, UN , BIT
a bedroom in a 3rd floor apartment WITHOUT ELEVATOR .
(specified that the host only speaks French )

name: Executive Studio - Geneva Heart
description:
New studio, clean, very quite and beautiful. Full equipped, wi-fi etc... In heart of Geneva. Rhone river in 50 meters.
Big grocery store just in 50 meters from apart.
Huge transport carrefour in 100 meters. Easy access to airport (20 min), train station (7 min). Perfect studio with all you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Cosy & peaceful apartment in the centre of Geneva
description:
Quiet, cosy and coconing apartment able to welcome until 5 persons and ideally located in the centre of Geneva.
Enjoy of this super clean, calm and equipped apartment.

name: Beautiful apt - 10 min walk to UN & train station
description:
Located in central Geneva, this lovely apartment is perfect for exploring the city and surrounding areas or using as a base for meetings. Come home at the end of the day and put your feet up on the sofa or sit out on the balcony.

The apartment is conveniently located a 10 minute walk from the train station and the UN and accessible by bus from the airport.

name: Chambre très calme dans appartement proche Nations
description:
Very spacious, bright apartment with large warm living rooms.
The guest room is very quiet, cozy with a very good bed, and a wall closet to store your belongings and everything you need.
The apartment is ultra central, 7min walk from the train station, the Place des Nations and international organizations and 3min from the lake and a park.
Ideal for a transient person who wants comfort, being central while staying in a bright, spacious and friendly apartment

name: Nice one bedroom flat in Geneve Meyrin
description:
I propose you my one bedroom apartment with separate kitchen on the 7th, last floor in Meyrin. At 15 min by tram from the center of Geneva, this area will charm you with his many green spaces, fields nearby for lovers of jogging and nature. The airport is really close and also Cern. Ideal for 3 persons with a double bed in the room and a bed for a child or an adult. In the living room there is also a sofa bed.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

name: 3 Chambres, Calme, Jardin
description:
Comfortable and well-equipped apartment, 3 bedrooms, with garden located on the banks of the Rhone.
Public transportation to the train station (21 minutes), and the airport (18 minutes).
Wi-Fi, basic amenities, bed linen and towels, hair dryer, board and iron are provided.

name: Moderne, Calme et Lumineux
description:
Nice and comfy apartment, 5th floor with lift, quiet and luminous.
25 minutes to Cornavin station (main station), 27 minutes to Cointrin airport (main airport).
WIFI, basic products, linens and towels, hairdryer, iron and ironing table furnished.

name: Big apartment with balcony next to UN
description:
Big and bright apartment very close to the UN offices in Geneva. 5 mins from Gare Cornavin train station.

Bus no5 will take you to/from the airport within 15 mins.

name: 3 BDR - UNO, WHO, ILO
description:
Comfy apartment and well equipped, 3 bedrooms with garden, terrace and free parking, in a quiet and very calm neighborhood.
Public transportation direct from Cornavin station (18 minutes), and from Cointrin airport (13 minutes), 20 minutes by walk from Place des Nations.
Wifi, basic products, bed linens and towels, hairdryer, board and iron are provided.

name: Maison, Piscine, 3 Chambres
description:
Comfortable, bright and well equipped house, 3 bedrooms, with swimming pool, garden, terrace, cockroach and free parking, in a quiet and wooded environment.
Public transport from the station (25 minutes), add 7 minutes if you have arrived at the station from the airport.
WiFi, essentials, linens and towels, hair dryer, ironing board and iron are provided.

name: Petit appartement cosy au centre de Carouge
description:
The apartment is located in the heart of Carouge 1mn walk from the tram stop that connects all of Geneva in 15mn.
Several restaurants and supermarkets are within a 5-minute walk

name: Nice Studio + Balcony - Eaux-Vives
description: Nice studio apartment, recently renovated and perfect for single travelers or couples. Located in the Montchoisy area, between Eaux Vives and Parc de la Grange, one of the nicest neighborhoods in Geneva. Five minutes walk to the Jet d'Eau fountain and fifteen minutes to downtown.

name: Spacious and bright apartment in Geneva center
description:
The apartment is fully equipped and well situated in Geneva Center on the right bank.
It’s close to the main streets but also in a private yard, so it’s very quiet.
Convenient with public transportation to the central train station (5 mins), UN (10 mins), airport (10-15 mins), and Geneva old town (10 mins).
The apartment has a private bedroom for adults and a large living room with a sofa bed. An infant bed is also available.
Several parks are within walking distance (less than 5 mins).

name: Train Station, 5th floor, 1 bedroom
description:
Apartment located on the 5th floor, calm, 4 minutes from the train station by walk, you need 7 more minutes if you arrive at the train station from the airport.
Wi-Fi, basic products, linens and towels, hair dryer, ironing board and iron are provided.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Double room for family friendly business traveller
description:
We are a family with 4 kids 12 to 21. Breakfast is included and we are happy to practice English, German, Spanish and French with you.
If you come by car you can leave it parked at no cost in a very quite street with access from our garden.
Our house is 3km from the city center and 8 minutes walk from a bus stop that takes you to the lake in 10m, train station in 20m and international organizations, airport.

name: Big room Chalet Grand-Saconnex Palexpo ONU Airport
description:
Large private room for 1 to 4 people in Duplex of 160 m2 in house (Old Farm) On foot: Palexpo 5 min, Airport 15 min.
By Bus:15min from Downtown and Lake
Close to the United Nations and International Organizations
Close to all amenities
Terrace with views and sunset of the Jura
Bus (2min)
Price included for 2 people, extra for 3 and 4

The house is not fully rented.

name: Medium room N-York Grand-Saconnex Palexpo Aéroport
description:
Private room for 1 or 2 people in Grand duplex 160 m2 in house (Old Farm in the center of Grand-Saconnex) 5 min from Palexpo, 15min walk from the Airport, 15min by bus from Downtown.
Near the United Nations, Palexpo and Arena
Close to all commodities and international organizations
Very nice view of the Jura
Bus (2min)
The house is not fully rented.

name: Small room DREAM Grand-Saconnex Palexpo Aéroport
description:

Perfect studio low-budget in Charmilles - 052000

The apartment is comfortably furnished and equipped with everything you need for a short or longer stay. The kitchen is very well equipped (Coffee machine with Nespresso capsules, Mixer, oven, 4 hotplates and pans, toaster, etc.) and the cosy terrace invites you to relax with a lounge and a dining table.

name: 70 Chambre B Cornavin Gare
description: Discover our comfortable room equipped with a cozy bed, a desk and a great internet connection to cater for your every need. Also take advantage of self check-in for flexibility. Relax in our comfortable bedroom and enjoy modern, well-equipped bathroom. Whether you are in town for business or vacation, our room is the perfect place to rest and unwind.

name: Room with private bathroom in a beautiful house!
description: Nice house in a beautiful neighborhood close to the city center and with great public transport connections. Parking at extra cost. This accommodation is destined for people wanting to stay a long time in Geneva (students, young professionals, etc.). Food-store and park less than 5 minutes away. Desk in the room, kitchen, living room and garden in common. Bathroom is private for this special room. Free internet with WIFI! Non-smoking house!

name: Bright Large Room for UN and near the City

Bright and large room in a spacious apartment and just 5 minutes from the UN offices.
There is excellent transport connections to many parts of the city with the airport 20 minutes away and just 5 minutes to the main train station.
Everything you need is within walking distance including restaurants, supermarkets, convenience stores, bank/ATMs and several relaxing parks in the neighbourhood. The city centre, old town, Lake Geneva just nearby

name: Apartment in Paquis-Sécheron (close to lake & UN)

My husband and I actually live here. We are renting it occasionally while on vacation.

Its a beautiful &charming 70qm room apartment with wooden floors/colorful tiles &high ceilings.
2 rooms, kitchen, bath & separate WC can be used. no TV.

The area is very beautiful, super close to the lake. High trafficked Rue de Lausanne is separating the building from Parc & Lake (<1min)

The bedroom is small, but cosy. We are on the fourth floor (thankfully, with an elevator in the building).

description: This is a charming house with magnificent views of the Salève. Bathroom to share with only one prersonne.  The three tenants are super nice young professionals and speak French/English, Portuguese and manage in Spanish.

name: Deluxe 1 Bedroom apartment in Champel 240000
description: Enjoy living in an apartment with brand new furnitures in the hear of Geneva, at the top end of the plateau de Champel you will reach Rive and Plainpalais in a few minutes by foot.

name: Studio a Thônex situé en face du tram
Appartement in the heart of Geneva
description: One bedroom apartment in Geneva city center. 5 min away from the lake and train station. 30 min away from airport. It's a sunny and very cozy apartment. There is NO WI-FI. No elevator. For anything else just ask me. Enjoy your stay

name: Studio Idéalement situé à 100m de la douane !
description:
Ideally located 100 meters from Swiss customs, you have access to a large private parking lot under camera and gate surveillance.
Ideally located with shops 10 min drive. See for yourself on google maps.

Apartment is non-smoking and pets are strictly prohibited.

You have all the comforts for 2 people.
- Fiber WiFi
- 4K TV
-SECHE CHEUVEUX....

name: Studio 1,5 pièces au centre de Genève(Plainpalais)
description:
Apartment in the center of Geneva plainpalais district.
Very well connected by public transport (bus, tram) this quiet apartment is located in the heart of the city. Close to shops, restaurants and the main attractions of Geneva, this accommodation will allow you to discover the City of Calvin on foot, by bike or by public transport.
On foot you can reach
50 M Tram 15 GARE(CORNAVIN)
1400 M LAC LEMAN
700M OLD TOWN

name: Charming studio in the old town of Carouge
description: Charming little studio located in the historical center of Carouge. The studio is situated in a courtyard with a little shared garden. It is fully equiped, fonctional and comfortable. It is ideal for one or two persons who wish to stay in Carouge for a few days for work or leisure. Carouge is a lively city with plenty of open markets, cafes, restaurants and boutiques. The studio can also be used as a base for skiing. The "gare routière and railway station are nearby. Free wifi.

name: Agréable chambre près de la Gare Cornavin
description:
Spacious and bright room 2 minutes from Cornavin train station, Geneva.
The room is only for one person and no pets.

name: Charming little apartment in the heart of Paquis
description:
Charming 62qm flat in Paquis, heart of Geneva, between the train station (10 mins) & the Leman lake (5 mins).
The flat is located on the 4th floor (with elevator), cosy and well-equipped, with washing machine, dishwasher, fast Wifi. One double bedroom, a toddler's room and a comfortable double sofa-bed in the living room.
Not the most quiet neighbourhood in town, but definitely the trendiest! Super practical for travelers as train station and airport are just a jump away (7 mins by train).

name: Vu sur le jet d'eau
description: We are two young professionals working in the swiss romande, we have an extra room in our brand new furnished flat and we are looking to host you :)

name: New & Modern Studio - Central Geneva '2
description:
Newly refurbished and modern studio
Located in central Geneva it is perfect for a business trip an extended stay.
10-15 minutes by foot from the center of the city and 5 minutes by bus.
Supermarkets, restaurants, gym and nice parks in the surroundings. 15 minutes drive from the airport.

name: Chambre dans appartement spacieux et Lumineux
Exceptional apartment 5 minutes from Lake Geneva
description:
A typical apartment only 5 minutes walk from one of the most beautiful spots in the city: the Pâquis baths.

Located in the Pâquis district, our apartment is only 4 minutes walk from the train station, 20 minutes from the airport and offers a privileged access to all the lakeside areas that make Geneva such a magical city.

With 3 balconies, our 97 square meters apartment is very pleasant to live in and will be the ideal place to spend your holidays in Geneva.

Amenities 50m away (shops, public transport, 30 minutes one). I speak French, English and Italian.

description:
Super nice appartement with a large living room and separate bedroom.

The apartment has a tram stop in front of the building door . Stop : Acacias. It connects directly to the train station in 10 min.

There are a lot of shops, groceries and restaurants in the area.

Located next to the famous Rhone Street and its shops and restaurants, Rue du Prince is lively during the day but very quiet in the evening.

name: Gorgeous studio by the lake
description:
This very quiet and bright studio flat is in one of the best locations in town. It is right by the lake and close to a range of great restaurants, bars and shops.

The United Nations are a 10 minute walk away, and the train station a 7 minute walk.

It is right by the wonderful Quai Wilson, one the most gorgeous lakeside promenades.

The studio gives you the best location, in the heart of everything while still being quiet and peaceful. For a studio flat it is very spacious.

name: Lovely, bright apt with private roof terrace
description: Located in the heart of Geneva, just behind the train station, in the upcoming area of Grottes. Close to everything you need including many of the most popular attractions. It is furnished in a nice minimalist, but cozy and modern way with newly polished wooden floor in the living-room and hallways.

name: Studio à Carouge. Près du centre commercial
description:
Fully equipped studio in the charming district of Carouge.

Bright the bed measures 140 cm / 200 cm, with the possibility of having a single bed of 90cm/ 200cm. The studio has a small kitchen separate from the living room. Upon your arrival, you will find clean bed linens and towels. The studio is located on a quiet street, but sometimes you can hear noises.

name: Appartement avec terrasse à Carouge
description: Crossing apartment of 4 rooms opening on one side to a large terrace (with gas plancha) and on the other on a quiet street limited to 30 km/h. Capacity of 4 people (including 2 on the sofa bed). Desktop available with external screen, mouse and keyboard. Fully equipped: dishwasher, oven & gas stove and washing machine. 5 min walk from public transport directly to Cornavin Station. Bedding, linen and hygiene products provided, as well as a wardrobe.

name: Spacieux 3 pièces au centre de Genève -4 personnes
description: Bright and comfortable 64m2 in the city center of Geneva. Close on foot to the train station (10 min), the lake and the water fountain (15 min), international organizations, public transport (bus and tram), supermarkets and restaurants and all amenities. It is composed of a spacious living space with office, an equipped kitchen (washing machine, fridge, stove, oven, freezer, dishwasher), a bathroom (bath) and a large bedroom for 4 people with a queen bed size (160x200).

name: Apartment in Villa in Bellevue, Geneva
description: Renovated, completely separate apartment in lower ground floor of a large villa.  Living room with two sofas.  Working space area with desk. One bedroom with ensuite toilet.  Modern, fully-equipped kitchen with dining areas.  Bathroom with shower and wc and sink.  Washing machine and dryer.  Access to huge mature garden with adjoining oak forest. Private entrance directly from parking space.

name: Nicely Decorated 1BR Apartment Close to Cornavin
description:
Nicely decorated and cosy 1 bedroom flat located near the Cornavin train station (3 tram stops above it) in a quiet neighbourhood.
Proximity to the airport, city centre and public transport makes this area ideal to move around and discover the beautiful city of Geneva whether you are visiting for a romantic escape, a business meeting or simply to enjoy a nice stay around the lake.

name: Calm room 5min to UN and Train station

Close to all amenities, bus, tram, shops, train station, UN, park. In a very quiet and bright building.
5 minutes bus ride from the United Nations and the train station.

Beautiful bathroom and large fully equipped kitchen.t. Welcome and have a great holiday!"

5 min walk from the water jet, in one of the most lively and best served neighborhoods in the city.

Great place to be able to get around on foot or by transport and enjoy the lake which is only a few steps away!
A double bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room available

Ideally located 5 minutes from the lake and the train station, the apartment is designed to offer a feeling of cocooning. Large, bright and quiet room because it overlooks an inner courtyard. You will find a double bed, spacious desk and wardrobe.
Great more of the apartment Capsule the cat reigns in mastery of the place and according to its moods offers purr sessions. Cat box in the toilet, regularly cleaned.

Has a large bedroom overlooking the courtyard, a refurbished bathroom, multiple storage, fully equipped American kitchen opening onto the living room with a large sofa bed and a large armchair. A large table allows you to work or dine. It is an 8-minute walk from the lake, 2 minutes from the Parc de la Grange, 1 minute from the bus stop December 31, amenities at the foot of the building.

name: Cozy Room in Carouge, Geneva
description:
Welcome to Carouge! Enjoy your stay in this 2-person bedroom in a freshly renovated 90m2 apartment with a view onto Geneva (5th floor with elevator). Bars, restaurants and the local theatre are only a short walk away or you can reach the city centre of Geneva in a few minutes by tram.

Facilities available: - washing machine, oven, microwave, bathtub, closet, bicycle room

name: Modern 3BD apart close to the UN with a terrace
description:
Fully furnished apartment located right next to the UN/WIPO/ITU/CICG.

This top-floor spacious apartment features two large terraces, 3 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (one with a bath and one with a shower), an open kitchen equipped with modern amenities, a dining area in addition to a large living room with a flat-screen.

The apartment is ideal for families wishing to visit Geneva or on business trips to the nearby international organizations.

description: This apartment has been entirely repainted and refurbished. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Enjoy one double bedroom, one bedroom with 2 single bed, and a last one with a trunkle bed, ideal for kids. The flat offers 2 bathrooms, one with shower and the other one with a bathtub. Also, enjoy this ideal location, from where you can reach Rive or Plainpalais in less than 10 minutes. Enjoy an appetizer on the balcony and the calm of the apartment.

name: Cozy room around Balaxert
description:
Hi :) Welcome to our home!
Your room is cozy and comfortable equipped with a single bed, soft mattress, big wardrobe, reading table, and chair. The kitchen, living room, bathroom, toilet, and balcony are open access at any time, you can use them as if you were at home. The apartment is located very close to Balaxert, 5mins away from the airport, 7mins to the Geneva main station. There are bus/tram stops for (14, 18, 10, 11).

name: Superbe appartement dans quartier chic au centre
description:
superb apartment, spacious and modern with a small balcony. a large kitchen. Renovated during the day.
The apartment is located in the heart of Geneva in the most beautiful chic area of Geneva.
equipped kitchen, washing machine, stove and glass plate
fridge, freezer, oven, microwave, toaster. Toaster and Nespresso coffee machine and everything you'll need for a great stay.

name: Amazing panorama on the Salève
description:
Residence "Pierres aux Arbres" - apartment "Salève"

This magnificent flat is located in an old farmhouse completely renovated in 2020.

The property, only 2.5 km away from Carouge, is connected with the public transport (10 minutes on foot or 5 by bike): Bus 45 - Pont de Drize; Bus 41 - Milière; Bus 8 - Veyrier Tournettes.

The Léman Express train (Lancy-Bachet stop) is 10 minutes by bike or 5 minutes by car; the motorway, exit Archamps or Etrembières, is also 10 minutes by car.

name: Beautiful apartment near jet d'eau
description:
This cosy apartment (75m2) on the first floor of an apartments block near (5 mins by foot) jet d'eau and 20 mins from train station, is close to all trendy shops, restaurants and transports (tram stop Villereuse and bus stop 31 Décembre).

Kitchen with refrigerator, ceramic hob and oven, bathroom with toilet and bathtub, bedroom with one queen bed. The apartment can accommodate 2 adults. Towels are included. No animals allowed.

name: Nice apartment near the lake and United Nations
description: Cozy apartment with two bedrooms in the center of Geneva.In the UN area and 3 minutes walk from Geneva lake .Fully equipped with everything for your convenience and wonderful stay

name: Logement proche gare Cornavin, vue Jura et Alpes
description: This accommodation is located on the 6th floor of a building in the center of Geneva, close to Cornavin train station. The Tram stop is just downstairs from the building as well as many shops. It is spacious and functional. The balcony is large and has a lovely view of the city center, Mont Blanc, and the Jura on the other side. It has a separate kitchen, living room and, bathroom and bedroom.

name: Spacious flat by the lake and the park Eaux-Vives
Cosy Geneva Flat near lake and parc
description: A cosy artsy flat near the lake of Geneva and only minutes away from the beautiful parc de la grange. Situated in the chic neighborhood of the eaux vives you will be able to enjoy both the coolest restaurants in town and also find peace and calm in the surroundings.

bedroom, 1 bathroom with WC.
