description:
Hello,
Charming room with panoramic views of Geneva close to all amenities located 2 minutes from the stops
"Lancy-Bachet" from the CFF station and tram to the Grand-Lancy.
Excellent fork in Geneva-centre on both banks in less than 10 minutes with many mobility offers nearby.

name: Bijoux à côté du lac Léman.
Comfortable apartment close to the city center
description: In a luxury building close to the city center, 6 rooms (160m2) with 3 bedrooms + 1 room open to the living room with additional possibility of sleeping. Fully equipped kitchen communicating with the dining / living room. A bathroom and a shower room. 2 separate toilets. Each bedroom has a private balcony, the kitchen and living room share a large balcony. Parking at the foot of the building. Ideal for a stay with family or friends.

name: Feel like home in Geneva with Multilingual host
description: A nice calm and secure area at the heart of  International Geneva, next to the World Intellectual Property Organisation, the  European headquarters of the UN and Place de Nations, ITU and other international Organisations. An apartment fully equipped with  the most modern kitchen and appliances. Room with private access to a balcony, table, garde-robe, bedside table.   5 minutes walk to  a municipal pool,  major bus/tram stops. Close to train station, international Airport and glossary shoping.

name: Modern Functional Cosy central in  VIP area
description: Modern Functional Cosy central in  VIP residential area , middle in Green Nice park

name: Private room in high-end apartment central Geneva
description:
Private bedroom with private bathroom in a high end apartment in central Geneva. It has everything you need in terms of kitchen amenities, you just have to bring your own suitcase! Perfect for short term stays while looking for a long term accommodation.

10 minutes away from Gare Cornavin and Lac Leman. Supermarkets in the neighborhood. Museums, bus/tram station and bars/restaurants within walking distance.

name: Appartement très cosy et vert
description:
Charming little 2 rooms in the heart of Geneva. Perfect for a couple. Very cozy.

Bathroom with bathtub and washing machine available. Large tables in the bedroom and kitchen.
Overlooking a very quiet inner courtyard, to leave the sounds of the city

name: Cosy flat near Geneva Center
description:
In the Châtelaine area, 10min from the station, 15min from Geneva center and 20min from the airport.

3rd floor | Entry code | 2 elevators

name: Room in appartment near Central Station Geneva
description:
Calm, relaxing & beautiful apartment - walking distance 1 min. -> tram station, 8 min. ->main train station, 2 min -> parc. The apartment is perfectly situated in between airport, main train station and city center.
Living room, bedrooms, bathroom, separate toilet, kitchen, balcony, elevator. Fully equipped, rather « normal/cosy/personal » than IKEA style 😉
🚲 available at request.
+ 1 cat 🐈‍⬛
Nearby everything you need, 3 supermarkets, restaurants, cafés, kiosks, park, etc.
You’re welcome :)

name: Superbe appartement familiale au bord du lac.
description: For a romantic or family weekend we rent you our apartment in Versoix on the top floor. With stunning 180 degree views of the lake, come and recharge your batteries .

name: Pour un couple, loft en étage de courette, billard
description: On the lower ground floor, large 150 m2 loft, with billiards/ping pong. Outside downtown, surrounded by a garden.

name: Cocooning en ville, -50%pour s’occuper du chat
description:
Conveniently located 5 minutes from the lake and train station, the apartment is furnished to offer a feeling of cocooning. Large, bright and quiet room overlooks an inner courtyard. You will find a double bed, spacious desk, storage cabinet.
Well-equipped kitchen.
Cat's box in the toilet.
I will often be absent, the price per night is reduced by 50% (40.- instead of 80.-) in exchange that you feed and cajolez Capsule (the cat) in my absence.

name: Grande chambre avec frigo et salle de bain privée
description:
Carouge , ancient Italian royal city with Mediterranean charm, a few minutes from Geneva , invites you to walk through its small streets with low and typical houses.
In a quiet passage without car,large and pretty room tastefully furnished in a 5-room apartment.
Private bathroom.
Wifi
Tram 12-18 3 minutes from the apartment
Bus 23
Shops nearby

name: Feel like home in Geneva!
description: A nice calm neighborhood, in the heart of International Geneva, next to WIPO and walking distance from most international organisations and Graduate Institute. 10 minutes from Geneva Airport, 7 minutes from Cornavin train Station, 15 minuted from Geneva Lake and Botanical Garden. 3 minutes from UN European headquarters and Famous Place de Nation, accommodating multiple bust-tram stops. Modern kitchen, fully equipped room: with table, garde-robe, etc. with private access to  Balcony from the room

name: Modern, renovated apartment in Versoix
description:
Nice, modern apartment, fully equipped with kitchen, bathroom (bathtub, sink, toilet), open living room with dining area, sitting area, TV, 1 bedroom with double bed and wardrobe. Kitchen with stove, oven, microwave, Nespresso machine, dishwasher. Washing machine available in the bathroom. Balcony with table and 2 chairs. Large windows with a view of the countryside and the Jura. 5th floor with elevator. Local public transport and shops nearby.
No parties allowed.

name: Cosy clean private room with a comfortable bed.
description: This is my personal appartment, I keep very clean and I am willing to share it with people travelling to Geneva for work or short vacations who wish to experience home away from home kinda of setting. Sometimes I not at home so my vistors can enjoy my entire apartment responsibly as they wish and at times I can be home but my personal presence shouldn't stop you from coming. I am very flexible very social, open mind but yet can be quiet and respect my vistors space. wifi, washing machine.

name: Central and functional apt in Geneva
description:
Cozy and central apartment in Geneva!

Close to all commodities, less than 10 minutes walk from:

- Geneva train station
- United Nations organizations (3 tram stops - across the street)
- Lake (great for a swim, a walk or your jogging)
- Supermarkets (Lidl, Coop, Migros, Cygnes shopping mall)
- Post Office
- Plenty of trendy restaurants in the area, worldwide food choices
- Perle du Lac park
- Cleaning person included (every other week)

Please don't hesitate to ask me any question!

name: Artist's apartment Geneva, Les Augustins
description:
A cozy apartment in the center of Geneva. This house is an artist's home. It is a place to be inspired, dream, relax and share beautiful moments. Welcome to Karla’s home full of colours and designs. Placed in a vibrant part of the city it is easily accessible by tram and surrounded by an area full of cafes, restaurants, theaters and shops.
Even though in the center, the apartment faces a smaller road and because of this has the privilege of a silent and calm ambience.

name: Private room in the center of Geneva
description: A small spacious apartment is right in the center of the city of Geneva close to the lake and the train station

name: Tres bel apt à 7min a pied de la gare fibre 10g/s
description: Located just 7 minutes on foot from the train station and 20 minutes by public transport from the airport, this apartment offers a comfortable room for your stay. Perfectly positioned to easily enjoy local amenities and explore the city. Everything you need is within reach, ensuring a pleasant and convenient stay experience. Whether you're here for business or tourism, this room is the ideal starting point to discover all that Geneva has to offer, blending convenience and comfort

name: Lovely 70 square meter apartment
description: Beautiful 70 square meter apartment with high ceiling in a very calm street. The apartment was fully renovated 2 years ago, it has one bedroom, a bathroom with a bathtub, a kitchen with a washing machine and a laundry machine, a living room with a very comfortable king size sofa bed and a balcony. The location is perfect, there are many restaurants around and it is exactly between the city center and the beautiful town of Carouge, both at walking distances.

name: Bright and cozy 3-room apartment à la Rue Liotard
description:
Recently renovated and fully furnished, 2nd floor with elevator, quiet and with nice view on the internal court.
Includes 1 bedroom, kitchen, living room, WC and bathroom including washing machine.

name: Belmont | Central, Stylish, 90sqm | Cocoon Homes
description:
Nestled in the heart of Geneva within an elegant historic building, we offer a spacious 90 sqm furnished, fully equipped apartment for extended stays accommodating up to four guests.

With its hardwood floors, high ceilings, and thoughtfully curated design, our Cocoon Homes apartment strikes the perfect balance between comfort and style, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere that feels like home.

name: Quiet & cozy wooden loft downtown: 3 bedrooms
description: A real nocarz in which my family and I live but share when on vacation! Huge windows & sky light give this cozy wooden loft generous amounts of natural sunlight. Fully equipped kitchen with more than just salt and pepper;) Located near train station & 20’ bus from airport, this location is perfect to explore Geneva. Close to multiple trams and buses with lots of food options plus a large projector and screen. Perfect for families, couples, or a group of travelling friends! Welcome

name: Chambre privée au calme
description:
Private room in a 100 m2 accommodation

The apartment is composed of a large dining room, a separate equipped kitchen, a terrace, a mezzanine (TV area and sports accessories available), visitor toilet, shared bathroom and two bedrooms.
Parking possible

Private room in a 100sqmeters flat.
Large living room, kitchen fully equipped, terrace, mezzanine (TV and sport tools available), private toilet, shared bathroom, and 2 bedrooms.

name: Vintage apartment well located and equipped
description:
Beautiful apartment, with a large bedroom, fully equipped kitchen, living room with large television and dressing room, high speed fiber optic internet connexion.

It is located in one of the best areas of the city. Right in front of the apartment there is a large underground parking lot.

Good and quiet neighbourhood where you can enjoy the night to rest.

name: Feel in Geneva like home on the round bed!
description: c

name: Studio simple et chaleureux en plein centre-ville
description:
Simple and warm studio, 25 m2 with balcony and views of the Salève. Equipped with a single bed on mezzanine and a sofa bed (2 places).
Close to shops, public transport, the Old City of Geneva. 25 min walk to Cornavin train station, or 10 min by tram

name: CHAMBRE/BALCON PRIVÉ/CLÉ POUR FERMER/wi-fi/Televis
description:
****Beautiful room for rent in Geneva with massage seat ****

**(Chêne Bougeries, Avenue des Rideriers)**

Bedroom:

· Ultra-fast Wi-Fi **/** TV with channels from all countries.

· With key to lock the door. **/ **12 square meters, bright and furnished.

· With fridge and balcony of 6 square meters private **/** Available in a row **/** With noise insulation.



•Possible separate double bed for two people according to your need if very long term rental.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Auberge des Vergers
description:
1 Atypical themed room in a city hostel in the center of a new eco-district very well served.
Bus 57 from the airport. Trams 14 and 18 from downtown.
Underground paid public parking and free public transportation card right
6 non-smoking rooms have a private bathroom and 4 on 2 shared bathrooms.

name: Pied-à-terre à Pregny-Chambesy
description: Ideal location for this very comfortable 35 m² room apartment, in the basement of a small 3 apartment building built in 2020 and surrounded by greenery. Quiet location near international institutions and the airport (bus stop in both directions 100m from the house). 1 large living room with sofa bed and double foldaway bed, well equipped kitchen, bathroom. Possibility of parking outside of property"

name: Central & cosy
description:
5 min walk from the lake!
Apartment located in the quiet Eaux-Vives district with a nearby park and street parking. The apartment is located in a Haussmannian building and consists of two rooms: an equipped kitchen and a living room/bedroom with a sofa bed and TV.
Bathroom with bath and separate toilet.
Free and unlimited wifi access.

name: Confort Studio w garden
description:
Studio of 25 m2 on the ground floor of a quiet luxury residence with its small garden.

The studio is fully equipped, equipped kitchen + dishwasher and washing machine. The apartment also has an electric bike available to facilitate your travels in Geneva.

name: Cozy and fully furnished flat center of Geneva
Charming quiet 1 bedroom central apt., 2 balconies
description: This lovely 1 bedroom apartment full of lush greenery is perfectly located in central Geneva, just 8 minutes from the train station by foot and very close to international organizations. Located on the 2nd floor of a charming elevator building on a quiet street, you'll enjoy relaxing on 1 of the 2 balconies, cooking in the well-equipped kitchen, or watching movies on the projector. Just steps away from the famous Grottes neighborhood, there are plenty of nearby dining and nightlife options.

name: Appartement en plein centre
description:
Charming 2 room apartment composed of a large bedroom with an office.
Located in a relatively quiet street in the city center, 5 minutes from the train station and public transport.
Coop, Migro, Lidl, Denner nearby as well as the bath of the paquis and the botanical garden.

name: Magnolia: charmant studio pour une personne
description:
This charming studio with exposed wood beams is organized to accommodate 1 person looking for proximity to the city but also tranquility of the countryside.

With its independent entrance, it offers a 140 x 200 bed and an office area to work with wi-fi available. There is no kitchen but an organized area (fridge, stove and microwave); in the bathroom, the washing machine is installed.

A parking space is available.

name: Two bedroom apartment in Plainpalais
description: Charming apartment in the vibrant area of Plainpalais, in the center of Geneva. Conveniently located close to the tram lines, shops and a few minutes from downtown, this apartment has a master bedroom with large closets, a second bedroom with a desk, a fully equipped kitchen open onto a living/dining area with a small balcony, a shower room with washer, a separate toilet and a hallway.

name: Central 20m2 room in a colored flat
description:
20m2 room in a central flat, 3 tram stations away from the train station Cornavin (stop at Cirque), 5 min from the center, 10 min from lake.

Ideal for 2 people, however there is the possibility for 4 people if you open the sofa bed.

The flat has a bathroom with separate WC. The kitchen is equipped with coffee machine and all necessary kitchenware + washing machine and dryer.

You will share the apartment with me (and 2 very lovely cats)

View on the old city and Plainpalais square.

name: Beautiful 2 bedrooms by the lake and station area
description: A stone's throw from the lake and three streets from the station, the location of this two bedroom flat could not be better. Being in the centre of town, while enjoying the bird sons and a park downstairs, this appartement has in addition a spacious living area - two bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and a living room with a dining area. The apartment also has two work areas.

name: 1 Bedroom furnished apartment - UN (18.2)
description: Located between Charmilles and Servette area, at 7 minutes from city center, this apartment is as follows: 1 entry hall, 1 living room, 1 equipped kitchen, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and  1 WC.  Public transportation: Tram 14, 18 et 5 min by walk

name: Apartment  près du jet d'eau Genève
description: Discover Geneva from our 60m² apartment, near the water jet and the old town. With a bedroom, a living room, a bathroom, a small kitchen and a lobby, this comfortable space offers everything you need. Explore the city, enjoy restaurants and shops, and relax. Book now for an unforgettable experience

name: Spacious and modern flat Geneva city center
description: Spacious flat in Geneva city center, near the Lake

name: Centrally located studio in beautiful Geneva
description: One piece studio in Champel.  Bedroom apartment with a double bed and sofa.  Big kitchen area equipped with cookware and dishes.  Bathroom with bath tub and separate toilet room.  We provide linen, towels and free Wi-Fi.  Conveniently located near 1, 3, 5 & 8 Bus stops (2 mins) and 12 Tram (5 mins)

name: Quiet & Central 2BR apartment in Chêne-Bougeries
description:
Beautifully furnished apartment in Chêne-Bougeries.
Quiet and central second-floor apartment with large balcony, modern and stylish architecture and perfect location for tram and CEVA connections to any point in the city.
The apartment is made up of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.
Bright and spacious living area with open kitchen concept and large balcony.
Completely equipped and furnished apartment for easy move-in.

name: Quiet apartment near city center, airport & the UN
description:
Ideal for remote work. Fully equipped apartment in a quiet location. 15' bus ride from the airport. 15' walk from the train station,city center, lake & the river. shopping center& bus stops to anywhere nearby.

Ideal for remote working. Fully equipped apartment, very pleasant area, quiet area, close to the UN, all shops, the city center, the lake and the Rhone. Shopping mall just steps away. Train station and airport are only a few minutes away. Area served by many bus lines.

name: Joli app. 50m2 avec grandes terrasses, hypercentre
description:
Lovely & calm apartment 50m2 with 2 big terraces of 17sqm each.
All equipped, it is perfect for 2 people but can also be rent for 4 people with the couch in the livingroom.
Very well located: 2 mn (walking) from the train station, 5mn (walking) from the lake and 10 mn from the airport by train.
Television, WIFI, Netflix, Amazon prime, Canal+, washing machine, dishwasher, oven, hair dryer, piano, juicer, BBQ, Nespresso coffee... All will be available during your stay.
Very bright and calm!

name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement/Genève centre
description:
Small bedroom with bathroom and private toilet in large very bright apartment
Shared spaces:
Kitchen open
Living room
Balcony
area meditation/yoga area

Wifi and workspace available

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: The Violet Room
description:
Hello, welcome to our Farmhouse in Geneva City Center, in La Servette. Super calm area, no road, no noise. Great Garden at disposal with barbecue, with tables and chairs, armchairs. And Hens.

Near all comodities. By foot, 15 min. to the City Center. Next to Bus 3, 9, 11, 22, Tram 14 and 18. 15 min. By Taxi, 15 min. to the Airport. Possibility to park a car, to be discussed.

name: 3 pièces avec jardin dans une  villa  à Genève
description:
Beautiful 3 room apartment , 50 m2, furnished, with garden, for 2,700.- per month, parking and charges included 5 m from Lake Geneva
It is located in a semi-basement of a beautiful villa in Chambesy – Geneva.
Very bright with electric blinds.
Kitchen , living room- office and a bedroom with bathroom.

Bus stop 20 and 59. We are 5 m away by bus or car from international organizations (UN, Red Cross etc.), Cointrin – Geneva airport and A1 highway

name: Amazing 2 bedrooms in the center.
description:
The perfect place to relax and enjoy a great stay in a perfect location.
The apartment is on the 4th floor with an elevator. It's made of 2 big bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, a living room, a bathroom and separate toilet as well as a small balcony. It’s equipped with washing machine, tv, high speed wifi, coffee and tea.
I am sure you will enjoy every little details.
Enjoy!
Public transports: 1 min. walk
Old town: 7 min. walk
Check in any time after 2pm.(No problems with late check in)

name: Large, bright and spacious bedroom! Fully equipped
description: One beautiful bedroom in a spacious and bright apartment (large kitchen and living room). An entrance hall and a fully equipped kitchen. The accommodation is ideally located: 20' from the airport, 12' from the main train station, and 10' from the United Nations, 15' from CERN. Close to all amenities (public transports, shops, shopping center). Bed linen and towels provided.

name: Appartement entier en plein centre de Geneve
description: This family home is close to all sights and amenities. Less than a 10-minute walk from the train station and 2 rue du Lac, the apartment is located in a lively and family-friendly area.

name: Maison d’alma avec jardin et proche aéroport
Superbe appartement proche du lac
description: 5 rooms fully furnished and equipped. Under the roofs, this very charming apartment has a large terrace. The entrance serves a large fully furnished and equipped living/dining/kitchen, 3 bedrooms as well as 2 bathrooms, one with a Jacuzzi and sauna.

name: Chambre  privée proche de la gare.
description:
I am happy to host you in my beautiful apartment on the 5th and top private floor with elevator. Located 500 meters from Cornavin train station, all amenities are nearby.
You have one large bedroom and private bathroom. The open kitchen, the dining room, relaxation area at your disposal as well as the laundry room for stays longer than 5 days.

name: Beautiful Modern Apartment Close to UN and airport
description:
Beautiful Modern Apartment.

Just 10min from Geneva Trainstation and 4min from Airport.

Close to UN and Shopping centers.

Fiber-optic internet and wonderful interior decor.

Located in a family friendly area with the sound of children playing infront of the building.

name: Amazing Duplex Flat at the Heart of the Old Town
description: Hi there, welcome! Our cosy duplex appartement is located in the city's most beautiful locations—the old town—at the foot of the vibrant "Place du Bourg-de-Four". The apartment has a spacious living room that open onto a patio, a fully equipped kitchen, one large bedroom floor with a desk. It has unique relaxing vibes. We hope you will fall in love with the place too ♥

name: Great place to enjoy Geneva city. (Near the UN)
description:
Peaceful haven in the city center. Ideally located and quiet, surrounded by greenery. My apartment is available to you while I am away.
You will find everything you need. Supermarkets are a 2-minute walk away
By public transport:
- 20 minutes from Geneva Airport
- 8 min to Cornavin train station, main train station
The Accommodation:
Surface area of about 60 m2. It consists of an entrance hall, living room with 140 sofa bed, and room with a starry hotel's Spring box bed.

name: N3 - Carouge
description:
Female or businessman, consultant, student of major schools, in the process of separation or otherwise, this accommodation is specially designed for you!
Extremely well placed, you are within walking distance of everything. Well distributed, it offers a lot of storage space for clothes, suitcases and cc.. Ironing board in the apartment.
Free wifi suitable for a home office; A neighborhood where everything has been thought out to provide a sustainable and healthy living environment.

name: Deux-pièces simple et charmant-dernier étage
description: Charming little apartment with simple comforts. Top floor with balcony. Located in the Plainpalais neighborhood, but also very close to the charming town of Carouge and the Arve River. Relatively old-style building. Floor hardwood flooring. Very convenient location! Close to all amenities and attractions. On several direct lines from  the train station. Trams 12, 18, 15.

name: Magnifique chambre et salon privé (35m2) dans appt
description:
At the foot of the Rhone, charming room composed of an alcove bed and a living room with fireplace with balcony (about 35m2). The space is private, a door allows you to isolate yourself from the rest of the apartment. Kitchen with balcony and bathroom with accessible bathtub. The apartment is located right in the heart of Geneva. All amenities are at the foot of the building.
A cat is present in the apartment.
Looking forward to welcoming you!

name: Grande chambre au bord du lac
description: We are 30 meters from the lake , and 10 minutes from the train station, it is a large apartment with a small garden in the inner courtyard. We have 1 cat.

name: 3 Bedroom apartment - Chatelaine
description: Comfortable and bright apartment very close to public transport, shops and restaurants. It consists as follows: - 1 entrance hall; - 1 large living room with dining area - 1 kitchen - 2 bedrooms with double bed - 1 bedrooms with single beds - 1 bathroom  - 1 toilet

name: Modern Functional Flat
description: Moderm Fuctional Studio

name: Lovely one bedroom condo with garden access
description:
Bright and quiet beautiful place.
According to you mood, you are 15min away from downtown to shop, visit the city and eat, or you can go for a hike using the cable car in France to enjoy a beautiful view of Geneva and the Alps... 15 min walk away as well.
Parking and Public transportation are easy. It is possible to rent two bikes.
Highway is 10 min driving.
Don't hesitate to contact me for further information, I'll be glad to help you.

name: Spacious 1-bedroom apartment central in Paquis
description:
• Bathroom with washing machine
• Kitchen with dishwasher
• Bedroom with decorative fireplace
• Living room
• Small room with dining table
• High ceilings
• Internet, TV, desk and printer
• Entrance room with Garderobe

Lovely quiet 85 qm in a historical building, first floor, centrally located between Main Train Station Gare Cornavin and the lake. Only 4 tram stops to Nations. The apartment is fully equipped. Supermarkets, cafes, and restaurants close by.
Bed linen and towels will be provided.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Room close to the tramway
Appartement meublé
description:
Furnished and equipped apartment located 5 minutes from Geneva city center,
building overlooking the park, at the end of a cul-de-sac, very quiet neighborhood,
1 double bedroom, 1 bedroom with 2 pull-out beds,
2 bathrooms,
large sun terrace

name: Spacieux et superbe appartement avec piscine
description:
This peaceful home offers a relaxing stay for the whole family.
Located a 2-minute walk from the United Nations.
The residence has two swimming pools one for children and the second for adults .
The setting is green , quiet and has a unique character in Geneva.

name: Logement Lumineux Hauts Plafonds
description: This perfectly located home offers easy access to all sights and amenities.

name: proche du centre ville &en plein cœur de la nature
Logement entier sur Rhône - La Jonction
description: Bright and charming apartment. High ceiling with a few animals on site (two chinchillas and frogs in a terrarium) and lots of plants. Direct access to the dock of the Quai du Rhone for swimming. Tram at 1 min walk.

name: Entire apartment next to the main train station
description:
Fully furnished and equipped, beautiful old (but renovated) apartment, very centrally located, next to the main train station of Geneva (Cornavin).

This place is a great base to:
- Go out (lively neighborhood with many restaurants etc)
- Cook (fully equipped kitchen, traditional Swiss cheese fondue set, etc)
- Get work done (with a desk and large monitor to connect your laptop to)
- Get entertainment (HiFi system controllable via Bluetooth, large TV)

A free public transport pass is included!

name: Lovely bedroom in charming flat, super central!
description:
A comfortable and spacious bedroom in a charming apartment, centrally located in Geneva. The bedroom contains a king size bed, a beautiful fireplace, a desk for remote work/studying, multiple sources of light, storage space for your belongings, a fan to keep you cool in the summer, a couple of mirrors, and an inflatable mattress if required.
Super central and close to pretty much everything in Geneva - parks, bars, restaurants, lakes, shops, cinemas - whatever you fancy!

name: Studio Confort lits jumeaux - Drake Longchamp
description:
Sharing "Chez Soi", the essence of hospitality, has been the foundry value of Rey Group for over 60 years.
The Drake Longchamp hotel offers 156 spacious rooms, each equipped with a kitchen. Located in the heart of Geneva, 100 m from the Lake, it is ideal for your business and family stays.
Our reception service is open every day, 24 hours a day.
a simple call will be enough to get information about the City, how to use the room, or any other request.

name: 120 sqm flat with view over the Rhone and the Lake
description: Large apartment with a magnificent view of the Jet-d'Eau from the balcony and loggia! Two "king size" bedrooms with 55-inch Oled TV and two separate bathrooms, an equipped kitchen and an office with a 34-inch screen, high speed wifi access and a scanner-printer. High standing building, secure with underground private parking and a direct access to the flat. The apartment is located at 5 minutes walk from the hotel Mandarin Oriental in Bel Air, the main train station (Cornavin) and Geneva-City.

name: 1bed apartment near Geneva lake and train station
Lovely 1 bedroom apartment in central Geneva
description: Located just off the River Avre, this lovely apartment is central (Bel Air in 10 minutes, Carouge 5 minutes) with a tram stop (12, 18) directly below. There is also a epicerie and a bakery next door with the nearest supermarket 1 tram stop away.

name: petit 2 pièces confortable près de l' aéroport et nations unies
description:
Relax in this cozy home with a view of the mountains ,enjoy the sunset in winter, the naige on the mountain


Reach the route em 3 minutes by car,
the United Nations and the airport em 5 minutes.

bus stop 5 towards airport and Cornavin station is a 3-minute walk away.


full kitchen
a comfy sofa bed
Public car park available.

name: GENEVE a la frontiere  superbe appartement
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. ideal location to visit GENEVE and its surroundings with 2 bedrooms and a beautiful terrace with fitness equipment.

name: Studio confort lit double - Drake Longchamp
description:
We are happy to welcome you to our spacious rooms (minimum 25 m2), comfortable and all equipped with kitchen, for a quality stay in all conviviality.
If you choose the Drake Longchamp Hotel for its central and lakeside location, you will definitely come back to feel at home again.

name: Unique! Classic room
description: Whether you are in Geneva for business or pleasure, you have had a long day... A warm room, a well-lit white marble bathroom and a cosy bed await you. A desk with full internet connection is at your disposal if you need it.

name: Unique! Superior room
description: Whether you are in Geneva for business or pleasure, you have had a long day ... A renovated and warm bedroom with shimmering colors and a cozy bed await you. A desk with all Internet connections is at your disposal if you need it.

name: Unique! Deluxe room (36m2)
description: Whether you are in Geneva for business or pleasure, you have had a long day ... A renovated and warm bedroom with shimmering colors and a cozy bed await you. A desk with all Internet connections is at your disposal if you need it.

name: SPECIAL ROOM, près gare.
description: Very central room in Geneva, near the train station, lake, shops and restaurants.

name: Room in a large apartment close to UN and airport
description:
Furnished room to rent in Grand-Saconnex overlooking a garden with no traffic in an apartment of 70 m2. Close to the ILO, WHO (11min walk) UN (20min walk), and to the airport.

The flat is shared with one working person who has his own room.

Tell us something about yourself:
1. where do you work?
2. How long you plan to stay?

Thank you
:)

name: Beautiful and Totally Renewed/Furnished Apartment
description:
Beautiful and totally renewed/furnished apartment with independent kitchen in Geneva center.

This beautiful 30m2 apartment offers generous and bright spaces.

It benefits from a magnificent brightness thanks to its optimal exposure all day long (South) and a beautiful view on the 4th floor with new elevator.

name: Genève appartement
description: The entire group will have easy access to all sites and amenities from this central home. The apartment is very spacious: perfect for a couple or someone who works. Close to all major hotels such as President Wilson, Kempinski, four seasons... Cornavin train station, all shops.

name: Entire apartment by the lake in city centre Geneva
description: Welcome to our newly renovated apartment nestled in the vibrant heart of Pâquis! Situated on the 3rd floor with elevator access, our marvelous space offers both comfort and convenience. Just a 2-minute stroll to the picturesque lake and Quai Wilson, and a mere 150 meters from a supermarket and public laundry facilities, our location is unbeatable. Fully furnished and equipped with high-speed WiFi, our apartment ensures a seamless stay in this bustling neighborhood.

name: Central and Cute Appart with amazing view/balcony
Appartement 3 pièces
description:
Three-room apartment of 68 m2, decorated and furnished with care, comprising two bedrooms (king size bed and twin beds), living room, bathroom with bathtub, separate toilet and equipped kitchen.
Free public transport and wifi map.

name: Joli 3 pièces balcons calme centre
description: Nice 3 rooms top floor , bright, crossing 2 balconies, shops 2 minutes , quiet area, very well connected bus and Lake Geneva  express, 15 minutes Cornavin, Park, 15 minutes walk hyper center .

name: Au coeur du quartier de Saint Jean à 2 pas de Genève
description: spacious apartment, large bedroom and en-suite

name: one bed, light filled flat in the heart of GVA
description: A lovely and spacious one- bedroom, 55 sqm apartment in the heart of Geneva and one of it's liveliest areas (Quartier des Bains). Cosy furniture, great shower pressure and soaked in light throughout the day. Bus stop almost in front of the building (2, 19) and easy access everywhere on foot including both rivers as well as the lake. It's an 8 minute walk to the old city and some of the best local restaurants and bars in Geneva.

name: Charming 1 bedroom apartment in Augustins
description:
A charming 1 bedroom apartment (around 60m2) with a spacious bedroom, lovely living room with balcony, and colorful kitchen, situated in a quiet yet lively Augustins.
The apartment is fully equipped (wifi, Netflix, dishwasher, washing machine, juicer etc). It is very well connected, placed 100m away from the tram 12 and 18 taking you within a few minutes to the city center. It is 2min walking from a river, 5min from magical Carouge and 20min from the Old Town.

name: Charme de l’ancien, appt 70m2 au pied du Rhone
description:
At the foot of the Rhone and the Arve, apartment of 70 m2, with 2 private rooms available. Guests will enjoy a large living room of 35 m2 with balcony, alcove bed with large screen TV, designer furniture, fireplace. A fully equipped kitchen has a second balcony, a bathroom with bath and a separate toilet.
You are in the heart of Geneva, all amenities are at the foot of the building including swimming and barbecue along the Rhone!
Looking forward to welcoming you!

name: belle chambre calme et bien située
description: beautiful room of 15m2 in an apartment with a friendly roommate of 28 years, physicist at CERN.  the apartment is on the ground floor, on a quiet street and close to the city center (10 min walk from the train station, 15 min from the city center and close to various amenities: food store, pharmacy, restaurants,...

name: Big room in shared flat in Geneva
description: Close to the lake, UN; and only 10 minutes walk from the station; the place in this cosy apartment is the perfect base for all types of trips to Geneva. Located at the top floor, the apartment has beautiful  light and stunning sunset. The spacious living -and bedroom has a 2 person bed, a sofa (that can be used as additional 1 person bed), desk, clothing hanger and lots of plants. Kitchen and bathroom to be shared with young professional, who happily shares some tips about Geneva with you!

name: Beautiful Two Bedroom Suit - Lake View
description:
Brand new apartment with three balconies on the shores of Lake Geneva with view on the lake.

The apartment is fully furnished and equipped with luxury materials (floor heating system, triple glazing, soundproof walls, shower with steamer/hammam, bathtub with Jacuzzi, luxury furniture, big TV screens, high-speed internet, safe, laundry, etc.).

name: Prestigious One Bedroom Suit - Lake View
description:
Brand new apartment with two balconies on the shores of Lake Geneva with view on the lake. One of the most prestigious location in Geneva.

The apartment is fully furnished and equipped with luxury materials (floor heating system, triple glazing, soundproof walls, shower with steamer/hammam, electric convertible sofa, big TV screens, high-speed internet, big dressing, safe, laundry, etc.).

Surface is around 80 square meters (m2).

name: Une chambre bien située
description: A private room in next to the tram stop, well connected for a long stay.

name: Appartement chaleureux au cœur de Genève
description:
Fully renovated apartment in old building with lift, ideally located in the heart of Geneva close to public transport,shops, restaurants.
Large bedroom with electric box spring bed large decorative fireplace storage cabinet.

This district is also one of the two districts along the lake of Geneva, so you will always remain close to the lake, enjoy wandering around it or to go swim.

This apartment is located on a pedestrian street, in the heart of the lively and typical Plainpalais district, close to the HUG and the University. Many restaurants and shops are located nearby. It is very well connected by public transport (tram lines 12, 15, 17, 18, bus 1) but also very central for walking in the Old Town or by the lake.
The apartment is bright, on the 7th floor and facing south, with beautiful views of the city and the Salève.

name: Jolie chambre dans superbe appartement à Genève
description:
Quartier de Plainpalais

Cozy room in a large apartment of 90 m2 very well located, near cafes, cinemas and restaurants.

With a small office area, the room is ideal for a short work trip.

During your stay, a roommate will be present.
A fan is available.
__

Cosy bedroom in a generous and central flat in Plainpalais.
Close to cafes, theatres and restaurants.

During your stay, you will share the flat with one flatmate.
A fan is available for use.

name: Geneva Apartment + Private inside parking O N U
description: Elegant flat near the United Nations, the Cornavin train station and the airport. Proximity of Bus station line 3 in front of the building. Building of standing with private park. Walking distance to Migros supermarket, bank, restaurants, post-office, pharmacy, etc.

name: Cosy Apartment in the City Center
description:
Cosy Apartment in the heart of Geneva!
5 minutes walk from the train station, and from the lake! And you can get to the UN in 15 minutes!
The flat is at the hedge of the red light district, surrounded of many bars and restaurants, this is the perfect place to stay if you want to sightseeing during the day and enjoy the buoyant nightlife in Geneva in the evening!

name: Modern Studio Cornavin Geneva Center
description:
Superb modern studio in a newly renovated building ideally located a few steps from the Cornavin train station. Highly connected to public transport networks, it has a strategic location.
Anchored in a dynamic district, it benefits from the immediate proximity of numerous shops, restaurants, bars and service companies.

name: Studio in Geneva (Eaux-Vives)
description: Cute studio in central Eaux-Vives.

name: Chambre privée dans une sublime maison
description:
Very classy room for a single person in a wonderful house. Super quiet and luxury area.
If you are coming for an International conference or a short stay this is the place to be.
Located, close to the airport (10 min by car). Come and discover a unique place in Geneva.

If you'd like to stay for a month, you can directly asked me in private message if it can be available. Thank you :)

name: Appartement résidentiel de qualité à Champel
description: Relax at this spacious and serene place near Bertrand Park.

name: Charmante chambre au calme dans une villa
description:
Very nice double bedroom in the basement of a quiet detached villa with a separate entrance and private bathroom. It is 10 minutes by public transport from Geneva train station and the airport. Free street parking is available. Ideal accommodation for discovering Geneva and its surroundings.

THIS ACCOMMODATION IS NON-SMOKING.

name: Agréable studio en pleine campagne genevoise
description: The studio is in the middle of the beautiful Geneva countryside on the left bank, with no nuisances. You get there by walking through our little stable, and each time you arrive you'll be greeted by our ponies, horses and dogs. All nice and friendly.  Not only is the studio equipped with all the comforts you could wish for, it is also surrounded by a fence so that you can enjoy the magnificent terrace and view without being disturbed by our animals.

name: 73 Chambre Cornavin Genève
description: Discover our cozy room with a cozy bed, desk, balcony and great internet connection to accommodate all your needs. Also take advantage of self check-in for flexibility. Relax in our comfortable bedroom and enjoy modern, well-equipped bathroom. Whether you're in town for business or a vacation, our room is the perfect place to rest and unwind.

name: 145m2 Luxurious Apt - 2 Bedrooms - Geneva Center
description:
Large (145 sqm2) and luxurious fully equipped 2 Bedroom apartment, in Geneva city center just a few steps from the lake, the old town, the train station and shops.
Perfect for an extended family stay or coworkers.
It can comfortably welcome up to 4 Guests!

name: Old Town Prestigious 190Sqm - 3 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Large (190 sqm2) and luxurious fully equipped 3 Bedroom apartment, in Geneva old town just a few steps from the lake, the old town, the train station and shops.
Perfect for an extended family stay or coworkers.
It can comfortably welcome up to 5 Guests and a baby

name: Appartement indépendant dans le centre historique
description: In the heart of Geneva's old city, on a lively pedestrian street, on the 4th floor with elevator access, beautiful two rooms overlooking a very quiet courtyard. Wake up to birdsong at this peaceful retreat in the city center.

name: Colocation Dans Appartement Au Calme
description:
We are a family living in a house on the 1st floor. On the 0th floor there is another independent flat that we rent by room or in its entirety.

The flat consists of a kitchen, a bathroom, a hall, a room with cupboards for storing clothes and other items and two bedrooms, each corresponding to one of the flatmates.

Small basement flat but bright and very quiet.

name: Spacious 1 bedroom apartment with onsite parking
description:
Enjoy our spacious and stylish apartment situated in the quaint village of Genthod. Perfect for couples or for those who are wishing to escape the hustle and bustle.

The apartment has a fully equipped study room, ready to use for those wishing to work from home. The study room can be converted into a guest bedroom.

Located close to central Geneva, approximately 15 minutes by car or by train and about 1 hour away from many ski resorts.

Minimum stay two months (December and January).

name: Private sunlit room in charming central flat
description: This lovely apartment full of lush greenery is perfectly located in central Geneva, just 8 minutes walking from the train station and very close to international orgs. On the 2nd floor of a charming elevator building on a quiet street, you'll enjoying relaxing on 1 of the 2 balconies, cooking in the well-equipped kitchen, or petting the other tenant, a 9-year-old pup named Maia. Just steps away from the lively neighborhood of Grottes, there are plenty of nearby dining and nightlife options.

name: Appartement Design & Confortable
description:
Apartment (120 m2) recently renovated for the pleasure of its tenants.
A stone's throw from the sun water park, this small nest will be suitable for single people, couples, and even families.
It consists of two spacious bedrooms and two independent bathrooms. A new and hyper functional kitchen overlooks the living and dining room.
The property is completed by a balcony and a terrace.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Artist's Suite in Private House near City Centre
description: Artist's suite with private shower room and dressing. Work desk and relax chair. Great Sony music installation, connectable to laptop or smart phone. Ideal for an individual traveller who appreciates the calm of a comfortable and quiet basement area. Floor heating. Parking space available.

name: Genève appartement agréable
description:
This place is close to all sights and amenities.
- Cornavin train station (2-minute walk)
- public transport
- the largest hotels in Geneva ( 2-minute walk)
- the UN (10 minutes by bus)
- the city center

name: Genève: chambre spacieuse avec balcon
description:
Accommodation located in the Geneva neighborhood of Plainpalais, very close to the old Geneva. Line 15 and 17 are a 5-minute walk away.

Please note that this is a family appartement.

Railway-station to appartement takes around 10 minutes. Airport to appartement takes around 35 minutes.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Spacious room in quiet townhouse
Petite maison de village
description: Lots of charm in this adjoining old house (1820), in the old hamlet of Arare, in the municipality of Plan-les-Ouates, which overlooks a sprawling alley. Terracotta period tile on the ground floor and period wooden staircase that squeaks a little... Great location. Close to shops and public transport as well as the industrial area of Plan-les-Ouates. Easy access to the highway.

name: Private BR+balcony- Lancy-Bachet -Newly renovated
description:
Private bedroom with balcony in a newly renovated 2-bedroom apartment. Great location next to Lancy Bachet station (tram/bus/train) and walking distance to all amenities (supermarket/post/bank).

The host is a female professional and will be sharing the common area with the guest.

Please feel free to text me if you have any question. Price haggling or arrangement request outside nocarz will be not entertained. Please note that OCPM registration using this address is not provided.

name: Chambre Prive - 5 min L’ONU
description:
This accommodation is located in the city center of Geneva and 1.5 kilometers from the United Nations.
Public transportation in front of the apartment, restaurants, shops, supermarkets as well.

name: Appartement 3 chambres proximité aéroport et ONU
description: Classic apartment near the United Nations, Cornavin train station and the airport. Proximity to Bus Colladon station line 3 in front of the building. A distance from the supermarket, bank, restaurants, post office, pharmacy.

name: Genève mignon appartement centre ville
description: Make life easier at this peaceful, centrally located home.

name: Cozy Studio in the City Centre
description:
If you are looking for an apartment in the best place in Geneve, this is the place.
The apartment is located in the most great and fun area of Geneva in Eaux-vives.
Surrounded by good restaurants and all kinds of shops and markets.
350m from Jet d'Eau and 400m from Parc de la Grange.
Super easy access to transport 2 minutes from the apartment.

name: Beautiful apartment with panoramic views of Geneva
description:
Take a Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment on the 14th floor with panoramic views of Geneva, the Saleve and Mt. Blanc in a quiet area of Geneva.

- Fully furnished with high quality furniture and fully equipped!

- Living room with dinning room to seat 8

- Fully equipped kitchen / washing machine & dryer

- 2 double Bedrooms, 1 with ensuite

- Separate shower room & toilet

- Linen and towels included

- Terrance with outdoor heater and covered seating area break and unwind at this peaceful oasis.

name: Beautiful Studio in Champel with Panoramic View
description:
This beautiful 45sqm studio is located on the 6th floor of a residential building in the heart of Champel and has a magnificent panoramic view.
The building is ideally located in a green environment away from nuisance and enjoys a prime location close to all commodities and to the CEVA train station.

name: Appartement en plein cœur de Genève
description:
You will stay in a lively area very well connected by public transport close to the University and Plainpalais 15 minutes from the train station. The apartment is located in a very lively area with many bars, restaurants and museums. The sound insulation is very good but weekend evenings can be noisy.
Nearby: supermarkets, various shops, some of which are very late. Old Geneva, Lake, cinemas are a 15-30 minute walk.

name: Cozy Studio next to the Lake & International Org.
description:
This cozy studio is in the International Organization & Permanent Missions neighborhood (CCIG, United Nations, Graduate Institute, Maison de la Paix, UNICEF, WTO, WHO, UNHCR, ITU, ILO, WIPO, etc.) and a few steps away from the Geneva Lake - Perle du Lac.

A very convenient location, near the Main train station, Geneva airport, and multiple public transport choices. It has a separate equipped kitchen (Stove, Refrigerator, Nespresso Machine, boiler, Toaster, etc.), bathroom, and 1 Big room.

name: Geneve : superbe chambre
description: Enjoy an elegant and central accommodation, next to the tram (12 & 17 - Villereuse)

name: Chambre lumineuse au coeur de Genève
description:
Bright room in a warm old apartment for 2 people in the city center. You will have access to the rest of the apartment, to share with my roommate.

You will be able to enjoy easy access to all amenities from this central accommodation, 15-20 min from the train station on foot.

Cheers!

name: U.N. - Entire flat+balcony, comfort, long duration
description:
Enjoy your stay in a total intimacy in this clean, quiet and comfortable flat, ideally located in one of the most quiet and central area of the city, the UN district. You can admire mountains and a big indoor garden from the balcony/windows.

- UNHCR and Coop supermarket in front/down the building
- UN office, CICG, ITU : 5mn by walk
- The Geneva main station and the lake : 10 mn by walk / 5 mn by bus/tram
- Airport : 15mn by bus

Discounts for long stays : 20% per month, 10% per week and ++

name: Superbe appartement en centre ville.
description: Enjoy a stylish and central accommodation.

name: Prestigious 2 bedroom apartment in the city center
description: Large 155 sqm renovated artsy and luxurious fully equipped 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Geneva city center just a few steps from the lake, the old town, the train and bus stations and shops. Perfect for small families or coworkers, as it can comfortably welcome 3-4 guests.

name: Superbe appartement neuf, parking et wifi gratuits
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious, serene space. This apartment is located in a private residence with a large garden populated by majestic trees (redwoods) and centenarians.

The apartment is composed of 3 rooms.: a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a separate bedroom, and a kitchen.

Parking and wifi are offered.

The neighborhood is very quiet.

It is easy to get to the center of Geneva thanks to the bus and tram stops nearby.

name: Chambre privée salle de bains, parkingwifi gratuit
description:
Located in a fully renovated and fenced private residence with century-old trees (redwoods), you will love the elegant decor of this charming accommodation. It is composed of a double bedroom with shower room and separate kitchenette.

You will have parking, wifi as well as free cable TV channels. A washing machine and dryer will also be at your disposal for free.

name: Apartment very well located opposite the station
Amazing View, Near UN and WHO
description:
Bright studio with a splendid view of the mountains. Close to restaurants, museums.

Close to Old Town, direct bus to the train station Gare Cornavin and airport, direct bus to the WHO and the Palais des Nations, UN, real bed, lots of light, close to supermarkets, restaurants, WHO, museums.

- floor heating

name: Chambre sympathique dans un appartement.

name: T2 Aux portes de Genève, résidence calme/sécurisée

Welcome to an authentic Geneva apartment ideally located, close to the city center. Marble fireplace, moldings, and high ceilings await you for a memorable stay.
Located 5 minutes' walk from Uni Mail University. Access to public transport can be accessed 1 minute away. Diverse shops in the area.

name: Luxurious flat with swimming pool “Florissant”
description:
Relax in this luxurious, bright, quiet and elegant accommodation. Close to the city center, many shops nearby. Pool and laundry access.
All the products offered are of very high quality : Nespresso machine, Toaster, Kettle, Microwave, Bath products, Sheets, Towels, Dryer, Hair dryer, Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Professional massage chair, Safe, Bed, Sofa, Tv and Wifi.
Laundry cards available.
Ironing service on request.

Maximum capacity 1 people, non-smoking, animals prohibited.

name: De bons appartements
description: Relax in this quiet and stylish space.

name: California van tout équipé

name: Magnifique Chambres Privées à Genève
description:
1 private rooms in apartment 247m ² is located in the center of town 100m from Cornavain Train Station. Mall and Coop, Migros and Lidl supermarkets are less than 200m away.
The most touristy neighborhood in Geneva with all the restaurants and bar is the Pâquis which is in front of the apartment.

1 spacious rooms available for your stay with access to the living room, kitchen and private bathroom that is in the photo.

Ability to organize breakfast and meals

name: Hermoso apartamento en Ginebra
description: Forget the worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Immeuble Le Corbusier
description: The position of this 50 m2 pt loft is in the city center 5 minutes from trams , buses, restaurants and the lake while facilitating your planning. Very quiet , it is a historic building built by a mythical figure of architecture, Le Corbusier. It has its name very well, Carté building, light being present whatever the weather outside. The materials are noble , the architect's favorite colors respected as well as great comfort despite the simplicity of the layout.

name: Modern and luxurious Penthouse
description: Beautiful modern and luxurious penthouse located on the Rive Gauche of Geneva, the most prestigious area of the city. The accomodation features 4 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, professional kitchen with a preparatory kitchen, home fitness and yoga room and a 210 sqm panoramic terrasse with dining area and lounge overlooking the spectacular Salève mountains. Housekeeping services from 8am to 5pm 3 times per week are also included for 1-week stays.

name: Cosy 2 rooms apartment
description:
Cosy two-room top floor apartment with a nice living room, a kitchen, a bathroom and a very large terrace (set up during summer) with a view on the Jura.
The apartment has everything you need.
The building is very quiet and the neighborhood is very nice.
A bus stop is just below the building, where you can reach the Cornavin train station in 10 min, the Nations district in 10 min, and the city center in 15 min.

name: Bright 1 bedroom flat in Geneva
description:
Enjoy a city break in a bright one bedroom apartment.
Enjoy all the comfort what an apartment can provide close to the old town which is around 10 minutes walk.
The tram stop is 3 minutes walk.
Geneva Lake is 15 minutes via public transport.

The kitchen is well equiped and shops are nearby. :)

name: Cozy modern basement apartment 2 bedroom 2 bath
description: Centrally located apartment next to bus tram stops, Pharmacy and multiple grocery stores. Walking distance to a nice park. Walking distance (950 meters) to Main Geneva train station (Gare Cornavin).  Newly built building (2013) and apartment. NO smoking is allowed inside apartment

name: Spacious home in Central Geneva: Live like a Local
description:
Welcome to our beautiful and spacious apartment in the heart of Geneva!
Our 82m2 apartment is the perfect home base for your stay in this charming historic city. With a master bedroom, a study room that can be used as another bedroom, a large living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a separate washroom and bathroom, you'll have all the comforts of home. Plus, with a tramway station just a 2-minute walk away, you can easily explore the many nearby attractions for an unforgettable experience!

name: Grande chambre en plein centre
description:
Large room for rent in the heart of Geneva.

It is located in a luxury apartment, with moldings, beautiful parked, fireplace and high ceiling.

The rented access to the apartment consists of: a spacious entrance overlooking the fully equipped kitchen, the large bedroom and the bathroom.

A focus is on the calm and cleanliness of the space.

A little Golden Retriever, who doesn't bark, also lives on site. His name is Tokyo, and he loves to be cuddled.

name: CITY Ctr King Size bed 70 m2 apt
description: Small apartment in the city center with access to shops on foot. Located about ten meters from the lake. The apartment has a large long size bed. The sober and warm decor will give you the feeling of being at home in a clean and bright place

name: Chambre privée avec bain
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for guests. Bus stop in front of the airport (50). Train 4 min very common.

name: Room in 8th floor appartment with great view
description: Comfortable room in a great location, next to international organizations, centrally located in Geneva. Great view of the famous "jet d'eau" and the lake Geneva.

name: Modern Studio| Central Geneva | Near Train Station
description: Bright, charming and newly renovated apartment, ideally located in Pâquis -- the most central neighbourhood with many choices of restaurants, cafés and grocery stores. The apartment's location is fantastic:  train station (2 minutes by foot), grocery stores (Lidl and Coop) and the tram stop are right outside the door (1 minutes). The lake can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

name: Jolie chambre au coeur de Genève
description:
The apartment is decorated with love and located in the center of Geneva, 15 minutes from the train station. The room is cozy and perfect for few days. Plainpalais is the heart of Geneva's activities: flea market, cafes, shops, you will find everything you need just a stone's throw away.
At the time of booking, I provide you with document containing more than 100 addresses in Geneva, enough to take full advantage of the city's dynamism.

name: Charming and spacious central appartement
description: Enjoy this fabulous accommodation as a couple or family, which offers good moments in view. Central, stylish and spacious ( 100m2), it is close to all amenities.

name: Gorgeous Apartment in the City Center
description:
Amazing appartement, very comfortable and stylish with everything you need for a nice stay.
The apartment is right in the city center!
And I am sure you will fell in love with the view and skylights :)

5 minutes walk from the train station, and the lake!Surrounded by plenty of bars and restaurants, it's the perfect place to stay if you want to sightsee by day and enjoy Geneva's vibrant nightlife by night!

I'm sure you will love it! :)

name: Spacious room in historic old town apartment
description: Have a peaceful stay in this central duplex penthouse apartment in the center (old town) of Geneva. Guests sleep on the mezzazine level (see pictures, including desk & clothes rack, note there is no door), & I sleep downstairs in the living room. Enjoy the rooftop views & Jura mountain sunsets. Outside, you're surrounded by cafes, restaurants, and bars in the old town and Plainpalais, as well as artisanal boutiques, the main city park, and direct buses to the airport/station (all 1-3 mins walk).

name: Bright and stylish apartment
description: Spacious apartment ideal for spending a few quiet days exploring the parks and the city center.

name: Apparemment avec vue sur le lac
description:
The view of the lake is splendid. The apartment is cosi and convenient. The neighborhood is adorable. The location is convenient, 6 min walk to the lake, 3 min walk to the forest, 1 min walk to the train station, 10 min walk to shops (restaurant,bakery,etc.). 15 min by car or transport from Geneva, 15 min by car or transport from Nyon.
Cons: The noises of planes, trains and since this is an old building, the walls are thin, the bathtub and toilet are old and pure but 100% clean.

name: splendid penthouse apartment views of Mont Blanc
description:
Welcome to my splendid penthouse apartment (8th) with one of the most beautiful views of Mont Blanc and the Jura.

Large lounge
Bedroom with double bed
Bathroom with washing machine
Separate toilet
Mezzanine 30 m2 with double bed, shower and toilet.
Equipped kitchen
Two terraces

name: Apartment 1 bedroom furnished - 835000

This apartment is located on the 4th floor newly renovated with an open spaced kitchen that is very well equipped. The living room is welcoming after being redecorated and there is plenty of sunlight coming in during the day.

name: P&R 2 : 2 bedroom, Plainpalais
description:
In the Plainpalais-Carouge area (very close to the city centre).
A beautiful flat on the 4th floor with lift in a 19th century building. A surface of 75m2 composed of two magnificent bedrooms, living/dining room (with balcony), a kitchenette, two shower rooms and a WC. Secure access, a pleasant south-facing balcony.

name: One-bedroom apartment
description:
Located in one of the historical buildings of the Eaux-vives district, this comfortable one bedroom apartment recently renovated and refurnished, offers peace, modernity and tranquility. Both the kitchen and the bedroom have a balcony. The bathroom is equipped with a shower-cabin.

In addition to the many parks nearby, you will enjoy strolling on the nearby quay, as well as the brand new Plage des Eaux-Vives, offering sand, pebbles, and green lawns, with your feet in the water.

name: Design appartment mountain view
description: Contemporary industrial fashion design. 35 m 2 room can accomodate 4 people. Babies welcome. TV, internet, central location, all commoditities within 1 min distance, par , mountain view, netflix offered, spacious equipped kitchen, spacious bathroom/WC, dedicared workspace, wardrobe, entrance hall, vey big balcony with mountain view. Perfect for families with babies and kids, for expatriates, business trips.

name: Entire Apartment in Old Town
description: Have a peaceful stay in this duplex penthouse apartment in the historic center (old town) of Geneva. Outside, you're surrounded by cafes, restaurants, and bars in the old town and Plainpalais, as well as artisanal boutiques, the main city park, and direct buses to the airport/station (all 1-3 mins walk).

name: Bel appartement en plein centre

Crossing apartment with views, two bedrooms, with balcony on the courtyard side, modern with very good standing located close to the United Nations and international organizations, 5 minutes walk from Cornavin train station. Bus stop right across the street to go to Palexpo and the airport.
“Blue Zones” parking spaces are available outside the building. Blue areas are free parking spots for a limited time.

name: A gem closed to Geneva!
description: Beautiful 2-floor apartment with garden close to Geneva city and  10' walking distance to the lake. It has all the amenities closed by and a beautiful park/forest for long walks. We have good bus connections and train to get to Geneva city center in 10'. Bikes available to get around. it takes around 30' to get to city center by bike. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful!  This unique and tranquil getaway.

Within a 15 min walk to the lake and 20 to the UN, nestled in the bourgeois-boheme Grottes area, you will be able to enjoy shops, theatre, cinema, and a vibrant nightlife in Parisian style cafes like Café Gavroche, while at the same time sleep in a safe and quiet street. Huge flat TV, American-style fridge, Swiss king-size bed and luxury chalet ambiance for the cold days when you prefer to stay in. Supermarket & pharmacy nextdoor.

The lake and the river is 2 to 3 minutes walk. The grocery stores and big shopping area is right infront of the building.

You will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Discover Geneva center from a charming 1 BR Apt
description: I am delighted to offer you a spacious apartment for two in a charming and authentic building located near the stunning La Grange Park and Geneva's iconic Water Fountain. My cozy and comfortable apartment is situated in a central location, offering an authentic Swiss living experience - calm, safe, and animated at the same time - that is sure to leave you feeling rejuvenated and refreshed. I am looking forward to welcoming you and making your stay an unforgettable experience.

name: Appartement, piano, billard, jardin.
description: Genève-centre. Duplex cosy. The entire group will have easy access to all sites and amenities from this central home.

name: Private room in a superb flat
description:
Very large private room in a 140sqm flat.
The flat is super central wit a nice view and is decorated with style.
Lots of space available to work from home.
The flat is to be shared with me (37 yrs old professional in finance). I am away all day and usually half of the week and weekends.

name: Luxury 46m2 apartment downtown
description:
Luxury 46sqm apartment in the prestigious area of Champel in Geneva. 2 mins walk from public transport and commodities. The apartment was renovated in 2023 and is fully furnished.

- 1 large living room with an open modern kitchen
- Fully equipped kitchen (Fridge, Freezer, Oven, Dish Washer, Induction plates)
- Washing and drying machine
- Internet through optical fiber is included
- 4K 55'' TV with an Apple TV

Add 300.- for the included services (heating, electricity and internet)

name: Tranquil apt with terrace in Champel Geneva
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located apartment in beautiful Champel, Geneva. Elegantly furnished with a large, sunny outdoor space to relax. Short walk to amenities - grocery stores, cafes, restaurants and a huge park. Two mins walk to public transport to go to the airport/main train station/lake.

17 mins to Geneva main train station (Cornavin) and approx. 30 mins to Geneva airport. 10 mins to the Jet d’Eau. 1.5km from downtown. Very close to HUG and Clinique la Colline, CMU.

name: Bright & Calm family apartment
description:
We are a designer and artist with two small kids. Our home has 2 big bedrooms, 1 with a queen bed and another with a crib but with the possibility of putting a double bed and removing the crib if desired. There are 2.5 bathrooms. The apartment has lots of light because it has multiple windows facing west, NW, & NE. A fully equipped kitchen and a living room (with a smart tv) & dining room with a big library.
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at our centrally-located place.

name: Comfortable Suite - Old Town
description:
Prime & Exclusif Location! Large suite of 39sqm2, in the heart of the Old Town
Amazing view on the St Peters Cathedral
Town, one of the most popular neighborhoods of Geneva
Close to shops, train station, restaurants and the lake

name: New Comfortable Apt - Champel
description:
Apartment in a residential building
Completely Renovated
14 min from train station
In the upscale neighborhood of Champel
Near the city center, the old town, the business district, restaurants, nightlife and the lake

name: Studio minimaliste à Genève.
description: Simplify your life in this peaceful, central space. About ten minutes from Geneva City Center by tram or bus, or on foot. The studio is located in a residential area, so quiet. The studio is suitable for short stays in the city, a so-called "pose-baggage".

name: Grande maison proche aéroport
description:
Enjoy this spacious modern home as a family. We rent out our main home when we go on vacation.

This is the house we live in every day with our three children, which we particularly love.

Close to Geneva airport, it is also close to the city center, very easily accessible by bus or car.

The 5 bedrooms can accommodate up to 9 guests, but the house is ideal for 6 people.

name: coração de Geneve somente MULHEr  Pequeno Quarto.
description:
I DO NOT ACCEPT MEN
You'll be close to everything when you stay at this centrally located place.
Subway transportation facing the door of the house.
Street with several restaurants, bars,supermarkets, theater, museums, universities and various other things.
You'll be able to use the kitchen for coffee or quick meals.
I do not accept that you work at home 🏠
Please 🙏 read the listing and comply with the rules .

name: Studio charmant centre Genève
description: Make life easier at this peaceful, centrally located home.

name: 06 Appartement centre-ville
description: Splendid apartment, with a superb view in the Jura. (Jurassic). Next to Cornavin train station, downtown, various restaurants and shops, the Manor shopping center is right across the street. Lake Geneva and the Old Town are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Chambre à louer chêne Bourg
description: private room in shared apartment with the owner.  quiet and central area, tram stop 2 minutes on foot.

name: Romantic, modern appartement 65m2, visitor parking
description: Modern and comfortable place, 15 minutes to the center, close to French border, parking underground, shopping and tramway close by. One bedroom with king bed and queen sofa for 2 in the living room. 10 minutes and 15 CHF Uber to the airport.

name: Cozy Apartment at the Heart of Geneva
description:
Looking for a cozy place, with walking distance to the lake, as well as restaurants and cafes? Live in this bright apartment, with a huge balcony, and lovely view of the Jura mountains.

The apartment is located in Servette:
- 10 mins walking distance to the train station (Cornavin)
- 15 mins by bus to the airport (direct bus that leaves next to the flat)
- parking garage 2 mins away

The next supermarket (Coop) is about 3 mins away.

name: Oscar Hotel Apartments
description: Stay somewhere upscale near all the sights you're interested in. Airport Near by

name: Lovely Flat in Geneva Downtown
description:
Lovely flat, fully furnished, with 2 balconies, and well located in the heart of Geneva’s downtown, in Plainpalais close to supermarkets, restaurants, Geneva University, Arve River and the Sunday Plainpalais’s market.
The flat includes a large fully-equipped kitchen/dining room (dishwasher & laundry machine), a spacious living room with a balcony, 1 bedroom with a balcony and 2 bathrooms/toilets.
The bedroom includes: a double bed 200x160cm, a desk/chair, wardrobe and it's well decorated.

name: Bright and perfect for families
description: Steps from the lake, playgrounds, and botanical gardens, a spacious and centrally located apartment for both work and play. Three children's bedrooms with raised beds and one master with ensuite. Great balconies for hosting small aperos and family dinners. Private community park in front of the building, public lakefront in the back. Great coffee shops and co-working spaces a short walk.

name: Appartement 89m2 , city center
description:
Enjoy as a family of this fabulous home that offers good times in perspective.
Parquet flooring , high ceiling, in a very sought-after area. Close to the lake and the center .

name: Superbe petit duplex-mezzanine
description: cozy apartment in the combes with exposed beams.  Suitable for 1 person alone. 4mn walk from the lake and close to all shops.

name: Modern flat by the lake/station
description:
Enjoy a comfortable Geneva stay at this centrally-located, newly renovated apartment with all the needed amenities.

The apartment is ideal for couples or single travellers (an extra double sofa bed if needed) in a safe building.

Situated incredibly centrally, the flat is in the middle of a bustling neighbourhood, but is very calm inside. It is 8 minutes from the train station, 3 minutes from the lake, within 100m of 3 large supermarkets, a pharmacy, and multiple bars and restaurants.

name: Appartement 3 chambres - Sous location
description:
A 10-minute walk from the lakefront, this apartment is peaceful with a park for children and amenities suitable for them all around.
The municipality of Bellevue offers everything a family may need (Lake, organic zoo, playgrounds, walks, etc.)
This apartment has 3 large independent bedrooms including a suite with bathroom. The toilet and bathroom are separate and a large balcony accompanies the open plan living / kitchen of more than 40 m2

name: Calme proche des HUG et la vielle ville
description: This apartment will charm you with its tranquility, proximity to the center, universities and especially the hospital (30 seconds walk). It is fully equipped, kitchen with 2 plates, a fridge, a bathroom with shower. The wifi is very good quality.  It is also composed of a dining table, a sofa, coffee table and a TV with its furniture.

name: Charming Loft in Vibrant Geneva Near Lake & ONU
description:
Welcome to your home in Geneva!

This cozy apartment is ideally located near the United Nations, WHO, and WTO. Just 5 minutes from Cornavin Central Station and a 10-minute walk to the beautiful Lake Geneva. With bus stops for routes 5 and 8 only 50 meters away, getting around the city is a breeze. Enjoy the comfort and convenience of this centrally located and well-connected apartment. Perfect for your stay in the international city. Book now and experience the best of Geneva. #GeneveSuisse

name: Cozy spacious apartment with private garden!
description:
Cozy 5-rooms fully furnished 100m2 apartment on the 1st floor of a house located in the green Vandoeuvres area:

- Opened fully-equipped kitchen (stove, oven, microwaves, dishwasher, fridge & freezer)
- Spacious & sun-lit living room with wooden floor
- Dinning area (10 people)
- 3 bedrooms
- Bathroom with double basin & shower
- Mezzanine with convertible two-beds sofa
- Pantry, washing machine and dryer
- Separated restroom
- Spacious terrace with barbecue
- Private Garden
- 2 parking spots

name: Warm and cosy studio
description:
Located in the lively Eaux-Vives district, this large 45m² studio offers a view on park La Grange. It is 600 meters away from the lake and 700 meters away from Geneva's trendy cafés and bars.

You will find a living room with fireplace and Chesterfield sofa, a queen size bed convertible to sofa, a bathroom with bathtub and a small basic equipped kitchen.

The apartment is situated around thirty minutes away from Geneva's airport with public transportation.

name: Cosy Room near University City Center and Markets
description:
Cosy Room in a comfortable and spacious apartment. The apartment is of recent construction and offers high quality standards in kitchen and bathroom.

There's a lot of light and space, large windows and the kitchen is fully equipped.

description:
Enjoy a BEDROOM in a stylish and central accommodation (about 60 m2). Located close to the train station and the lake, you will be in a very lively area, full of restaurants and bars. Close to all amenities and shops. The apartment is on the 3rd floor without elevator elevator.
Your access includes bedroom with double bed(160 cm) and pull-out bed (2 mattresses), kitchen overlooking living room, toilet and bathroom.
I live in the accommodation, I am often absent.

name: Nice Room near University, City Center and Markets

Tram 14 and buses 2, 11, 19, 35, D.
3rd floor with elevator.

Queen-size bed, strong Wi-Fi, and Apple TV.

Suitable for long stays (It is not allowed to put your name on the mailbox for domiciliation purposes or any other administrative procedure).

supermarket opposite, pharmacy, banks, post office, bakery, etc. In the village. One or two interconnecting bedrooms depends on the number of people, 2nd floor, (beware STEEP stairs!). Shared bathroom on the 1st floor

You can reach to Deloitte, PWC, and many UN agencies within 20-25 minutes walk or 10-12 minutes bus ride.

This apartment has entirely be refurbished. It has a balcony and separated kitchen from the living and sleeping area. It is on the 3rd floor without lift it is located in a quiet street. Close to the best restaurants & pubs in town .

Conveniently located to major hubs in the city, landmarks and organizations such as the UN, WHO, among others.

The kitchen is equipped with all the basics you need to cook.

On the second floor of a quiet building.

2 bedrooms Eaux-vives (2 adults, 1 or 2 kids)

You can also work (desk and screen available) and cook at home. There are several shops within 3 and 5 minutes' walk. I'd be delighted to give you some good addresses and ideas of things to discover.

The private cozy room comes with its own private bath.

Fully equipped kitchen with all the necessary utensils and appliances.

Our central location puts you just a 3-minute walk away from the beautiful lake. 10-minute from the train station. Next to the bus stop and close to the United Nations.

It is surrounded by restaurants, bars, and stores, you'll find everything you need just steps away.

My home is a cosy studio on the second floor, ideally situated in Geneva. Two steps from the main station, it will lead you anywhere in the city easily. The airport is only 15 minutes away by train and you can reach the lake by foot in 10 minutes.

The neighbourhood is full of cafés and small businesses, giving a different vibe compared to the rest of the city. You can take advantage of the market on Thursdays if you want to enjoy a local craft beer, a glass of wine or a slice of cheese outside.

name: Best place ever

Also a practical location to reach the  UN, CERN, etc. Convenient stores, restaurants, cinema are in the neighbourhood. I am friendly, flexible and respectful of the private space.

there is no internet on the other hand. there is a TV and an X-box but you have to share the connection with your smartphone to watch it.
