description: The entire group will have easy access to all sites and amenities from this central home.

name: Appartement au Coeur de la Vieille Ville de Geneve
description: This accommodation perfectly located in the heart of the old town of Geneva offers easy access to all sites and amenities. The most coveted street of Geneva, Rue de la foot, is less than a 4-minute walk from the apartment. You can find all the shops, restaurants...

name: Attique avec vue panoramique
description:
The apartment is at the stage of a new building, boasts a 90 m2 terrace serving each room, an incredible view of Geneva, the Salève and the Jura.
The living room and the rooms are fully glazed and equipped with electric blinds and solar canvases on the living room side.
The decor is contemporary, mixing wood, leather and metal. 8 minutes from the city center (Tram at the end of the street)
20 minutes from the airport via Ceva train station which is located 2 steps from the accommodation

name: City Center Oasis: Lake View Gem
description: Discover a hidden gem in the heart of Eaux-Vives, Geneva's vibrant city center. This special place is a mere 2 minutes away from the picturesque lake and a short 5-minute walk to the awe-inspiring Geneva water jet. This full flat rental offers a cozy bedroom, a living room with a comfortable couch for two extra guests, and a world of dining and entertainment options right at your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the city's charm, indulge in culinary delights, and experience the vibrant nightlife.

name: Comfy & modern appartment
description:
Spacious & bright apartment 10 minutes from Geneva. The apartment offers two bedrooms with two bathrooms. A large living room with open kitchen. It is located in the country side surrounded by nature with a balcony with a small lounge area.
Bus stop 4 minutes walking distance with direct buses to Carouge e Bachet. Ideal for family, underground parking included.

name: Villa traditionnelle genevoise
description: Simplify your life in this peaceful, central space.

name: Appartement Genève
description: Enjoy the simplicity of this quiet and central accommodation.

name: Spacious 2 bedroom duplex
description:
A rare Geneva find! Gorgeous duplex beside a park in the vibrant Servertte neighborhood.

Only a 15 minute walk to Geneva’s historic centre, great shopping (from boutiques to grand department stores)…and the lake!

Transport links and supermarkets are a few minutes walk away.

name: 3 chambres 3 lits jardin, Parking Caméra extérieur
description:
This peaceful home offers a relaxing stay for the whole family.
Private car park
Outdoor surveillance camera.

name: Joli appartement
description: Relax in this quiet and stylish space.

name: Appartement d'exception au coeur des Eaux-Vives
description: Ultra-modern and very well-equipped apartment in the lively and central Eaux-Vives district, 50 meters from the lake and 15 minutes walk from Cornavin station. Beautiful wooded terrace of 20 m2 in complete calm.

name: Petit bijou en Vieille Ville
description: 72 m2 apartment at the heart of Old Town and 2 steps from the low streets. Shops, buses, restaurants nearby.

name: Cosy and central 2-bedroom apt
description:
Cosy apartment with everything you would need for a comfortable stay in Geneva!

Spacious and centrally located with lots of of public transport and supermarkets nearby.

15 minutes away from the airport by public transport and 5 minutes by bus from the city center and Gare Cornavin Central train station.

I am available to give suggestions for things to do in Geneva and make sure you enjoy your stay!

name: Upper floor large double room with balcony
description: Bright living-room equipped with comfy double sofa-bed and balcony in a 5th-storey period apartment served by a lift, located 100m from Rue de Carouge, 50m from the river Arve, 3 tram stops from Plainpalais, which is the heart of Geneva. The apartment features : wi-fi, splendid period wood flooring, habitable old-style kitchen and bathroom. You will share the flat with me, working full time nearby. See you soon!

name: Executive Suite - GVA Heart
description: This sunny and spacious flat is located in the exclusive Eaux-Vives just one block from the Jet d'Eaux with one lovely bedroom an open kitchen, toilet and bathtub. Close to everything and a must stay for those new or old to beautiful Geneva.

name: Nice and cosy flat in Eaux-Vives
description:
Fresh and really well located in the Eaux-Vives area close to all the sites, restaurants, bars and amenities, just a stone's throw from the Jet d'eau, Jardin Anglais, the Flower Clock and as well as other tourist attractions in Geneva.
Well served by public transport, the flat is
-2 minutes' walk from TPG stops;
-5 minutes' walk from Eaux-Vives Gare;
-10 minutes' walk from Cornavin station.
-30 minutes by bus from the Airport

name: Beau Studio au centre de Genève
description:
This perfectly located home offers easy access to all sights and amenities.
Close to "Jonction" station with several buses and a tram.
15 min walk to Bel-Air
10 min by tram from the train station
5 min walk from Rhone beach
Perfect for a single person or couple.

name: Chambre à louer Eaux-Vives
description:
Furnished room for rent at the center of Geneva (left bank) available between July 15 and August 15.
3-minute walk to the Lake, 5-minute walk to Rive or Gare des Eaux-vives.
Access to bathroom and kitchen allowed.
Laundry room in the building. No wifi.

name: Free Parking! Budget Apartment for 3 people
description: Quiet and well-located apt, perfect for 3 guests. Some wear and tear on it. Situated in an old building with affordable rent prices, it offers easy access to both the city center and Procter & Gamble,making it an ideal choice also for business travelers. The apartment features a spacious terrace. With a 15-minute commute, you can reach the bustling city center, where you'll find a wealth of attractions, shops, and restaurants to explore.

name: Appartement hôtel particulier
description:
Simplify your life in this peaceful and central home, from there everything is within walking distance.
Located on the 1st floor of a 17th century mansion, in the very center of this beautiful city, the very spacious apartment will bring you calm and relaxation before going out for a meal in the old town where restaurants abound.
On-site parking is available on request 50.-/24 h

name: Bello appartement très charmant
description: This stylish home is perfect for trips to two, will be 10 min from the airport, 20 minutes from the city center, all transportation is easily accessible, shop, parking, and lots of green area for sheath and do a trail inside the forest.

name: Spacious and stylish flat, 1 min walk from lake
description:
Enjoy this stylish apartment (70 sqm) situated in the vibrant Eaux-Vives disctrict.
Just moments away from iconic landmarks like the Jet d'eau, Baby Plage, and the enchanting flowery clock. Stroll through the nearby Parc de la Grange or explore the city.
Excellent restaurants and bars at your doorstep.
Connected by public transport, the apartment is 1-minute walk from TPG transportation stops, 5 minutes from Eaux-Vives Gare, and a leisurely 15-minute walk along the lake from Cornavin Station.

name: Appart de charme au bord du lac
description:
Charming apartment with a "child" bedroom bed 140x200. A bright living room with a double bed 160x200 in an alcove. (2 additional mattresses 90x200 available under the living room bed)
The apartment is on a pedestrian street, 20 seconds from Lake Geneva and the iconic Bains des Pâquis. Awesome neighborhood, with restaurants, terraces, food store, etc. 5 minutes from the train station.
The only thing we ask is a little watering of our plants.

name: Appartement centre-ville Genève
description:
This unique accommodation is in the city center of Geneva. Great location and close to everything on foot.

It is accessed with an elevator with panoramic views of the lake, water jet, the great cathedral of Geneva.

This home is in a complex with the most upscale restaurants/ bars/ lounge in the city.

The location is very well served by public transportation.

Although it is perfectly centered, once in the apartment you will hear absolutely no noise.

name: Chambre privé a Genève
description: Spacious room with 3 sleeping spaces in the most central location of Geneva Near the train station and Lake Geneva (Quartier Rouge👠💋)

name: Charmant appartement
description:
Make life easier at this peaceful, centrally located home.
Next to Gare des Eaux-Vives, lake 10 min walk, large park nearby, this charming apartment with balcony is close to all amenities.

name: Cozy and quiet 2BR appartment
description: Appartement situated in the heart of the beautiful and green neighborhood of Champel. Ten minutes walk to the train station, five minute walk to Parc Bertrand. Two bedrooms, one queen size bed for adults and two uniques single beds for kids. Big kitchen fully equipped, a nice little desk from the 70' to work in the living room. Bathroom and wc separated. Cosy little balcony for the morning coffee.

name: Unique Guesthouse in Collonge
description:
A very unique Guesthouse for up to 6 guests. Located in the tranquil village of Collonge-Bellerive with views overlooking Lake Geneva, this newly renovated guesthouse boasts 3 bedrooms. Its a great place to stay for long or short term whether in quest of a quiet getaway or if you are in town for business.

We are only a 14 minute Bus or Car Ride into Geneva's town centre, bus stop is a 3 minute walk away.

name: Bright 1 Bedroom Apt Near Lake
description:
Charming apartment, carefully designed to offer optimal comfort, located in the heart of the trendy Eaux-Vives district in Geneva, just one block away from the beautiful Lake. With 1 spacious bedroom, this is perfect for a couple or a solo traveler seeking comfortable and modern accommodation. The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen and a large terrace.

Amazing location: within minutes of walking, you'll find numerous restaurants, shops, 24/7 stores, supermarkets, pharmacies, etc...

name: Linda habitación a 20 minutos del centro Ginebra
description:
You will love the brightness, space and terrace of this charming accommodation in Thônex.
The bedroom has a large window that lets in beautiful natural brightness. Whether you're working, reading a book, or just relaxing, you'll enjoy this warm, sunny vibe.
We speak French, Spanish and English.

name: Appartement plein centre-ville
description: This perfectly located home offers easy access to all sights and amenities. It is located on the outskirts of the Plainpalais Great Plain.

name: Logement charmant et confortable
description:
Beautiful studio located on Avenue de Châtelaine in Geneva next to the Balexert shopping center. Private indoor parking available. 5th floor with elevator.

This apartment is well arranged and fully equipped, creating a comfortable and functional area.
; A washer dryer - ideal for long term; a sofa bed - ideal for 2 additional seats.

This apartment is in a great location between the airport and Cornavin Station.

name: Chambre à loué Genève-Eaux-Vives
description:
Comfortable, bright and design room located in the heart of Geneva in the charming Eaux-Vives district.
On the 5th floor with elevator access.
Bedroom with partial view of the water jet.
5 minutes from Lake Geneva, nice neighborhood with lots of trendy bars and restaurants.
15 mins from Cornavin Station (bus 6),
30 minutes away from Geneva airport (bus 10)
10 minutes walking to the city center and the Old Town.

name: "Luffy" Great Apartment in Downtown Geneva!
description:
My place is good for solo/couples working/studying abroad in Geneva, my place is available for a couple weeks/months.

Ideally situated in Geneva downtown, you'll be able to have everything around, restaurants, cafes, stores, bars, clubs, parks, etc.

Lovely and quite neighborhood!

Transportation is in front of the building. It will take;

5min. to Pont-Rouge, 9min. to Geneva Old Town, 13min. to Geneva Train Station, 19min. to United Nations.

(Apartment will be without personal belongs)

name: Chambres côte à côte2 sans ascenseur Hôtel Nations
description:
In the heart of the City of Geneva, Hotel Les Nations has a quiet location close to two large parks. From there you reach Cornavin Station in just 5 minutes and in a few steps you can reach international organizations.

The hotel has 73 modern rooms with an attractive design. We are also equipped with free wifi.

name: Cozy room near lake and station
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Leisurely walk to train station and lake in under 10 minutes. Many transport means available just a few steps away.

name: Beautiful one-bedroom apartment in Carouge 741000
description: Beautiful art deco apartment furnished full of charm ideally located in one of the artistic districts of Geneva. Enjoy a modern decoration in a historical building. The apartment is composed of a pleasant living room nicely decorated, a large and quiet double bedroom overlooking the courtyard, a bathroom with bathtub and a large fully equipped kitchen. The toilets are separated.

name: Chambre Double 2 sans ascenseur Hotel Nations
description:
In the heart of the City of Geneva, Hotel Les Nations has a quiet location close to two large parks. From there you reach Cornavin Station in just 5 minutes and in a few steps you can reach international organizations.

The hotel has 73 modern rooms with an attractive design. We are also equipped with free wifi.

name: Renovated studio with Rhone view
description: You will have a great time at this comfortable place.

name: Appartement élégant et central à Genève
description: Enjoy a stylish and central home, you have public transport, shops and many restaurants in the immediate vicinity of the apartment. It is a bright 85m2 1st floor apartment with elevator. It consists of a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, with all kitchen utensils, cutlery and appliances. There are also 2 beautiful bedrooms, a bathroom with bath, toilet and sink, an independent guest room.

description:

name: Apartamento en Ginebra
description: Enjoy the simplicity of this quiet, central home, for a weekend get away or for work.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Chambre double centre Genève
description: Exceptional location in the center of Geneva but in a quiet street, close to public transport (three minutes walk), shopping streets, direct connection to the train station, private bathroom with Japanese toilet and bathtub ,  very close university and university hospital, lots of restaurants in this trendy area of Plainpalais, .

name: Gorgeous room in Downtown Geneva 1
description:
Room in a centrally located bright and spacious 4 pieces design flat, 2 min walking distance from Cornavin train station. The flat consists of two bedrooms, a big living room, dining room, and kitchen with dishwasher, a large balcony with a beautiful view, a bathroom with washing machine and a separated WC.
The visitors will benefit from an easy access to all sites and amenities from this super central location.

name: Gorgeous room in Downtown Geneva 2
description:
Room in a centrally located bright and spacious 4 pieces design flat, 2 min walking distance from Cornavin train station. The flat consists of two bedrooms, a big living room, dining room, and kitchen with dishwasher, a large balcony with a beautiful view, a bathroom with washing machine and a separated WC.
The visitors will benefit from an easy access to all sites and amenities from this super central location.

name: Closest to Cornavin and the lake
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.
Variety of restaurants and shops in the surrounding area.
The apartment is well distributed and cozy.

name: Room in Eaux-Vives, Geneva
description:
Welcome to our apartment in the vibrant and central Eaux-Vives neighborhood in Geneva!
The room is furnished with a queen size bed, two bed side tables and a dresser.
Bathroom, kitchen and living-room are shared with us.
The apartment is on the 1st floor, no lift available.

Centrally located:
- 2 min walk from Eaux-Vives train station
- 5 min walk from the lake (Jet d'Eau)
- 5 min from major public transports (Villereuse, Place des Eaux-Vives, Rue 31 Decembre)

name: Cosy flat in the heart of Geneva
description:
This apartment is a cocoon of tranquility in the heart of Geneva and its liveliness and close to the Lake.

Whether for a stopover or a longer stay, it is ideally located to discover the city on foot and easily accessible by transport from the train station or airport.

The apartment features a large bedroom, an equipped kitchen, a living room with sofa bed and dining area as well as a bathroom.
It is on the third floor without elevator.

name: Charming riverside retreat for 2
description:
Welcome to our charming riverside retreat, ideally suited in the vibrant heart of Geneva's Plainpalais district. This warm and welcoming space, designed for one but can accommodate 2, offer a breathtaking view of the mountains - mount Saleve and a river - River Arve.

For nights you choose to dine in, you'll have access to a fully equipped kitchen. We also have a washing machine for you to use.

A stones throw away from our doorstep is a tramstop offering connectivity to the rest of the city.

name: Un écrin de verdure
description: Quiet, greenery 10 minutes from the city and 3 min from the Lake

name: Chambre Lux côté do lac
description: An elegant experience in this well-located place features a stylish experience.

name: A Large Studio Apartment in the Heart of Geneva.
description: A charming Studio Apartment in the heart of Geneva, with every provision you need for a comfortable stay in Geneva city. The bus stand (Bus 3) is less than a minute's walk, and the train station is about 2 mins. Bus/Train ride is 5/10mins from the city center (central station). You have Migros & Coop less than 3 & 5mins walk resp. for your shopping. Enjoy the sunset and the picturesque view of Mont Saleve, all from the balcony. For a stay that lacks nothing.

name: Maison sur 2 étages avec jardin
description: This peaceful home offers a relaxing stay for the whole family.

name: Nice design apartment in Geneva
description: The decoration of this 2 bedrooms apartment has a modern design and nice furniture. It is very well located in the heart of Eaux-Vives neighborhood, near the public transport and the lake.

name: Sunny Top-floor Apartment
description: Sunny 75m2 top-floor (with elevator) apartment in the heart of Geneva in the Plainpalais district (tram/bus stop is Cirque) with a pleasant view of the city and Geneva’s main cathedral.

name: Top Floor Bright 1 Bedroom Apartment in Eaux-Vives
description:
Renovated and cosy apartment perfect for one or two people wanting to enjoy being in the center of Eaux-Vives.
Lots of light since it's on the top floor with big windows.
2 small balconies to enjoy the sunlight and the views (nice view of the Salève).
Perfect location to walk only 5 minutes to Park La Grange / Park des Eaux-Vives. 2 Minutes to go to the lake.
Very well located in central Geneva, 10 minutes walk to the shops, etc.
Lovely neighbourhood at night with nice bars and restaurant.

name: L'Avenir by Interhome
description:
All discounts are already included, please go ahead and book the property if your travel dates are available. Below please see all the listing details
"L'Avenir", 4-room apartment on 2 levels. Object suitable for 3 adults + 2 children. Beautiful and tasteful furnishings: living/dining room with TV. Open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, toaster, kettle, freezer, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (Nespresso)). Sep. WC. Upper floor: 1 room with...

name: Cozy studio apartment in Geneva
description: Very nice studio, fully equipped with a beautiful and large kitchen fully equipped.The living room is full of charm with its luminosity and its configuration in half circle. Finally, a small bedroom with a bed and a dressing room make up this flat. The studio is really well situated in the heart of Geneva, near all commodities.

name: Proche de toute commodité
description:
This peaceful and family-friendly place to stay is made up of:
- Furnished kitchen with small balcony
- Bedroom 1, double bed
-Bedroom 2, crib + mattress
-room 3, two single beds
- bathroom with bathtub, separate toilet

Location and points of interest:

- the apartment is located next to Chêne-Bourg train station (CEVA)
- 15 minutes from Lake Geneva
- 20 minutes walk from Rue du Rhone (shopping street)

name: Charming room with a balcony
description: Located just 15 minutes by direct public bus from Geneva's city center, we offer this charming room with a beautiful view. The house is surrounded by a large, well-maintained garden with two terraces, perfect for reading and relaxing.

name: Lavish 4BDR Oasis - Lake access Collonge-Bellerive
description:
Welcome to our serene and sumptuous 3-bedroom oasis, nestled in the highly desired neighborhood of Collonge-Bellerive, Geneva. This splendid house offers a truly unique experience with its direct access to the picturesque LAKE LEMAN (50 meters away) through the exquisite garden while having the opportunity to enjoy delightful beach activities, the local camping amenities, and the lake restaurant.
This home offers accommodation for up to 7 guests in a prime convenient location.

name: P&R Luxurious studio garden
description:
Luxurious studio with a spacious garden, composed with a fully equipped kitchen, living room with dinning table, sofa and a king size bed. Access to a balcony and a garden of 20m2. The dressing room completes the bathroom.
Washing & dryer available.

name: Cozy & high quality bed &bedroom
description: My bedroom is a Japanese-style with a big and extra comfortable Japanese bedroom. The bedroom is  very spacious with a unique beautiful style and original decoration.  The atmosphere is quiet and you will sleep soundly. This is a place that is lived which means there will be items that belong to me. This bedroom is very precious so please don't touch or disturb anything.

name: Studio près du centre-ville.
description: This perfectly located home offers easy access to all sights and amenities.

name: Appartement privé dans une villa
description: This peaceful home with a garden offers a relaxing stay on the outskirts of Geneva. Easy access to city center in 5 minutes with the Léman Express. Lancy-Bachet train station is only a 10 minute walk away (nearby buses also make it possible to get there). This home has a separate entrance.

name: Superbe appartement, 5min lac
description: Discover Geneva from this renovated apartment in the heart of Eaux-Vives. 5 minutes from Lake Geneva, near shops and restaurants. Relax in the large living room with moldings, prepare a meal in the spacious kitchen, rest in the bathroom with bath and shower, and enjoy a good night's sleep in the quiet and spacious room. An unforgettable and comfortable stay awaits you in this urban oasis.

name: Chambre dans appart. familial
description: This family home is close to all sights and amenities. We live in this apartment with my two children aged 1 and 6. So we will only accept people who are trustworthy and who like to be in the presence of children;-)

name: Room in villa close to UN/GVA
description: Private quiet room in villa near the UN and other international organizations. It is close to the airport and has good transport connectivity with nearby bus stop. There is a shared bathroom and kitchen available with all modern amenities. Breakfast and pick up also available on request.

name: Luxury apartment ideally located
description:
Relax in this quiet and stylish space.
High standing apartment, located in a building with park and sauna pools.
On a high floor, this very bright apartment is conveniently located on the left bank, both close to the center, the lake, Cologny and the La Grange and Les Eaux Vives. Go to this quiet and stylish accommodation.

name: Quiet paradise in the old town
description: Discover our authentic apartment  in Geneva's historic old town, located at just 10 minutes walk to the lake and surrounded by  museums, cafes, shops and restaurants. You will enjoy our calm apartment surrounded by nature and birds in the inner courtyard. During your stay, you will be able to experience the best of both worlds : relish the vibrant city, while savoring the tranquility and peacefulness  of the apartment.

name: Explore international Geneva !
description: Nested in the heart of the international Geneva, 8 minutes from the airport and the train station by bus. The lake is just 10 minutes away.

name: Fully renovated and equipped studio apartment!
description: Fully renovated and furnished studio perfectly located in the Paquis district, offering easy access to all sites and services (supermarket, streetcar, bus nearby). A 5-minute walk from the Cornavin train station and 2 minutes from Lake Geneva. The area offers a wide choice of restaurants and bars.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Clair Matin - chambre d'hôte
description:
We offer charming accommodation in a traditional Geneva villa, both peaceful and very well connected.
You will find easy access to all amenities: shops, restaurants, transportation, parks, etc.
Our villa is a short walk to Navazza Park and College de Saussure, close to tram line 14 (coming from Cornavin station) and different bus lines (including several direct lines to the airport).

name: Private Room in Eaux-Vives
description:
Welcome to this spacious apartment, located in a private street without traffic in a green area very calm, in the charming neighborhood of Eaux-Vives.
10 min. walk from Lake Geneva (Jet d'Eau), 4min. from train station Eaux-Vives, 6 min Old town and City center.
Bus stop close to doorstep (direct to Airport) and city center,
Explore the city of Geneva by walk and take full advantage of the spot.

name: Duplex au centre ville
description:
Magnificent super well located duplex apartment has a living room to eat a living room, a balcony with a nice view, a kitchen on the first floor and on the second floor, a bedroom and a bathroom.
Below the building you have a super Spanish restaurant supermarkets one minute walk away and parking spots nearby.
It is located in the plainpalais neighborhood 10 minutes from Gare de Cornavin

Thanks to the central location of this home, you and yours will have everything at your fingertips.

name: Chambre proche de l’aéroport.
description: Room with shared access baths toilet and kitchen.

name: Terrasse privée avec vue sur les montagnes - CERN+
description:
Enjoy the charm and calm of a large bright room with a private terrace overlooking the Jura and Mont Blanc.

Just steps from tram line 18, direct access to the city center (20 min from Cornavin station), CERN (5-10 min by Tram or by car).

Close to the airport, quick and easy access: approx. 10 min by car, approx. 25 min by Bus/tram.

King size bed very comfortable. TV and office in the room. Shops and restaurant nearby.

name: Charming flat near the lake
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. 2 minutes on foot to the train station, 3 minutes at foot to the beach, at the center of Geneva (Paquis) , many restaurants, bars near, lake of leman 3 minutes only, jet d’eau only 10 minutes from here at foot. Shopping at 3 minutes example maigris, Lidl, coop, denner at only 3 minutes on foot

Spacious bed room & living room with big office( desk & shelf) for business or other work.

You can enjoy here

name: Stylish Lakeside Home by the Jet d'Eau
description:
Situated in the heart of the city in the Eaux-Vives neighbourhood, only footsteps away from the lake & Jet d'eau, enjoy this newly renovated and bright 4th floor 1-bedroom home.

Next door you will find my favourite Italian speciality shop with a great selection of wine & snacks. This home has been tastefully decorated and furnished, ready for you to enjoy :)


Transport links within 200 meters
Tram 12, 17
Bus 2, 6, 7, 9, 10, 33, 271, A, E, G
Ferry terminal

name: Deluxe 2 bedrooms apartment in Champel 331000
description: Well located and surrounded by a nice park this apartment offers calm; centrality and greenness. The 2 bedrooms allow a small family to be comfortably installed with a spacious kitchen and balcony. This modern decoration allows feeling space, luminosity and comfort.

name: Spacious Loft studio surrounded by greenery
description:
Newly renovated and spacious top floor studio apartment in Versoix. Fully furnished with a kitchen and washing machine. Living area ca. 40m2 with large terrace and view of the forest. Access to garden with BBQ possible.
Excellent public transport connections to Geneva (UN district, downtown airport). 5-8 min walk to buses 54 and 50. 17-min walk to Versoix train station.
Parking extra fee: 10chf/day, 50chf/week, 100chf/month
Mattress for 3rd guest available on request, extra fee 25chf/day

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Chambre d'hôtes à Genève
description:
Charming bed and breakfast located in Chêne-Bougeries.
With a private bathroom, a large dressing room and an independent entrance with a large south-facing balcony.

name: Well design apartment in Geneva
description: This unique place is close to all the sights and amenities, making it easy to plan your visit.

name: Cozy Studio in City Center
description:
Cozy studio located in the heart of Geneva on a pedestrian street, filled with coffee shops and restaurants. Within walking distance of trams and buses, 5 minutes from the old town, and just 15 minutes from Lake Geneva.

Ideally suited for one person or a couple. Upon arrival, you will receive a complimentary Geneva Transport Card. This card enables you to use public transport free of charge in Geneva for the duration of your stay.

Bed linen and bath towels are provided for your comfort.

name: charmant appartement 2 pers.
description:
Enjoy a stylish and central home in a lively area of Les Acacias, on the edge of Carouge.
This cozy apartment can accommodate 2 people in a 140 cm bed, large kitchen and convenient bathroom.

name: Appartement Exceptionnel View - 1 min du Jet d'eau
description:
Glad to introduce you to our beautiful apartment located in an amazing neighborhood with Vives waters, just a 2-minute walk from the famous Jet d 'eau.

Great location: Enjoy a vibrant neighborhood
Peace assured: Located in an inner courtyard, you will enjoy absolute serenity.
It has all the necessities as well as a balcony, a piano for amateurs, a bike room, a washing machine etc.
Discretion requested.

name: Chambre Central
description: Make life easier at this peaceful, centrally located home.

name: Joli appartement avec balcon
description: Nice apartment centered 5 min walk to train station, 10 min walk to lake and Rhone Transportation 2 min away (bus and tram). Restaurants, bars, and supermarkets in the area.  The accommodation is composed of a spacious bedroom, an entrance/living room, a large kitchen and a large balcony. The apartment is very bright (south). The area is close to the caves, pasquis and downtown area. Lively neighborhood. Ideal for tourist or business travel

name: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment
description:

description: Our apartment is perfect for a couple and a child! A convenient kitchen, a large living room with the possibility of putting a single bed, a bathroom with bathtub, a beautiful bedroom and a terrace, all decorated by us, in a historic building from the 1950s! It is located on the 6th floor with a view of the Salève and is very close to the Eaux-vives train station. There is work downstairs on the terrace side, so a little noisy during the day (from 7am to 4:30 pm- hence reasonable price).

name: Lumineux Appartement au Centre

Grocery and supermarket 5 minutes walk away. Fully equipped kitchen, coffee maker, microwave, toaster, dishwasher, washing machine, TV, Internet available.

Only 4 minutes walk from the lake and 1 minute walk from Parc La Grange. The bus stop (line 6 and 2) is only 3 minutes away (Merle-d'Aubigné stop).

This 1 bedroom flat is ideal for a couple or a single person looking to stay in one of the most exclusive and central areas of Geneva.

Apartment is bathed in light and in an eco-friendly building with regulated temperature - cool in the summer and warm in the winter.

In case you read the reviews and you are wondering: our lovely cat 🐱 unfortunately no longer lives with us.

name: Au premier
description:
Discover another Geneva
Come in! The door to this listed building is a bit heavy. Take the elevator from time to time. At the first, it will be the left door. I will probably be here to welcome you. Oak floors, fireplace, windows on the four cardinal corners… Of course, time has left its traces everywhere and the shared bathroom is of modest dimensions. But you are in a place that talks about our history, that speaks human language.
Welcome!

name: Room in colorful 2 bedrooms
description: Room for rent in a peaceful, central, cozy and colorful 94m2 2 bedrooms appartement close to international organisations and the train station

name: Cosy room in the city center.  Instant Booking
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Spacious room in the city center.  Instant Booking
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Stylish room in the city center.  Instant Booking
description: This sunny attic room provides a king-size double bed, nestled in the top floor of our charming 2-floor apartment. Accessible via stairs, this room features unique slanted windows that fill the space with natural light and fresh air, creating a serene atmosphere. You will find on the same level a semi-private bathroom, with the spacious common areas downstairs. With the kitchen and living room below, your room remains quiet and undisturbed, perfect for a short stay in Geneva.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Enjoy the amazing view
description: This stylish place is close to must-see destinations. Direct access to the airport and City centre and train station from the bus.  Nice and quite area for the lovers of hiking, jogging and free show for Geneva Fontaine, the sunset and the sunrise in the "Cité de Calvin". From the living room and the kitchen you will experience the most complete view of Geneva Canton... kind of control tower.

name: chambre tranquille et spacieuse.
description: Enjoy an elegant and central accommodation. close to all comforts, bus, tram passes in front of the entrance of the building. Airport, Cornavin station nearby. multiple store and shopping center nearby. the U.N. and lots of other international organizations nearby, ideal for your business trips or meetings.

name: Appartement spacieux à 15 minutes du jet d'eau
description: Welcome to this charming apartment in Geneva, perfect for two people. Its large, bright living room and equipped kitchen offer a modern and functional setting. The bedroom adjoining the bathroom promises comfort and privacy. Perfect for a successful urban getaway, just 15 minutes from the iconic water jet.

name: Studio lumineux avec balcon
description: Relax at this unique home. In which you can play, cook, rest or work in total tranquility. 5 minutes from public transport, which will take you in 20 minutes to the airport or Cornavin train station, and in 15 minutes to the Nations district, the apartment is easy to access and also offers a parking space. The lake is within a 15-minute walk, as is the biopark. (Possibility of a double bedroom in sup.)

name: Chambre dans coloc
description:
In Vésenaz, with all shops, near bus G, G + 38, 39, 20 minutes from the center, electric bikes and scooters available, very good kitchen, laundry and sanitary facilities. Large garden, wifi, printer.
Less than 20 minutes from Rive with G,G+ bus,E electric bikes available
kitchen with extraordinary amenities, oven, steam oven, plancha, dishwasher, 3 fridges and 3 freezers, full of appliances, deep fryer, robots, etc. TV, internet, large garden

name: Private Studio kitchen-Toilet
description:
Thonex, Geneva

Fully furnished 32 sq.m studio apartment with 1 bedroom, small kitchen, and fitted bathroom.
Location: Opposite of Thonex Commercial Complex
Nearby: Denner (next door), Coop (opposite), Aldi (one tram stop away)
Transport: Tram 12/17, stops at the building, Train Chene-Bourg station 7 mins with direct connection to central station.
View: 4th-floor studio with a view of Saleve mountain

name: Charming two bedroom apartment
description: Welcome to my newly refurbished Japanese-style apartment! With two bedrooms accommodating up to four guests, a serene balcony, and a prime location just 600m from the Cornavin train station, my appartement offers convenience and tranquility in the heart of the city. Easy access to public transport, including trams and buses, ensures you can explore with ease. Plus, a variety of dining options and shops are just steps away, adding to the vibrant city experience.

name: Room in a charming apartment
description: Welcome to my newly refurbished Japanese-style apartment! This inviting space provides a comfortable retreat after a day of city exploration. Conveniently located just 600m from the train station, it's the perfect home base for your urban adventures. With easy access to public transport options like trams and buses, discovering the city's charms is a breeze. Additionally, you'll find a variety of dining venues and shops nearby, ensuring you have everything you need for a memorable stay.

name: Apartment in Cornavin
description:
Exceptional apartment located in the heart of the district of Grottes.
Enjoy the comfort of being in the most accessible place in Geneva, close to the station and surrounded by parks.
10 minutes walk from Lake Geneva and 3 minutes walk from Cornavin station, you will find this spacious and beautiful apartment in a comfortable and quiet building with an elevator.

name: Chambre,très bien située.
description: enjoy a spacious, well-lit, quiet and well-located room; Close to supermarkets, restaurants and integration venues. Nearby parks and libraries.

name: Belle chambre calme plein centre douche privative
description:
Quiet and bright 10 m2 room in the center (3 Rive tram stops) in the Eaux-Vives district
Gare des Eaux-Vives 5 mins away
Tram 12 and 17-5 mins
Bus 1, 9, 33, A 5 mins away
The apartment is located in a quiet and residential area.
Private Shower Room
We live with a Norwegian cat and soon a toy poodle will come to expand the family (in August 2024).
Access to a beautiful terrace (13m2) facing trees and squirrels (unique in the city center)

name: Maison moderne à Genève/Veyrier
description: in pretty traditional village, beautiful quiet spacious house with garden and jacuzzi 15 minutes from the city center by bus/car/bike.

description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.

name: Central 2 bedrooms apartment - 956000
description:
Large contemporary two bedrooms of 75 m2, located in a historical residence close to all amenities, public transport, shops . Sober and contemporary decoration: sofa, furniture and design lights.The kitchen is fully equipped and the bathroom has a bathtub and a washing-machine. It also has separate WC.

Ideally located, this flat is situated within 10 min. of the United Nations by public transportation and near to the Migros of la Servette at 5 min. walk.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Belle-Vie - Grande suite, salle de bains privée
description:
Belle-Vie - la parenthèse nature

Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the Geneva countryside in our charming bed and breakfast. Our home offers a peaceful break for guests looking for calm and natural beauty in a green setting.

This tastefully decorated 27m2 suite offers all modern comforts in a pleasant setting, with panoramic views, free Wi-Fi, seating area and workspace.

A delicious homemade breakfast awaits you on request and for an additional fee.

name: Appartement-studio Eaux-vives
description:
This perfectly located home offers easy walking access to all historical sites, shops , offices , city center, lakefront , white water park, restaurants , bars , nightclub.
Very well connected by public transport: CEVA -Gare Eaux-Vives tram 12-17 , taxi stop Bus:2-9-6-25-10( airport )

name: Atypical flat in Geneva - 314000
description: This renovated 1 bedroom apartment is situated in a lively district close to the train station, the international organisations and some consulting firms. It is well equipped, completely furnished and well connected to public transports.

name: Studio in Center with Balcony
description:
Furnished 27m2 studio apartment in an excellent location opposite the Plainpalais plain, a stone's throw from the University of Geneva, shops and public transport.
The studio is ideal for students or trainees.

Facilities: two beds (bedding included)-possibility of installing 1 double bed (included), large wardrobe, desk, two bedside tables, fully equipped kitchenette and bathroom with WC.

Wi-Fi access is included in the rent.
There is a laundry room on the first floor of the building.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
name: Chambre d'hôtes au centre-ville
description: This charming room offers quick access to shops; popular restaurants and public transportation. 10 minutes walk from Lake Geneva and 5 minutes from CFF Cornavin Station. Convenient for people with occasional meetings with the different organizations in Geneva or for work.

name: Chambre cocooning
description: Fully renovated high-end apartment, ideally located near the lake and train station. This bright accommodation includes one stylish bedroom and large window, a modern bathroom with a walk-in shower, a spacious living room with a comfortable sofa, and a fully equipped kitchen. Experience this cozy, contemporary setting in the heart of the city, perfect for relaxation or business stays. Renting out the room now for unparalleled comfort!

name: high end, central, comfortable
description: Fully renovated high-end apartment for complete rental, ideally situated near the lake and train station. Features three stylish bedrooms, two modern bathrooms with walk-in showers, a spacious living room with a cozy sofa, and a fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy this contemporary, comfortable setting in the city's heart, perfect for relaxation or business. Book now for unparalleled comfort!

name: Bright & spacious 1BDR apartment near the lake
description:
This is a very bright and spacious one-bedroom apartment. It is equipped with a queen-size bed, a sofa bed (160x200), a full kitchen, coffee machines, a dishwasher, a washer and dryer, TV, and internet.

Literally 2 min walk to the lac and to one of the popular beaches in Geneva. located in the midst of nature, great for light hiking.

Train station at 1min walk, 10 minutes to downtown Geneva, 7 min to Geneva airport by taxi. Major groceries stores and restaurants within a walking distance.

name: Cozy apartment close to city center
description: This is a studio apartment with a separate kitchen, bathroom and entrance. It is very close to old town or city center. Next to the building there is a bus stop with direct buses going to the city center, airport or UN. This is a perfect apartment for someone visiting Geneva for professional reasons. Oh, and there is a beautiful park just 3 mins away from the apartment if you enjoy morning/ evening runs/ walks.

name: Cosy apartment in Geneva
description: Nice apartment located in the beautiful Eaux-Vives district of Geneva.  The apartment is 65m2 and has a nice bedroom; A spacious living room with a dining table; A fully equipped kitchen with a window overlooking a courtyard; a bathroom with bathtub and a separate toilet. The apartment is in a 5-minute walk from Lake Geneva.

name: Bright and Stylish Apartment
description:
Sunny and stylish apartment -- 10 minutes from Geneva's railway station on foot. It has one bedroom, a comfortable living & dining room with a fully equiped kitchen. The lake is 2 minute away on foot!
Ultra fast WiFi -- 100Mbps -- Perfect for home office.

name: Nice room 10 min from airport
description: A simple and nice room in a new modern 2-bedroom flat, 10 minutes by bus directly from GVA airport or to downtown Geneva, bus+tram only 3 minute walk, shoppings+restaurant 3 minutes walk. In a quiet zone, your room is a suite with full modern bathroom, dedicated working table. espresso machine+capsules in the room, 1 free laundry during your stay possible. My very discret and kind female roommate works in a 5-star hotel in Geneva so she keeps the flat very clean and nice smell and very friendly.

name: Appartement Genève.
description:
This peaceful home offers a relaxing stay for the whole family.
4.5 rooms, sunny with a nice terrace.
Available right away.

name: Appartement à Carouge.
description:
### cat in the apartment to take care of ###

Make you welcome by my adorable cat in an apartment where you will have everything you need and a very well-equipped kitchen.

I live year-round and rent my apartment when I am not there. When I'm there, I only rent the room.

My apartment will be very available all summer because I will move with my van.

name: N7 Geneva city center close Cornavin, lake
description: The entire group will have easy access to all sights and amenities from this central home.

name: Aprt du lac Eaux-Vives
description:
🌸🌸🌸Our flat 🏠 is centrally located close to the lake.🐟
You'll have easy access to supermarkets, shopping center, public transport in 3' walking and reach the train station in 20'.
The apartment has two rooms far from each other and is in a very quiet street.

Me or my flatmate girl will be in the other room, depending who's not travelling:) We love meeting people from around the world 🌍and travel lots ourselves. Our kitchen is spacious and we are looking forward to meeting you!🌸🌸🌸

description:
Furnished studio of 15 m2 very well located opposite the Plain of Plainpalais, close to the UniGe, shops and public transport.
The place is very well located, close to Unimail, Unibastion and Unidufour.
The studio is ideally suited for student or intern.
Equipment: bed (bedding included), large wardrobe, desk, bedside table and bathroom with WC + WiFi.
There is a laundry room on the first floor of the building.
Fully equipped shared kitchenette for 5 studios.

name: Geneva City Stay
description: A stylish ground floor studio with separate kitchenette and Wi-Fi (fiber) in the heart of Geneva, 5 mins driveway to the airport, 2 mins walking distance to TPG bus stop, 10 mins walk to United Nations, and 10’ walk to Balexert shopping centre. Ideal for weekend, short or long stay.

description: Experience historic charm in our one-bedroom apartment nestled in Geneva's Old Town. Situated on the third floor, it features a cozy queen-size bed, a dining table, and a fully equipped kitchen. Unwind on the sofa or catch up on tasks at the small desk. Include a bath tub and take advantage of the convenience of a washing machine. Ample storage space ensures your belongings are neatly organized. Enjoy the blend of modern amenities and old-world ambiance in this delightful retreat.

description:
Cozy flat in cute Plainpalais area. Very well located with a tram stop (line 12/18) at 3 min walking that leads you in 10 min to the lake and in 15 min to the train station. In 5 min walking you have the river where you can start nice walks in the forest.
In the area there are grocery shops, nice wine bars and resto (happy to share any advice on best places to go :) )
Our apartment can welcome max 4 people with 1 room with a double bed and 1 sofa bed. The kitchen is well equipped for cooking.

This bright apartment represents an opportunity in the center of Geneva, enjoying both urban convenience and comfort.

Forget your worries in this spacious, serene space.

The flat is very bright and fully furnished with all utilities Wifi.
The flat consists of a living room/bedroom, kitchen, balcony, bathroom, WC.The kitchen is fully equipped with el. cooker, oven, fridge/freezer, dishwasher, microwave and all kitchen utilities, tableware . description:
Room available for rent.
The room is spacious, bright, and quiet. 5 minutes walk from the tram and bus stop, 10 minutes walk from the train station and close to supermarkets. Zone calm and quiet, not exposed on busy and noisy roads.

The apartment is composed of three bedrooms, one equipped kitchen and one bathroom with bathtub.
Friendly and respectful atmosphere.

description:
Penthouse Extremely rare find in the most peaceful and in demand area - Florissant.
150m2 + 45 m2 ( 2 terraces) penthouse, 5 rooms.
2 master bedroom suites
12 min walk to the Jet D’eau lake.
Close to everything, in front of Coop, bus station under the apartment. Also under the apartment you can find Pharmacy, florist, coffee shops and more. In front of Parc Bertrand.
Very luxurious apartment. Art Deco newly fully furnished with Cassina, Knoll, Hermes, Poltrana Frau, Jensen
firs easily 4 to 6 ppl

description:
This 4-room apartment is very spacious, bright and central, 2 min walking distance from Cornavin train station. The flat consists of two bedrooms, a big living romm, dining room and kitchen with dishwasher, a large balcony with a beautiful view, a bathroom with washing machine and a separated WC.
The visitors will benefit from an easy access to all sites and amenities from this super central location.

name: Maison spacieuse& moderne-10 min. du centre de GVA
description: Very nice spacious house located near the center of Geneva, 10 minutes from the city center, in a very quiet residential area, with garden and 2 outdoor terraces. It has a kitchen open to a spacious living room with quiet corner equipped with a stove, and dining room that seats up to 10 people at the table. A large master bedroom, 2 bedrooms with 2 desks, a games room and a fitness room, TV corner, library, laundry room. 3 bedrooms with desk.

name: Chambre à Cointrin Aéroport GVA
description:
This home is next to Geneva Airport. It is composed of two bedrooms, each with a double bed. An en-suite bathroom completes the 1st floor. A room is for 2 people. The house is close to all amenities and has a garden. Public transportation to the city center is common.

Attention: If you want to sleep separately in 2 bedrooms, it is necessary to indicate 3 people in the reservation. Thank you

name: Cosy boat in the heart of GVA
description:
If you would like an outdoorsy lake experience in the middle of the city under the symbol of Geneva, then this is the place for you. Our boat offers a fantastic view and a unique sleeping experience - you will be lulled to sleep by the gentle rocking of the boat on the waves. During the day, sit above deck and enjoy the refreshing breeze from the Jet d’Eau. The boat offers basic camping amenities and, thanks to its central location, you can find everything else you might want within 500m.
Enjoy!

name: Appartement Confort, Vue sur le Lac
description: Beautiful fully furnished and equipped apartment located in the lively Eaux-Vives district. It is a few meters from the Geneva Jet d 'eau and the Lake.

name: Great Apartment near Jet d'Eau!
description:
Welcome to my great one-bedroom apartment, ideally located in the city center, 5 mins from the lake and 10 mins to Cornavin train station by foot. All major bus and tram connections are close to the building. Grocery stores are a block away from the building.

The apartment is composed of a living room, a fully furnished kitchen, a bathroom with a bath, and a spacious bedroom.

name: 3 Bedroom Flat in Etang-Vernier
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun. This flat offers everything you need for a comfortable and convenient stay. This flat is perfect for families, groups, or business travelers, offering ample space to work, relax, and enjoy your stay.

In the center of the village of Bernex but surrounded by nature!
Fully renovated and carefully decorated apartment.

description:
Welcome to our 20m2 room located in our wellness center, 3 min walk from Geneve Cornavin train station and 15mn by train from the airport .

Sleeping arrangements are optional King Size (180cm) or 2 single beds (2x90cm). The room is equipped with a small fridge, Dolce Gusto coffee machine, TV for your comfort.

Microwave, dishes, kettle, fridge are available in the common area.

We are looking forward to hosting you

Furnished room in a quiet villa in Versoix at the gates of Geneva.
This room is 2 minutes from Leman College.
It has a double bed, storage spaces, TV, internet, a desk fully equipped to work.
Bathroom is dedicated to you.
You have access to the fully equipped kitchen and garden in shared space.
Free parking space

description: Enjoy a pleasant stay in this convenient and quiet accommodation in the heart of the city of Geneva. Guests have 2 balconies with views of green space to enjoy the sun in the morning and afternoon. The apartment has high speed internet connection, the kitchen is fully equipped and the bathroom and toilet are totally private. Public transportation is less than a 5min walk away and you'll find supermarkets, restaurants, and bars nearby.

name: Private Large  Studio City Centre Old Town
description:
Centrally located large studio with modern amenities, incl. high speed WiFi, TV, separate private kitchen (stove, toaster, oven, kettle, coffee machine…), dining table, double bed, storage/wardrobes, chest of draws, separate private bathroom.
>1 minute walk to public transport

This modern and cozy cocoon is perfect for guests looking for relaxation and convenience. Enjoy all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay, whether you are here for business or pleasure. The immediate proximity to the lake allows you to relax . Come and discover the best of Geneva from this prime location!

To make your experience special, the apartment is themed according to a cult series: Friends!

Intended for 4 people, it can still accommodate a fifth person on a sofa bed.

Located on a quiet street, on the second floor of a typical Geneva building, the accommodation has a bedroom (with a small balcony), a bathroom and a large living kitchen.

Superb apartment on the ground floor of a typical Swiss terraced house with private terrace.
Located in a quiet area, close to the Bois de la Bâtie and all amenities. Stone wall and vine that pleasantly keeps the freshness.
Fully equipped kitchen/ Bathroom with great Italian shower + 2nd toilet / Large bedroom and living room/ Desk with computer equipment/Laundry column (washer and dryer/indoor bike/parking space in front of the house

The space

description:

It is on the 6th floor and enjoys stunning views of Geneva. You can access it independently, (building code + lockbox), but if I am in Geneva at the time of your arrival, I will be happy to welcome you.

name: Cozy studio in Geneva old town - 325000
description:
This flat is ideally located in the heart of the old town. It offers a cosy, open-plan living room with an authentic fireplace and a bathroom. The flat is on the 1st floor without lift.
Like many European cities, the old town allows you to enjoy architectural wonders from the late middle age or renaissance time and the silence of a pedestrian district. You can also find nice bars and Swiss traditional food.

name: ! Magnifique appartement bord du lac !

Hello!! Welcome. Welcome to our quiet and elegant apartment, located in the prestigious Eaux-Vives district. Enjoy stunning views of the famous Geneva Jet d 'eau 2 steps from the apartment, where a beautiful grand piano adds a touch of sophistication.

Close to lake and parks, our location offers you tranquility and easy access to charming shops and cafes. Perfect for relaxing and inspiring stays.

name: Magnifique appartement
description: Enjoy a stylish and central home.

With an area of 50m2, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, independent toilet, a pleasant living room with a sofa bed and a bedroom with a double bed (160x200cm).
The apartment is located 4 minutes from the tram stop "Armes" (lines 12 & 18). You can reach Geneva city center in 8 minutes by tram or 20 minutes on foot.

the apartment is fully furnished and fully equipped.

A night out is easy to organize, but a night in is just as lovely with a balcony & patio table.

You'll find all the shops you need for your groceries nearby.

For a must-see culinary experience, the best restaurant in Geneva specializing in fondue, Le Gruyérien, is about a 15-minute walk away.

name: Magnifique appartement
description: Beautiful luxury apartment consisting of a living room with open kitchen as well as a bedroom and bathroom. Located in the heart of the lively Eaux-Vives district, a few meters from the Geneva Jet d 'eau.

name: Studio Privé Vieille Ville Genèv
description:
Studio located in the beautiful old town of Geneva, it is a place characterized by being one of the most beautiful places visited by tourists, it is close to the restaurants, bars and iconic sites of this beautiful neighborhood, in its streets you can breathe art, poetry, love and peace.
The studio is fully equipped with all that a visitor is looking for for comfort.

This quiet retreat features a spacious bedroom with a queen-sized bed, a convertible sofa bed in the open living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. Just few minutes walk from Uni-Mail and vibrant Carl Vogt Boulevard, with eclectic bars, restaurants, and museums nearby. Enjoy Wi-Fi, laundry, and a dishwasher. Perfect for up to 4 travelers, this is your home away from home.

The property is around 2.1 miles from Stade de Genève, 2.3 miles from United Nations Geneva, and 3.8 miles from PalExpo. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and St. Pierre Cathedral is a 12-minute walk away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

One bedroom flat located in Servette (central Geneva) 15 minutes walk to train station (Cornavin). 30 minute direct bus ride to Geneva Airport.
Quiet, clean, spacious, entirely refurbished in 2023.

Charming quiet apartment with balcony located near Geneva and Lake Geneva.
Located in a peaceful commune, ideal to recharge your batteries and enjoy the activities of the Geneva canton, in summer and winter.

This modern and cozy cocoon is perfect for guests looking for relaxation and convenience.  Enjoy all the amenities needed for an enjoyable stay, whether you're here for business or pleasure.  The direct proximity to the lake allows you to relax.  Come and discover the best of Geneva from this prime location! There is a fridge/freezer in the apartment. Childeren are welcome!

description:
Quiet and comfortable small studio in the Servette district. Facing a large park, very close to tram stop 14 and 18, 15 minutes walking distance from the train station, 15 minutes walking distance from the UN. Very close to supermarkets, shops and restaurants.

The apartment has a view of a very calm inner courtyard. There is no balcony but there are two large windows that open to a space similar to a balcony.

We are looking forward to hosting you

Spacious and bright, with 1 comfortable equipped bedroom, equipped kitchen and inviting living room.

description:

Come and discover this little piece of paradise in the heart of Geneva, where comfort and tranquility meet. Book now for a memorable stay!

name: Studio Deluxe at 4* Royal Hotel
description: For extended stays, the 4-star superior Royal Hotel presents the Deluxe Studio, offering 35 to 43m² of bright, elegant space. Relax in the cozy lounge area with a sofa, and take advantage of the fully equipped kitchenette, including a Nespresso machine. The studio also features a dedicated workspace and a modern bathroom. Guests enjoy access to a fitness center, sauna, and hammam. Laundry facilities are available, with weekly deep cleaning and light daily upkeep included for your convenience.

name: Private apartment at 4* Royal Hotel
description: Our luxurious Geneva apartments provide 47-88m² of elegant living space with a bedroom, spacious living room, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. Indulge in the Italian shower or whirlpool bath, and enjoy outdoor relaxation on a furnished terrace or balcony. Perfect for two, with a king-size bed, Nespresso machine, and free Wi-Fi. Daily light maintenance, weekly full cleaning, and thoughtful extras make it an ideal retreat in the heart of the city.

name: Room at 4 star Hotel Auteuil near the lake
description: Elegant and relaxing, the 4-star Hotel Auteuil's standard rooms provide ample space for one or two guests. Each room features a desk, minibar, interactive flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a safe. Enjoy a courtesy tray with coffee and tea, and a fully equipped bathroom with a bath, hairdryer, and magnifying mirror. A cot is available for children up to 3 years old upon request, making it ideal for a comfortable stay.

name: Magnificent Loft @Iconic Jet d'Eau (66m2)

Breathtaking views blending the beauty of Lake Geneva with the city's vibrant atmosphere surrounded by trendy cafes, gourmet restaurants & chic boutiques. The area is known for its magnificent lakefront promenade, cultural attractions & vibrant nightlife, making it the perfect base for exploring the City Center, visiting the Flower Clock, Park Anglais & Parc La Grange, or relax at the Beach Baby Plage - all in walking distance from your high-end loft!

name: Studio for 1 person in center

The villa also boasts an office, a separate guest studio, and a comprehensive wellness area with a sauna, jacuzzi, and massage room. A home cinema, indoor gym, and large heated outdoor pool complete this exceptional property.

- 1-2 minutes walking distance to public transportation stops
- 2 minutes walking distance Muséum d'histoire naturelle

Our place has a strategic location since from the you can head to all the tourist attractions of the city ( rivers, lake, old town, eblenatic streets, monuments, museums, and many more.) and you can do it perfectly either by walking or by common transport (tram, bus, etc.) if you wish.

it will be very easy to plan your visit !

Its tasteful-chic interior blends effortlessly with warm comfort, ambient hardwood floors, a sunny balcony in the morning and an ideal location for a sophisticated and convenient holiday retreat for 2 people.

Near the apartment you will find restaurants of all kinds of food
The apartment is very central (tram 1min away) and accessible by transport from the train station, the city center..

name: Charming apartment near UN
description:
This apartment is the perfect blend of comfort, style and convenience, ideal for professionals, couples, or anyone seeking a well-connected yet peaceful home in the heart of Geneva.
Direct bus from airport to apartment and Cornavin train station.
The main train station Cornavin is 10 min. away.
U.N is 20 min. away walking.
A beautiful park 1 minute from the apartment.
A lot of groceries shop, restaurants and coffee shops near the place.

name: Cosy attic apartment in Paquis
description:
Enjoy a cosy and stylish stay in Geneva at this centrally-located apartment.

You will be 10 minutes walk from Gare Cornavin (central station) and 2 minutes walk to public transport links to the city centre and to Geneva's major international organisations.

The street is quiet and safe, yet also home to some of Geneva's best restaurants and most vibrant bars. Grocery stores, laundromats and other useful amenities all in close walking distance.

name: Peaceful home in Geneve
description:
This inviting and tastefully decorated apartment is ideally located in Geneva city, offering unparalleled convenience and comfort.
Situated near the Cornavin train station, a serene park, and in close proximity to the United Nations, it combines accessibility with a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Balcon calme au cœur de Carouge
description:
This superb 2 room apartment located in the popular Carouge district famous for its village atmosphere.
A bright living room with a comfortable bedroom with quality bedding and a fully equipped kitchen. A sunny balcony with open views perfect for a coffee in the morning.
High-speed wifi TV and all the essentials for a carefree stay a break and relax in this peaceful oasis.

name: Modern and Peaceful Apartment
description: This stylish apartment offers bright, spacious living with a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable bedrooms, and a large terrace overlooking a garden. Perfectly located, it's a 5-minute walk to the tram and a scenic path to the city. Ideal for professionals, couples, or families seeking comfort, convenience, and serenity. Enjoy peaceful evenings in a quiet building, with all the amenities for a relaxing stay.

description: You would have easy access to all sites and amenities from this central accommodation with several tram lines nearby (line 15 and 17 of UNI mail, and line 12 and 18 of Pont d 'Arve) as well as bus lines (line 91 of UNI mail and line 1 of Pont d' Arve). In the heart of Plainpalais, this bright, spacious apartment is also very well furnished (washing machine, oven and gas, microwave, kettle, toaster, coffee machine, TV, wifi, fridge and freezer).

full furnished room to rent in a furnished shared flat in Cornavin,wireless, wash machine, very close to UN organizations, train station, on various bus and tram routes.bus stop in front of the apt, Supermarkets, pharmacy, 3 minutes walk from the Lake.
Use of kitchen with basic kitchenware’s, No pets and no smoking

description: Enjoy the view of the sky from the attic windows. Since the room is located on the top floor, you will be able to watch Netflix late at night without disturbing anyone. Please note that there is no access to a shared kitchen or living room, so you will enjoy having a semi-private entrance for your comfort.

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

description:
In the charming village of Corsier, 20 minutes from Geneva I will warmly welcome you with my son in a spacious apartment on the garden level. You can take advantage of all the amenities available and valuable tips for a memorable stay.
Public transport two minutes walk, Excenevex sandy beach and medieval village of Ivory 20 minutes away, lake 5 minutes away and beautiful hikes nearby.

name: Appartement au pied du tramway
description: Apartment near Gare Cornavin (5 minutes by tram, 15 minutes by foot) and airport (20 minutes by public transport, 10 minutes by taxi). Old town with direct access with the tram at the foot of the apartment as well as all amenities (supermarket, restaurants, bakery ...)

name: Luxury New Penthouse Geneva
description:
This magnificent crossing apartment offers a weighted surface area of ​​approximately 415 sq m PPE. It is made up of large volumes and benefits from excellent light.

This beautiful penthouse has 2 levels with private access directly by elevator. It consists of 8 rooms including a sumptuous reception room with fireplace and terrace, a large fully equipped contemporary kitchen as well as 5 bedrooms, all with bathrooms/showers. 2 parking spaces complete this exceptional property.

name: Cozy Urban Haven
description:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort, convenience and tranquility in this spacious, bright and centrally located apartment. Nestled in a peaceful neighbourhood, the apartment offers a serene escape while being just minutes away from Geneva's city center and the airport.
Getting around is effortless, with excellent public transport connections right at your doorstep, ensuring you can export the city with ease. Experience the best of Geneva with this ideal home base for your stay!

name: Appartement au Cœur de Genève
description: Charming apartment of 55m², peaceful and central, mixing the charm of the old (high ceilings, parquet) with modern comfort. Ideally located 10 min walk from the train station, 1 min from different tram lines and buses to get around the whole city, you can also reach the lake in less than 20 min. Offering a garden side bedroom, a bright living room with balcony, a separate kitchen and an office space, this is the perfect place to enjoy Geneva in an authentic setting.

name: Historic Charm & Modern Comfort
description: A hidden gem in Geneva, nestled on the ground floor of a fully renovated stone farmhouse. With private entrance, terrace, parking space, a bike and garden, it offers both tranquility and central convenience. Wooden beams, modern amenities, fiber internet, charming antique furniture, historic details and great comfort make it perfect for Christmas holidays, a work trip or a longer stay. Enjoy easy access to Geneva’s attractions and Swiss transportation while relaxing in this warm, inviting space.

name: Eaux-Vives -cosy apartment available  20 Dec-1 Feb
description:
Availailable only between 20 Dec-1 Feb. Beautiful corner apartment with a nice ceiling height in a 1930 building in the city center a few minutes walk from the lake. All amenities nearby, several bus stops, walking access to the Centre Commercial Eaux-Vives, restaurants, shops, museums.

The apartment is on the 3rd floor with elevator and has been decorated tastefully, and has warm cozy ambience.

Charming living room and dining room with a real large bed with quality linens and comfortable

name: 2 Bed 2 Bath apt with garden Geneva
description: Peaceful and centrally-located 90m2 apartment  with garden. One double bed and two single beds, two bathrooms, one with shower and the other with a bath and underground lockup garage. Easy access from/to airport, 14 min by bus nr. 10. Cornavin Train station is 16 min away with tram 14/18 and the Balexert shopping centrum, 7 min by foot.

name: Chambre à Genève
description: Enjoy a spacious, stylish and relaxing accommodation 10 minutes from the city center (Rive).

name: Apartment with lake view
description: Centrally located apartment in Geneva. You will enjoy all the benefits of being in the city centre while enjoying the calm with a lake view.

name: Cornavin-Lac Bel appartement au cœur de Genève
description:
Apartment ideally located in the heart of Geneva, 2 min from the train station (airport/city connections) and 4 min walk to the lake for soothing walks.
Close to shops, restaurants and transport, this 70 m² combines comfort and elegance: warm living room, spacious bedroom, modern office and equipped kitchen with dining area. Careful decor, quiet atmosphere and central location make it the perfect place for a pleasant stay, business or leisure.

name: 71 Chambre privée lumineuse
description:
Comfortable private room in shared apartment near Cornavin station.
Ideal for guests or professionals, the room offers a quiet space with a cozy bed, Wi-Fi and storage. You will have access to common areas: kitchen, bathroom and living room. Perfect location close to local shops and attractions. Free transportation card included to make it easier to get around during your stay. Friendly and respectful atmosphere assured.

name: Cozy and homely flat close to centre of Geneva
description: Experience Geneva from this charming, renovated apartment just a bus ride away from the city centre. This welcoming space features a cozy living room and modern kitchen, offering you a true home-away-from-home during the festive season. As your private retreat, you'll have the entire apartment to yourself, making it ideal for experiencing Geneva's magical Christmas atmosphere. Perfectly situated for exploring the city's highlights while providing a comfortable, peaceful haven to return to.

name: Rayonnant bien a 5mn du centre
description: Modern and fully equipped apartment, located in the most popular municipality in the canton of Geneva, a few minutes from the city center. Enjoy a quiet and refined setting with a full kitchen, bright living room and comfortable bedroom. Private parking included. Easy access to shops and restaurants. Great for a business or leisure stay. Experience luxury and tranquility within walking distance of Geneva!

name: House for Nomads
description:
House for nomads is ready to welcome you in the cutest neighborhood with a special garden !

My name is Bianca and I live in geneva since 3 months, I work in healthcare!

When I am not in geneva, I’d like to share my cozy house to with is willing to live Geneva like a local !

My house is situated on a garden, has a living room, one bedroom, a spatious kitchen and a toilet!

It’s situated 50 mt from the lake.

Come discover Geneva like a local!

Close to shops, restaurants and transport, this central apartment is perfect for working or discovering Geneva!

No smoking in the unit.

This two bedroom apartment stands out for its convenient layout and semi-furnished amenities, including a large wardrobe in each of the bedrooms and two sofas in the living room.

Spacious lobby gives access to every main room. Both bedrooms are comfortable in size and each equipped with a large wardrobe for storage.

The kitchen, modern and functional, has plenty of storage and a well-designed countertop.
